Adhola: Piidh kodhi i lowo (gir-atima), ikeeci acama
English: Plant your seeds in the ground (investments), and eat your harvest

Adhola: Ŋwej dhano moneno kwach opogore gi mag ŋat mowinjo awinja ni ebiro.
English: The speed with which a man runs off after encountering a Leopard differs from the one who has only heard that a Leopard is on the way

Adhola: Dhyaŋ kiwey madho pi i jwom ru ogwal maywak dho ume
English: A cow doesn't stop drinking water from the well because of a croaking frog next to its nostrils

Adhola: Achero michiemo iye iweyo chieng baro
English: Cutting the hand that feeds you

Adhola: Achero pamunenwa kiyawi
English: A gift from an intimate friend is never doubted

Adhola: Achero wil
English: scratch by back, and I will scratch yours

Adhola: Yesu botho jadhowo
English: Jesus cleanses the leper

Adhola: Munyo Yesu oloro wi got, kweth ji joluwo go.
English: When he came down from the mountain, great crowds followed him.

Adhola: Gikenyo jadhowo moro obino bonge, oryewere piny runyime, to wacho ni, “Jadwoŋ ka iyenyo inyalo bothan.”
English: And behold, a leper came to him and knelt before him, saying, “Lord, if you will, you can make me clean.”

Adhola: Yesu ochwayo chinge to geyo go munyo wacho ni, “Ayenyo, bothi!”
English: And Jesus stretched out his hand and touched him, saying, “I will; be clean.”

Adhola: Gikenyo dhowo pere ochango i hongo no won.
English: And immediately his leprosy was cleansed.

Adhola: To Yesu wacho ri go ni, “Neni! Ikiri iwachi ri nyatoro, to kidhi titir bongi jachwayi ri Were wi alitar, go wokaŋasa in, aka imiy mich ma chowirok ma nyutho dhano jye nike iboth, paka mitere i Or ma Musa ondiko.”
English: And Jesus said to him, “See that you say nothing to anyone, but go, show yourself to the priest and offer the gift that Moses commanded, for a proof to them.”

Adhola: Yesu botho jatich pa Jaserikale madwoŋ ma Jaroma
English: Jesus heals the Centurion’s Servant

Adhola: Munyo Yesu odonjo Kapernaum, jaserikale madwoŋ ma Jaroma oromo gine to kwayo kony ni,“Jadwoŋ, jatich paran ni pecho two nyaŋinya i kanindo, kinyal ay, aka nitye i litho madwoŋ swa.”
English: When he entered Capernaum, a centurion came forward to him, appealing to him, “Lord, my servant is lying paralyzed at home, suffering terribly.”

Adhola: Yesu owacho ni, “Abino kidho botho go.”
English: And he said to him, “I will come and heal him.”

Adhola: Jaserikale odwoko ni, “Be Jadwoŋ, kiripi ran in donjo i ot paran, wachi nyaka wach achiel to jatich paran both.”
English: But the centurion replied, “Lord, I am not worthy to have you come under my roof, but only say the word, and my servant will be healed. ”

Adhola: Kole abende anitye gi jodongo ma jotelan, aka nitye joserikale ma bende joluwan.
English: For I too am a man under authority, with soldiers under me.

Adhola: Ka awacho ri me ni kadhi, to kadho; ri man ni biye, to bino; aka ka aoro jago paran ni, timi gimanyo, to go timo.”
English: And I say to one, ‘Go,’and he goes, and to another, ‘Come,’and he comes, and to my servant, ‘Do this,’and he does it.

Adhola: Yesu ouro munyo owinjo gime, omiyo owacho ri ji monwaŋo joluwo go ni, “Awacho ri win, fuodi akineno kiti yeyo me i nyatoro jye i Israel.Poyi win gime!
English: When Jesus heard this, he marveled and said to those who followed him, “Truly, I tell you, with no one in Israel have I found such faith.

Adhola: Joma thoth jobino wok yu Wokchieŋ kodi yu Podhochieŋ to jobedo dhower i Ker ma polo kodi Ibrayimu, Isaka, kodi Yakobo.
English: I tell you, many will come from east and west and recline at table with Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob in the kingdom of heaven.

Adhola: To joma oido joripere bedo i Ker ibino bolo jo woko i mudho kama jobino ywak'iye to jomwodo laki gin.
English: But the sons of the kingdom mwill be cast out into outer darkness where they will be weeping and gnashing their teeth.

Adhola: ”Aka Yesu owacho ri jaserikale ni, “Doki pecho, paka iyeyo, gima iyenyo wotimere rin.”
English: And to the centurion Jesus said, “Go; let it be done for you as you have believed.

Adhola: Aka jatich pa jaserikale oboth sawa no won.
English: And the servant was healed at that very moment.

Adhola: Yesu botho ji mathoth
English: Jesus heals many people

Adhola: Yesu okidho pecho pa Petro, aka kenyo or Petro mobedo min chiege oido ni kanindo kwoŋe oowere.
English: And when Jesus entered Peter’s house, he saw his mother-in-law lying sick with a fever.

Adhola: Gikenyo go ogeyo chingi dheno, to two weyo go; aka oay malo to chako rweyo go.
English: He touched her hand, and the fever left her, and she rose and began to serve him.

Adhola: Munyo piny oyutho, ji jokelo bongi Yesu ji ma jwogi ni kwoŋ jo.
English: That evening they brought to him many who were oppressed by demons.

Adhola: Yesu oryemo woko jwogi gi wach pere to botho jotwo jye.
English: Jesus cast out the spirits with a word and healed all who were sick.

Adhola: Go otimo ama ma miyo gima jatuchi wach Were Isaya owacho ni, “Go won okwanyo woko nyapo mawan, to tiŋo two mawan,” wotundi i kare.
English: This was to fulfill what was spoken by the prophet Isaiah: “He took our illnesses and bore our diseases.”

Adhola: Joma di jobedo joma luwo Yesu
English: Those who will folllow Jesus

Adhola: Munyo Yesu oneno kweth ji jothoko go, owodho or ni jowopori loka man ma wakawaka.
English: Now when Jesus saw a crowd around him, he gave orders to go over to the other side.

Adhola: Jafuonji ma Chik moro obino bonge to wacho ni, “Jafuonji ayikere kidho kodin kama inochom'iye jye.”
English: And a scribe came up and said to him, “Teacher, I will follow you wherever you go.”

Adhola: Yesu odwoko go ni, “Kibwe jonitye gi kero pajo, aka winyin bende jonitye gi odi gin, to Wuodi Dhano ongoye kodi kama go othen'iye wiye.”
English: And Jesus said to him, “Foxes have holes, and birds of the air have nests, but the Son of Man has nowhere to lay his head.”

Adhola: Achiel kwoŋ jafuonjirok pere owacho ni, “Jadwoŋ, weyi kutho akidhi ayiki baba.”
English: Another of the disciples said to him, “Lord, let me first go and bury my father.”

Adhola: Yesu odwoko go ni, “Luwan. Weyi jomotho wegi jowoyiki jomotho pajo.”
English: And Jesus said to him, “Follow me, and leave the dead to bury their own dead.”

Adhola: Yesu kweyo asur
English: Jesus calms the storm

Adhola: Munyo Yesu odonjo i yee, jofuonjirok pere jokadho gi go
English: And when he got into the boat, his disciples followed him.

Adhola: Piyo piyo no asur madwoŋ obino i wakawaka momiyo pi matula oido umo woko yee aka Yesu oido nindo
English: And behold, there arose a great storm on the sea, so that the boat was being swamped by the waves; but he was asleep

Adhola: .Jofuonjirok jokidho bonge to jochiewo go ka jowacho ni, “Bothi wan, Ruoth! Wachiegin tho!”
English: And they went and woke him, saying, “Save us, Lord; we are perishing.”

Adhola: Yesu odwoko ni, “Wibwok ameno raŋo! Apaka yeyo mewin nok ama!”
English: And he said to them, “Why are you afraid, O you of little faith?”

Adhola: Gikenyo go oay malo to oro asur kodi wakawaka moido tula kwe; aka gimoro jye okwe maber.
English: Then he rose and rebuked the winds and the sea, and there was a great calm.

Adhola: Dhano jye odhyer to Jowacho ni, “Me kiti dhano manedi? Kir asur kodi kitula pa pi jye winjo go!”
English: And the men marveled, saying, “What sort of man is this, that even winds and sea obey him?

Adhola: Yesu botho ji aryo ma jwogi ni kwoŋ jo
English: Jesus heals two demon possessed people

Adhola: Munyo Yesu obino i adech ma Gadara, yu loka man ma wakawaka, ji aryo moido jo ni gi jwogi aka jowok i ŋungu miyik'iye ji, joromo gine.
English: And when he came to the other side, to the country of the Gadarenes, two demon-possessed men met him, coming out of the tombs.

Adhola: Jono oido joger swa, amomiyo ji bin jolworo luwo royo no
English: They were so fierce that no one could pass that way.

Adhola: Piyo piyo no jokoko malo ni, “Iyenyo timo aŋo gi wan, Wuodi Were?
English: And behold, they cried out, “What have you to do with us, O Son of God?

Adhola: Ibino chando wan ma fuodi ndir motire kotundo?
English: Have you come here to torment us before the time?”

Adhola: Chiegin kenyo, oido nitye sidwol mbiji ma chiemo.”
English: Now a herd of many pigs was feeding at some distance from them.

Adhola: Gikenyo to jwogi jokwayo Yesu ni, “Ka imito ryemo wan woko, ere dhiri wan i sidwol mbiji no.”
English: And the demons begged him, saying, “If you cast us out, send us away into the herd of pigs.”

Adhola: Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Kidhi win.”
English: And he said to them, “Go.”

Adhola: Gikenyo jowok to jodonjo i sidwol mbiji. Sidwol gi bee oloro piny wok wi tendere to jomunyere i pi.
English: So they came out and went into the pigs, and behold, the whole herd rushed down the steep bank into the sea and drowned in the waters.

Adhola: Ji monwaŋo jokwayo mbiji joringo to jokidho i tindi, to jowacho ri ji ma kenyo gimoro jye motimere ri joma onwaŋo jwogi ni kwoŋ jo.
English: The herdsmen fled, and going into the city they told everything, especially what had happened to the demon-possessed men.

Adhola: Gino omiyo dhano jye ma tindi owok kidho romo gi Yesu; aka munyo joneno go, jokwayo go ni woeye i adech pajo.
English: And behold, all the city came out to meet Jesus, and when they saw him, they begged him to leave their region.

Adhola: Yesu botho jatwo nyaŋinya
English: Jesus heals a paralytic

Adhola: Yesu odonjo i yee to chiewere gik yu loka man ma wakawaka, to bino i tindi ma thugin won.
English: Jesus got into a boat and crossed over and came to his own city.

Adhola: Kenyo, jomogo jokelo ri go dhano moido two nyaŋinya ma jotiŋo wi kitanda.
English: And behold, some people brought to him a paralytic, lying on a bed.

Adhola: Munyo Yesu oneno kiti yeyo pa jono, owacho ri ŋata two nyaŋinya ni, “Ikiri irembi, wuodan; gimarecho perin ochwak rin.”
English: And when Jesus saw their faith, he said to the paralytic, “Take heart, my son; your sins are forgiven.”

Adhola: Gikenyo jofuonji ma Chik wegi jowacho kendigin ni, “Ŋat me kole luwo marach kwoŋ Were!”
English: And behold, some of the scribes said to themselves, “This man is blaspheming.”

Adhola: Yesu oŋeyo gima oido joparo to wacho ni, “Raŋo ma wiparo gikipiny marecho ameno?
English: But Jesus, knowing their thoughts, said, “Why do you think evil in your hearts?

Adhola: Mene mayot, wacho ni, ‘Gimarecho perin ochwak rin,’ kosa wacho ni, ‘Ayi malo iwothi?’
English: For which is easier, to say, ‘Your sins are forgiven,’or to say, ‘Rise and walk’?

Adhola: Amomiyo ere abino nyutho win ni Wuodi Dhano ni gi men i piny ka ma chwako gimarecho.”
English: But that you may know that the Son of Man has authority on earth to forgive sins”

Adhola: Gikenyo go owacho ri dhano moido two nyaŋinya ni, “Ayi malo, itiŋ kitanda perin, idok pecho.”
English: He then said to the paralytic,“Rise, pick up your bed and go home.”

Adhola: Jalo oay malo to doki pecho.
English: And he rose and went home.

Adhola: Munyo kweth ji moido ni kenyo joneno gino, jouro swa, to jopako Were momiyo dhano kiti men machal ameno.
English: When the crowds saw it, they were afraid, and they glorified God, who had given such authority to men.

Adhola: Yesu lwoŋo Mathayo
English: Jesus calls Matthew

Adhola: Yesu oeye kenyo, aka munyo wotho, oneno jachoki misolo ma nyinge Mathayo obedo piny kama go oido tiyo iye.
English: As Jesus passed on from there, he saw a man called Matthew sitting at the tax booth.

Adhola: Yesu owacho ri go ni, “Luwan.”
English: Jesus said to him, “Follow me.”

Adhola: Mathayo oay malo to luwo go.
English: Matthew rose and followed him.

Adhola: Munyo Yesu oido chiemo modyechieŋ i ot pa Mathayo, jochoki misolo mathoth kodi joma recho jobino to jobedo gi Yesu kodi jofuonjirok pere dhower.
English: And as Jesus reclined at table in the house, behold, many tax collectors and sinners came and were reclining with Jesus and his disciples.

Adhola: Munyo Jofarisayo mogo joneno gime, jowacho ri jofuonjirok pere ni, “Raŋo ma jafuonji mewin chiemo gi jochoki misolo kodi joma recho?”
English: And when the Pharisees saw this, they said to his disciples, “Why does your teacher eat with tax collectors and sinners?”

Adhola: Yesu owinjo jo to wacho ni, “Jomolama ama jokiyeny jamilerwa, to joma two ayino ama joyenyo. ”
English: When Jesus heard it, he said, “Those who are well have no need of a physician, but those who are sick.

Adhola: Kidhi win winiaŋ atoŋa momiyo ondik ni, ‘Ayenyo wor ayino, ma kiweno rachow ma lee.’
English: Go and learn what this means, ‘I desire mercy, and not sacrifice.’

Adhola: Kole akibino lwoŋo ji motire, to joma recho ayino.
English: For I came not to call the righteous, but sinners.

Adhola: Penji kwoŋ riyo kech
English: Question on fasting

Adhola: Gikenyo joma luwo Yohana Jakibatisa jobino bongi Yesu gi penji ni, “Raŋo wan kodi Jofarisayo wariyo kech noknok, to jofuonjirok perin jokiriy kada dichiel?”
English: Then the disciples of John came to him, saying, “Why do we and the Pharisees fast, but your disciples do not fast?”

Adhola: Yesu odwoko jo ni, “Chiene wendo ma kalima ma nywomirok bende jobedo gi rem ma fuodi jamweha nitye gi jo?”
English: And Jesus said to them, “Can the wedding guests mourn as long as the bridegroom is with them?”

Adhola: Kinyalere!
English: Impossible!

Adhola: To ndir bino tundo ma ibino kwany'iye woko jamweha bongi jo nyaka to joriyo kech.
English: The days will come when the bridegroom is taken away from them, and then they will fast.

Adhola: Ongoye nyatoro ma kwoyo kot moti gi kiremo manyien, rupiri kiremo no leywayo kot to kamoyech medere bedo madwoŋ ayino.
English: No one puts a piece of unshrunk cloth on an old garment, for the patch tears away from the garment, and a worse tear is made.

Adhola: Odoko ongoye nyatoro ma konjo medho vini manyien i migowa pyendere machon.
English: Neither is new wine put into old wineskins.

Adhola: Ka otimo ameno, pyendere lemwoch woko, to vini oy woko, to pyendere bende nyiekere.
English: If it is, the skins burst and the wine is spilled and the skins are destroyed.

Adhola: Kuchiel, ripere vini manyien wokonji i migowa pyendere manyien, ŋey nyaka gigo jaryo no jye bino kurere maber.
English: But new wine is put into fresh wineskins, and so both are preserved.

Adhola: Nyar jaserikale madwoŋ kodi dhako ma two remo joboth
English: Daughter of a ruler and the woman with bleeding problem

Adhola: Munyo Yesu oido fuodi wacho ri jo gime, jaserikale madwoŋ ma Jayudaya obino bonge, to ryewo chonge piny runyime ka wacho ni, “Nyaran nyaka owok tho won; to biye kethi chingin kwoŋe, aka go bino kwo.”
English: While he was saying these things to them, behold, a ruler came in and knelt before him, saying, “My daughter has just died, but come and lay your hand on her, and she will live.”

Adhola: Gikenyo Yesu oay malo oluwo go, kanyachiel gi jofuonjirok pere.
English: And Jesus rose and followed him, with his disciples.

Adhola: Dhako moro, moido remo madit oy kwoŋe oro apar g'aryo gipi obino yu ŋey Yesu to geyo dhoki nanga pere.
English: And behold, a woman who had suffered from a discharge of blood for twelve years came up behind him and touched the fringe of his garment.

Adhola: Dheno owacho gi i chunye ni, “Bedi ayanja agey kada nyaka nanga pere won, d'abedo maber.”
English: for she said to herself, “If I only touch his garment, I will be made well.”

Adhola: Yesu owire to neno go to wacho ni, “Ikiri irembi, nyaran! Yeyo perin otyeko bothin.”
English: Jesus turned, and seeing her he said, “Take heart, daughter; your faith has made you well.”

Adhola: I hongo no won to dheno bedo maber.
English: And instantly the woman was made well.

Adhola: Gikenyo Yesu okidho i ot pa jaserikale madwoŋ.
English: And when Jesus came to the ruler’s house

Adhola: Aka munyo oneno jokudhi madundo, kodi kweth ji moido joucho, owacho ni, “Ngoye win ka wijojye; nyathi ma nyako no kotho, go nindo ayino!”
English: and saw the flute players and the crowd making a commotion, he said, “Go away, for the girl is not dead but sleeping.”

Adhola: To jono jonyiero go.
English: And they laughed at him.

Adhola: Aka munyo otyek wodho ji jye woko, Yesu odonjo i ot to mako chingi nyathi manyako no to nyalo ay malo.
English: But when the crowd had been put outside, he went in and took her by the hand, and the girl arose.

Adhola: Wach no olak i adech ma piny no gipi.
English: And the report of this went through all that district.

Adhola: Yesu botho ji aryo ma waŋ gin otho
English: Jesus heals two blind people

Adhola: Yesu oeye kenyo, aka munyo kadho, ji aryo ma waŋ gin otho jochako luwo go munyo jokoko ni, “Timi ri wan wor, Wuodi pa Daudi!”
English: And as Jesus passed on from there, two blind men followed him, crying aloud, “Have mercy on us, Son of David.”

Adhola: Munyo Yesu odonjo i ot, joma waŋ gin otho no jobino bonge to go penjo jo ni, “Wiyeyo ni anyalo timo gino?”
English: When he entered the house, the blind men came to him, and Jesus said to them, “Do you believe that I am able to do this?”

Adhola: To jodwoko ni, “Ey jadwoŋ.”
English: They said to him, “Yes, Lord.”

Adhola: Gikenyo go ogeyo waŋ jo aka owacho ni, “Ere, wobedi ameno chungo kwoŋ yeyo mewin!”
English: Then he touched their eyes, saying, “According to your faith be it done to you.”

Adhola: Waŋ jono ochako neno.
English: Their eyes were opened.

Adhola: To Yesu chiko jo teltel ni, “Wikiri wiwachi ri nyatoro.”
English: And Jesus sternly warned them, “See that no one knows about it.”

Adhola: To joeye kenyo munyo jonyayo wach kwoŋ Yesu i adech jye ma piny no.
English: But they went away and spread his fame through all that district

Adhola: Yesu botho obadha
English: Jesus heals a mute man

Adhola: Munyo ji oido jokadho, jomogo jokelo ri Yesu obadha ma jwogi oido ni kwoŋe.
English: As they were going away, behold, a demon-oppressed man who was mute was brought to him.

Adhola: Tekin otyek ryemo woko jwogi no, ŋato ochako luwo
English: And when the demon had been cast out, the mute man spoke.

Adhola: To dhano jye dhyer jowacho ni, “Fuodi wakineno gima chalo ama i Israel!”
English: And the crowds marveled, saying, “Never was anything like this seen in Israel.”

Adhola: To Jofarisayo jowacho ni, “Ruodhi jwogi ama miyo go men ma ryemo woko jo.”
English: But the Pharisees said, “He casts out demons by the prince of demons.”

Adhola: Gikenyo Yesu okidho i tindi jye kodi loka jye.
English: And Jesus went throughout all the cities and villages,

Adhola: Go ofuonjo i kalamo pa Joyudaya munyo tito Wach Maber ma Ker, aka obotho ji kwoŋ kiti two kodi ramirok jye.
English: He was teaching in their synagogues and proclaiming the gospel of the kingdom and healing every disease and every affliction.

Adhola: Munyo go oneno kweth ji, wor opoŋ i chunye ri jo, rupiri oido jonitye i rembo aka kony ongoye pa roombo ma bu jakwath.
English: When he saw the crowds, he had compassion for them, because they were harassed and helpless, like sheep without a shepherd.

Adhola: Ri ameno go owacho ri jofuonjirok pere ni, “Kecho opikere, to jotich ama nok; amomiyo kwayi win Ruoth ma won kecho wodhiri jotich jowokechi ri go.”
English: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful, but the laborers are few;therefore pray earnestly to the Lord of the harvest to send out laborers into his harvest.”

Adhola: Jafuonjirok motire
English: A good teacher

Adhola: Men pa Yesu
English: The power of Jesus

Adhola: county Team ma West Budama, District Commissioner, Bukedi, Community Development Officer, Mbale, kod Education Officer, Bukedi, ma jo yeyere kod wach ma goyo kitawo me i chapa kod wodho woko ri ji
Aketho kitabo me i kompyuta to awiro go ma thin thin.
Oboth-Ofumbi ooro nyikuta ma ‘ng’’ kosa ‘n’g’ to an akethi nyikuta ‘ŋ’ kis ka.
An bende chalo Oboth-Ofumbi rupir anwaŋo nyithindho kweth jokwiya kigana Adhola.
Pecho p’ Oboth-Ofumbi jomiyan yeyirok ‘anyalo medo nyayo kitabo me bende kethi go kompyuta http://mark.risse.com.’
An aja Peace Corps Volunteer mabedo Siwa, gombila Nabuyoga, i oro 2002-2004.
Andiko kitawo me g’atoŋa ma wach aryo i chunyan.
Marapena, akidho rimito ni kis Japadhola oŋey gigipiny machango machon mapiny mawan kod ji mere.

Rupir aneno ni pama ri donjo pa nonini m’omore omore kod ri wan won bende woth tek tek i piny ma wiloka onyo wiyi wan kidho ka wil kod kula gi tim mawan machon ka onyo watemo luwo apa jo wiloka ayino.
Kendo paka ongoye ndiiko moro gye manyutho paka piny me kod tim mere chango nitye.

odoko paka kula ma chon ma yado mondongo kosa jodongo jo tito gine ri nyithindho wach machon othieno dho mach, bende kidho ka ngoye rupir mon ma dongo kod jo dongo ma jo ŋeyo wach no jo kidho ka jo tho jo rumo, aka nyithindho bende ti jo kimiti bedo dho mach i kite no gi winjo wach ma chon, rupir ti nyithindho madit jo nitye yo fuonjirok aka megi jo asa mito kisangala mawoko ayino tek tek.
am’omiyo aparo ni kitawo paka me nyalo konyo wan kuro tim machon ma piny mawan ri ji ma yomalo, fuonjo nyithindho ŋeyo Padhola paka nitye, odoko gi miyo wan medo winjirok gi piny mawan bende.

Mar’aryo, akidho ri chowo tich ma chango baa an Semu K. Ofumbi onwaŋo otemo timo; ma ndiko nyingi nonini ma nitye Padhola gipi kod ma ndiko wach ma mako kwom piny me kod adhum ma iiye wok i bino pa Semei Kakunguru.
Iy’adieri bedi akichombo kwom papilini ma kite no ma chango go onwaŋo ondiko di akibedo kod mito madit i chunyan ma ndiko kitawo me.
To afuoyo go swa ri ndiiko pere m’okonyan tek tek indiko Adech I, Siro 5, kod Adech II, ma kitawo me.
Paka dhopadhola fuod ongoye kod ndiiko mere m’otire miluwo (Standard Orthography), amomiyo wach madit manitye i kitawo me i bino nwaŋo ni ndiiko mere okidho ka wire wire.
To kareno paro paran ma ndiiko paka ja Mawele, kinyal ripo maber kod paro ma ndiiko pa ŋata wok yo Luli kosa yo Woko.
Wey wa kway ni i hongo ma wanonyal yiko iiye kula ma ndiiko (Orthography) mawan ma dhopadhola, teko ma kite me bino rumo.
To aridho ni pokirok ma ndiiko kende kinyal miyin bedo mikiŋeyo gi ma kitawo won luwo kwome
Rupir ongoye kuma achungo iiye maber kwanyo woko andiko paka aparo ni d’obed ameno.

Akwayo kis dhano gye m’onwaŋo ni nitye adech wach moro gye manitye i kitawo me ma go ki yeyere gine, kosa ma go paro ni oŋeyo wach nago maber ye loyo kwom ma an andiko, owach ran indiiko kosa awaŋ g’awaŋ aka nyaka wanyal yiko wach no.
Me bino konyo tek tek i kite matiro gimoro gye m’obed iiye kom moro gi yiko i goch kitawo me ma yomalo (next edition) k’obedi.

Afuoyo tek tek swa ji me ma jo konyan gi tich ma ndiko kitawo me:- Rwotb, Zefaniya Ochieŋ ja Saza ma West Budama m’okonyan tek tek swa gi miyan ryeko mumore ma ndiko kitawo me odoko gi rango yo ma goyo kitawo me i chapa; ma bedi ki go di akinya1o chowo kitawo me maber kendo di konyalo goyirok i chapa.

County Team ma West Budama, District Commissioner, Bukedi, Community Development Officer, Mbale, kod Education Officer, Bukedi, ma jo yeyere kod wach ma goyo kitawo me i chapa kod wodho woko ri ji (printing and publishing).
Rwoth, Emanuel B. Ongoye A.D.C., Bukedi m’okonyan tek tek gi yiko ndiiko (Orthography) kod wach man madit ma kitawo me.
Rwoth, Yona J. Owor, ja Gombi1a ma Mu1anda m’okonyan gi wach madit ma Adech I, ma kitawo me.
Jo dongo ma nonini gye ma jo konyan gi tito ran gigipiny ma nonini pa jo; to paka jo asa more akinyalo kwano nyingijo kis dhano ka, r’ameno akwayo jo chwakan ri wach no.
Rwoth, Saulo Okado ma Mu1anda m’okonyan tek tek i 1953 kod 1954 gi gwecho gali i Padhola gipi tito gigipiny ma nonini.
Rwoth, Isaka Osinde ma Mulanda m’okonyan tek tek gi ndiko Adech III, ma kitawo me.
Rwoth, Japheth M. Onduri, Rwoth, J. M. I. Okeya Kadowa kod Rwoth Daniel Owino ma jo konyan kod goyo papilin (manuscript) ma kitawo me gi type-writer.
Rwoth, Abuneri Y. Ochwo m’okonyan kod yiko papilin (manuscript) ma kitawo me.
Kod Ji man gye ma akinyalo tito nyingi jo gye ka, ma jo konyan kod tich m’opokere opokere ma kitawo me.

Magike, afuyo tek tek jo East African Literature Bureau ri wor ma jo bedo gine magoyo kitawo me i chapa gi lipya pajo kod wodho kitawo me woko (printing and publishing) ma kada onwaŋo dhopadhola ka aa achiel kwom dhodhok ma dongo i Uganda ka ma jo tiyo kwome.
Andiko kitawo me i rapoy pa baa an
ADHOLA KOD OWINY

Were kuma chango miyo Adhola piny me munyo pama ilwoŋo ni PADHOLA kosa BUDAMA ndirino piny me ongoye nono man kada chiel wok jwom Malawa kew gi Kenya tundo kew g’Omwa, kendo wok kew gi Misowa tundo i jwom ma kew gi Wasoga.
Adech madiere me gipi ama Adhola obedo iiye. Nen tipo (map) manyutho Padhola paka nitye.
Ka fuod akitito gima tho kwom Adhola kod Owiny, amito tito i wach manok, nono jii milwoŋo ni Lwo.
Nono jii milwoŋo ni Lwo (kosa Nilotic paka Wasungu chango jo chwoko jo, ni rupir chango jo bedo i thengi jwom milwoŋo ni Nile) ama jo Padhola bende jo donjo iiye.
Nonin Lwo gye gimo miyo oŋey ni chango obedo nono achiel, aa neno ni luwo pajo kod kula pajo chale aka odoko kisukina pajo jo sukina iyadech achiel yo piny Sudan.
Nono Lwo ti jolak i piny mu more wok kuma chango jo sukina iiye, ti jo nwaŋere: Sudan, Ethiopia, Belgian Congo, Uganda, Kenya, kod Tanganyika.

Jo majo nitye i Uganda ame, Alur kod Jo-Naam, yo West Nile; Acoli kod Laŋo yo Northern Province; Jo-Pawiir kosa Jo-pa-Lwo yo Bunyoro (ti jo Bunyoro jo lwoŋo jo ni jo chope); Kumam yo Teso District; kod jo Padhola ma Padhola.
Aka jo manitye Kenya aa jo Lwo kosa jo p’Owiny.

Adhola kod Owiny chango jo bedo jodongo kitipa madwoŋ ma jo pokere wok kwom nono pajo yo Sudan to jo luwo gi Laŋo kod Teso District to jo donjo Bugwere to jo tundo i piny me iyadech ma ti i lwoŋo ni Katandi.
Oro majo tundo iiye ka nyalo bedo i dier 1400 kod 1500.
Kuma jo tundo Katandi to woth pa jo okutho ochungo, rupir ndirino dhako pa Adhola nywol oere gine.
Dhako no parere ni nyalo bedo Nyajurya.
Nitye jwom yo Katandi mandiri munyo Adhola gin jo kalo jwom no to rupir ndirino dhako Nyajurya onyo iye pek tek tek konyalo choro maber to jwom no mayo go chip munwaŋo otweyo i piere.
Jwom no ti chwoko ni Nyachip ma kir pama fuod i lwoŋo ameno.
Kuma jo tieko kalo jwom, Nyajurya kodoko nyalo woth to bedo i tiendi yath karen ooli aola swa to yue to wacho ni, “Aaa nyath ma iyan onyo peka peka pa Polo, aki nyal woth kendo.”
Tieko hongo manok to nywol nyathi ma nyiyach ti chwoko nyinge ni Nyapolo (nen Adech II, Siro 16).
Wok Katandi to kitipa p’Adhola kod kitipa p’Owiny to jo pokere.
Owiny to kadho ga pere kir yo Kenya iyadech ma Nyanza Province, to Adhola doŋ g’apere ka.
Gi mo kelo pokirok me won kiŋeyere maber, jo man jo paro ni ndirino Adhola nitye kod adhoola madwoŋ i tiende amumiyo ochwok kir nyinge ni Adhola, aka amumiyo konyalo woth to Owiny kadho yombo.
Jo man jo paro ni chango Adhola kod Owiny jo dhaw tek tek ni munyo nyar Adhola omwonyo tiko p’Owiny, to jo pokore kajo lworo ni jo kir jo nekere nono ri dhaw
To aparo ni nywol pa chipa Adhola amukelo pokirok.

Rupir chalo kuma dhako no kodoko nyalo woth riwach maminyur aka chalo Owiny komito kuro hongo malach to wacho ri Adhola ni “Aa Omera kur, ka dhako me meni odoko odwoko kwome aka winoluw wan, to onyo ama wey wakutho wawotho ye moth moth, tundo kuma winomak iye wan.”
Wok ndirino to jo rwenyo kichutho ri kitipa pa Adhola.
To Adhola bende kuma oneno ni piny me ber rigo kodokochandere gi luwo Owiny, to bedo ka kichutho.
LWENY PA JO PADHOLA
Indir ma Adhola donjo i piny me onwaŋo ngoye ji man to rumachien ma oro chiegin mia aryo tundo mia adek, nono meg to chako bino gi kwinyo jo to gime kelo lweny.
Mono meg me paka jo Sewe ndirino jo wok yo thenge ma jwom Malawa yo Kenya, aka nono meg jo wok yo telin ma Misowa.
Bedo pa lweny me rumachien tek tek ama, bende nyutho ni chango onwaŋo piny me ongoye ji man.
Bedi ka ameno di Adhola gin jo konyalo bedo iiye majo kokutho jo lwenyo; kendo di Owiny gin di jo konyalo woth tundo yo Kenya korogye mako lweny gijo gineko jo iyo.
Lweny ma dongo chango obedo awichiel ama:
lweny kod jo Sewe
lweny kod jo Misowa
lweny pa Wakoli yo Busoga
lweny kod jo Ngaya
lweny go Omwa
kod lweny pa Kakunguru ama gike, to lweny me abino tito kwome i Siro 5.
Jo Sewe me jo nyalo bedo jo Masai mandirino jo wotho wok yo Kenya ka jo kwayo dhok pajo odoko ka jo mito mayo ji gigipiny pa jo.
I woth pajo me ama jo chombo iye i piny me. Obedo wor achiel to jo tundo yo Matindi to jo chako neko ji munwaŋo jo nitye kenyo.
Aka jino madit mere onwaŋo obedo nono jo Ramogi, amumiyo jo Ramogi jo wero kir pama ni “Sewe oneko yach ma Matindi kada g’operenje.”
Sewe jowaŋo udi to jo neko ji madit kareno jo lwenyo g’asere kod tonge, to jo ay jo ringo.
Lweny me obwoka bwoka jo Padhola amumiyo jo konyalo yikirok gi lweny maber wori no.
To wok indirino to jo Padhola jo chako yikirok ri lweny, jo kunyo wugo kweth mabin jo kano iye mon kod nyithindho ka lweny otundo.
Wugo me yado kis nono kunyo apa jo.
To bin ka jo Sewe jo mwonjo jo i dye wor (jo Sewe yado jo kimit lweny odiochieŋ jo liwo jo wor ayino), to jo podho i buche me mu thoko udi, to jo Padhola jo bino nwoyo jo anwoya gi kenyo.
Kendo jo kunyo buche man thoko gine udi pajo.
Lweny pa jo Sewe ochando jo Padhola swa rupir ndirino nyaka jo chako lweny, aka fuod jo kotegino maber.
To ndir man ka jo bino odiochieŋ ji gye jo donjo i wugo, to jo Sewe jo ngoye gi ji ma jo neki to jo waŋo udi to jo dok.
To kada ameno, ri rieko ma kunyo buche thoko udi jo nyalo neko jo Sewe Maditi mere, aka nyaka manok mudoŋ ti riemo riema jo kalo jwom Malawa, ti mayo jo kir dhok pajo.
Wok ndirino jo Sewe jo kodok jo dwoko lweny.
Jo Misowa me a Wagisu.
Lweny me obedo ni jo Misowa ama jo pen kwinyo jo Padhola to jo Padhola, rupir jo Sewe ndirino jo tieko fuonjo jo lweny to jo neko jo Misowa to jo riemo jo kir witelin ma yopiny pajo.
Rumachien jo Padhola bende jo mito ni jo kidhi kwinyo jo Misowa yo witelin pajo koro.
To kada jo Misowa ndirino jo nyapi gi lweny, jo Padhola ri wach ma jo kuya gine idho got gi woth iye jo ko nyalo lweny maber gi limo gigipiny munwaŋo jo kidho rigo paka chiemo, dhoki kod nyir.
Ri ameno to jo Padhola jo dhiro rijo Misowa wach ni jomak mere mungoye odoko lweny rupir jo dhiero jo turo jo.
Jo temoye kadi kweth to jo dhiere.
Jo Misowa bende jo yeyere gi wach me; to jo yiko romo ika bedo achiel giparo kwom gigipiny mu nwaŋo ramo jo thenge korin gi korin.
I romo me jo Padhola kod jo Misowa gye jo tweyo kit chiemo gi riŋo to jo bino gine, to jo tedo to jo chiemo kanya achiel to jo mako mere kichutho.
Wok ndirino to jo Padhola jo chwoko ka bedo ma piny pajo machango jo romo iye gi jo Misowa, ni Mere-kit makir pama i lwoŋo ameno.
Kareno jo wacho ni kenyo amuwok iye mere ma chale kod kit chiemo mandirino jo tero.
Indir ma jo Padhola jo tieko lwenyo lweny aryo madongo apa jo Sewe kod apa jo Misowa, to nyingi jo chako winjirok kir wiloka man.
To rwooth achiel ma Busoga chiegin ikew kod jo Padhola, mi lwoŋo ni Wakoli to lwoŋo jo Padhola konyo go gi lweny gi Baganda (Jomagara) mu nwaŋo jo mwonjo go lweny gine i piny pere.
Jo Padhola bende jo kokwero rupir Wakoli owacho miyo jo nyir, chiemo kod ŋaŋo man mathindho thindho mandirino ongoye yo Padhola.
To jo Padhola jo dwoko i piny pajo gi kemba ma Wakoli omiyo jo.
Kuma jo Padhola jo tundo, to jo lwenyo swa ri Wasoga to jo turo Jomagere ma ndirino jo Padhola jo chwoko jo ni jo Ngaya, to jo riemo jo wok i piny pa Wakoli.
Wok ndir ma jo Padhola jo konyo iye Wakoli, jo Ngaya jo mako rijo nge madwoŋ swa, to jo mito bino chulo kwor bothi jo, ni rupir ama jo miyo Wakoli oturo jo.
To hongo kadho moro to jo Ngaya jo bino mwonjo jo Padhola.
Kutho jo Ngaya jo neko jo Padhola madit kod waŋo udi rupir jo liwo aliwa jo.
Wok ndirino to jo Ngaya jokodok jo dwoko kwinyo jo Padhola.
To jo chwoko jo Padhola ni Badama, ka jo kwanyo kwom wach machango jo Padhola jo wacho rijo ni “Widoma”.
Kir jwom mu lweny iiye ti lwoŋo ni Wadama.
To kende jo Ngaya majo ringo, ama jo kowo ri Kakunguru miseni pajo Padhola kod paka joturo jo; amumiyo Kakunguru bende obino rumachien chulo kwor mere (nen Siro 5).

To munyo Padhola gye jowinjo ni jo Ngaya jo bino lweny to jo kidho rijo kuma onwaŋo jo yuomere iye, kajo wacho ni, “Wirooko!  Wirooko!  Widooma!  Widooma konon!” to jo chako neko jo Ngaya pa nyithindho winyini dho jwom ma pama i lwoŋo ni Wadama.
Nen tipo (map) ma Padhola.
Gi mumiyo jo Padhola turo jo Ngaya ma piyo piyo, rupir ndirino jo Ngaya jo lwenyo gi tonge madongo kod kwoot mathindho thindho, aka tonge no ripek mere dhano chore achora chiegin aka chwowo gimoro.
To jo Padhola ndirino tonge pa jo mathindho aka jo bola bola gi bor to chwowo gimoro kada kochore ka bothe chiegin, aka kwoot pajo ndirino dongo ma geŋo jo maber.
Banyole ama chango jo Padhola jo chwoko ni Omwa.
Jo me ajoger pa jo Padhola machon kendo lweny kod jo yado bedo chiegin kis dwe kareno jo gye jo mwonjere amwonja.
Lweny me chango oasa lwenyirok yo kew yo thenge ma Buwesa, ma jo Padhola jo lwoŋo ni Wesa, yo Senda kod yo Paya.
Kareno gima dwoŋ chango jo Padhola jo mito mayo jo chiemo pajo, rupir jo Padhola i hongo ma yochien munyo jo ŋiyo gi lweny tek tek jo kodok jo bedo jo fur madongo.
Yado ka jo Padhola jo neno ni dwe opor aka chingi dwe marachuch amuŋiyo malo to jo kidho mwonjo Omwa ni rupir ndirino silwany apa jo.
To ka dwe opor ma chinge maracham amutiŋere malo meno iwacho ni otiŋo chingi Omwa malo ko mwonji jo kosa kajo amajo mwonjo jo Padhola, jo amajo turo lweny no.
Lweny ma kite me otero hongo ma lach swa to kelo kwoor ma dwoŋ tek tek bothi jo Padhola kod Banyole.
To wok ibino pa Kakunguru chiegin yo oro 1890, lweny me kodok obedo kada dichiel.
Tundo pama, mere odoko dwoko bothi jo munyo jo nywomere kir gi nywomirok mungoye dhaw moro gye.
OGUTI LOKERE JA PADHOLA
Ndir munyo Oguti oneno ni lim pere dit, aka iyadech ma Pokoŋo onyo diny rigo to kwayo jo dongo pere ti yeyogo chorirok yo Tororo kuma chango nitye jonono Bendo pere man madit.
Oguti chango obedo dhano munywol go yo thenge ma Kachumbala i Teso District; aka yo koro bende ama go owok iye aka owotho to donjo i Padhola.
Ja Bendo milwoŋo ni Milwen omunwaŋo Ogut i ger dhoki wor wor to dimo go to tero go pecho pere, to ketho go i oti padhako pere milwoŋo ni min Owaro.
Ndirino Oguti onwaŋo fuod nyiyach muripo ripo.  Gime otimere yo Nagongera iyadech ma Pokoŋo.
Munyo onen ni Oguti nyath maber, ryeki aka odoko nitye kod men, to jo dongo jo chokere to jo penjo go kole ka mito lokirok ja Padhola kosa onyo mito dok yo thugin.
Gimo oriemo Oguti yo thugin won kiŋeyere, to ginago ripo bedo gimadwoŋ swa mumiyo go okun kichutho wok bothi wade pere.
Wok ndirino to lokere nyath ma pecho kendo ma ja Padhola, to chako lwoŋo Owaro ni Omini aka Milweni kod mini Owaro to jo bedo baa mere kod mini.

To go kwero ni kinyal odoko dok wok paka chango jo thugin jotieko riemo go.  Ri ameno titero Oguti i migam to kwoŋere iye ka wacho ni otieko lokirok ja Padhola kichutho, ti lamo go imigam no, ti gwero go kod yen malweny.
Milweni to nywomo ri Oguti mon adek: Abotha meno obedo nyaja Ramogi, kod Nyagoli gi Nyakuya nyir Morwa Sule.
Jo Padhola to jo mito Oguti swa riwach ma men pere yo lweny, mayado go asa lwenyo gi men pere gye
Kendo ri kiyaka mayado iyaka gigipiny yo lweny, Oguti bende chango oyaka dhok madit yo lweny to kelo rigo ŋaŋo gi medo nywomo mon madit swa.
Rumachien munyo Oguti oŋaŋ to kwayo jo nono pere ni oyey go lwoŋo ye jo thugin man bende jo obin jo bed gine i Padhola.
Ti yeyere gine to kelo jo thugin man to jono bende jo lokere jo Padhola ma nono jo pa Bendo. .
Ji me bende to jo Padhola yeyere gijo bedo, ti chwoko nyingi jo ni Omia rupir chango jo wok yo thenge ma Kenya milwoŋo ni Mumias.
To Oguti iloko go bedo ja dwoŋ pajo, kareno imito ni go amunyuth ji me kula kod tim ma Padhola.
Ji me bende to jo lokere jo Padhola kichutho, to jo chako nywomo nyir jo Padhola gi donjo i nonin ma Padhola mu pokere opokere.
Me achako bino pa ji mawok yo District ma Teso donjo i Padhola
Ka, amunyo ji man majo wok thenge ma Kenya aka jo winjereye dhodhok kod ji ma chango Oguti oomo jo yo Teso, bende to jo chako bino pere pa jagin pere.
nen Siro 5
Ri ŋeyirok machango Oguti oŋeyere iye yo lweny, munyo Kakunguru otieko turo piny me aka onyo iketho rwodhe Oguti bende timiyo bedo rwoth .
To tho i oro 1912.
Ri kayo chinge machango wode okayo.
Majanga chango baa mere i lwoŋo ni Kinara ja Nyapolo Ogule
To rupir chango baa mere otii aka ja chandi, omin baa mere mi lwoŋo ni Akure amunywomo rigo; kareno kutho Majanga odongo pere kakwayo rigo dhoki aka omito go swa pa nyath pere won
To wok chon chango Majanga oneno paka nitye kod gi moro iwiye pa jwok, ma kowacho ni gi moro ya timere to gino timere atima ameno
Obedo ndir moro kuma jo kidho dwar, Majanga owacho ni nyawoti gin achiel Nyielo ya neko
Wadi jo ko yeyo; to rigiraura madwoŋ ka ni kidho poyo, Nyielo to neko ŋato
Odoko ruman owacho ri ji ni nitye ogwaŋ Kwach neko nyako moro ka moro, ka ni kidho kenyo onwaŋ nyako no otieko kir tho
I lweny bende yado kowacho ni kidh win kumanyo, ko kidh thenge no tituro lweny, to kowacho ni kononi kada wikidho i bino turo win, apaka bende bedo
Ri ameno to ji gye chako lworo Majanga gi miyogo dwoŋ gi winjo wach pere
I wacho ni nitye ndir ma Majanga orwenyo makinen tieko ndelo maromo abiriyo
To munyo onwaŋ, ti penjo kumago owok iye, to kwero wacho rijo kwanyo woko ni kajo kelo rigo koŋo kod wot gwendi
Kumo okel gigipiny me totero jo yo lul Tewo (Nyakiriga) towacho rijo ni me atele ma kabedo manyien pa Bura
Yado chon onwaŋo
Bura bedo i tele man yo Nyawiyoga
To chowo Bura gikenyo; to wok ndirino to Majanga bedo ja tel ma chowo Bura
Paka ichowo Bura nen Adech III, Siro 2
Majanga to limo dwoŋ madit ri kwom gigipiny me gye
Kendo chango obedo ja lweny mamisen swa, ama bin telo kir ji yo lweny
Kir Akisili gye (nen Adech III, Siro 8), to bedo jatel mere
Ndiri ma Kakunguru donjo i piny me gi turo, onwa?o Majanga onyo obedo jadwoŋ m'oti
To kada ameno otemo wacho ri jii ni joyikere ri lweny no; to rupir jo nicha chango jo lwenyo gi mundu amumiyo otur jo ma piyo piyo
Rumachien pa bino pa Kakunguru, Majanga obedo hongo manok to tho i oro chiegin 1905
SIRO 5
PADHOLA KOD ADHUM 1890-1958
Wok chuka tur lweny pa jo Ngaya jo Magere jo dok jo ko bino lweny kod jo Padhola
To rumachien ma oro kweth to wach winjere ni nitye kweth mudoko bino, aka jonago jo lwenyo gi gimaneko aneka dhano gi bor aka Odoko mor swa, ni jonago jowok yothenge ma Misowa kod Bugwere
Me abino pa Semei Kakunguru
Go aja Waganda machango owotho gi wadi aka jo turo piny ma Eastern Province ri adhum pa jo makwar; ndirino jo lwenyo kod mundu
Jo donjo i piny me chiegin i oro 1890, to jo Padhola jo Chwoko jo ni Magere
Jo Padhola ma chuka chiene onwaŋo fuod ko tur jo i lweny moro gye, rume ama otur atura jo kichutho
To jo chako kwoŋirok kod lweny gi Magere majo lwenyo kod mach!  Ndirino ja lweny machon madwoŋ, Majanga, onwaŋo fuod nitye to kareno go otii tek tek
Munyo Kakunguru otieko turo Padhola to chako ketho adhum makite ma yo pajo yo Buganda, kareno yiko yo ri adhum pa Bungereza (British)
To ketho jali milwoŋo ni Eria Nsubuga telo adhum maPadhola; ndirino i lwoŋo go ni Agent ma Padhola, to Kakunguru won dok yo Mbale
Eria open tiyirok kod jo dongo Bura, jodongo Akisili kod jo dongo machango jo telo lweny, ama go okutho omiyo jo bedo jo radhum pere
Oloo Majanga mu bedo wod pa ŋata chango oŋeyere tek tek i gigipiny me gye, ti miyo go bedo paka ja Saza, matero rwodhe wad gye

To Gombolin mere ti ketho ji me: Okech Okeya, Mulanda; Oloo Otaba, Nyawiyoga; Oguti, Tororo aka munyo otho to Samwiri Dinga lunjo, rwoth pere; Palinyaŋ Merikiti kod Molo, aka munyo onek go to Makode lunjo ka pere; Oluli; omin Palinyaŋ Kidoko, aka munyo otho tiketho ja Mugwere mi lwoŋo ni Mulyambuzi; Kayinja Majanga, Nagongera, kodi Kirewa; kod Owondo, Kwapa
Jome ama jo bedo rwodhe marapena, to rumachien odoko okidhi ki baro dier Gombilin 1oko mathindo thindho ti medo ketho rwodhe man
Kendo kis rwoth me yado tiyo kod jo magere ma jo konyo go
Eria Nsubuga won kod Oloo Majanga ndiri no jo bedo Nagongera, amubedo, tindi maradhum madwoŋ

To, Oloo Majanga konyalo tiyirok kod Eria, ka wacho ni, "Wendo awenda kinyal dhuman, kosa oran ni maki ŋatin mungoye wach ma ŋato otimo; ni kole ka ja Magara no mito chiemo owach adhir rigo chiemo to ma kiwene dhuman pa jago pere!"
Oloo chango ger, aka komito kite adhum manyien me ma magere jo kelo
Omito ni ji pere jo obedi i siem manya chon, ma medho amedha kod kisangala
Ri ameno to magere jo riemo go iyadhum
To munyo oriem Oloo, to piny gye jo kwero winjo adhum, ri ameno ti mako go tikidho i tweyo go Jinja
Koro amudwoko iye to bedo nyaka math to tho
Ndiri munyo oriem Oloo Majanga, onwaŋo Eria paro ketho Okech Okeya lunjo ka bedo no
To jo Nyapolo jo ko yeyo, kajo wacho ni dwoŋ no apa jo kiripi nono man odoko obed iiye
To odoko Eria onwaŋo paro ketho ja pa Bendo mandirino ja Gombila ma Nagongera ma magere ndirino jo chwoko nyinge ni Sabakaki
To gimo mieno go, to ere mito nyako ma nyamin Oloo Majanga milwoo ni Nyaruwa, munwaŋo fuonjere pa Perikeki ndir munyo nyaka jo tundo Nagongera kumanitye
Mission pama
Jo Nyapolo to jo osa go both Eria, titweyo go yo lweny, to tho gi yo Kisumu i oro 1917
To wok ndirino kodok oketh ja Saza, to bin Eria won bedo paka Agent ma Padhola aka odoko bedo paka ja Saza mere
Aka bin rwodhe jo Gombila i dimo jo tich paka ja Saza mathumo banjin dwe achiele chiele
I oro 1927, Eria okwayo ywomirok wok i tich maradhum; ndirino Wasungu weg jo tieko nia? ipiny me
To kidho i oti pere machango ogeto Bira, rumachien to tuki i oti pere man yo Mulanda
Kenyo amu wok iye to dok yo piny pajo yo Pamagara i oro February 1952
To tho i oro 25 May 1956; kareno go ja oro 99
Munyo Eriya oweyo tich to ja Magara man mi lwoŋo ni Mikairi Kiwanuka to bino lunjo ka bedo pere yo Nagongera paka Agent ma Padhola ioro 1928
Ndiri munyo oketh Eria Nsubuga bedo Agent ma Padhola Rasito Mayanja bende oketh bedo Agent ma Bunyole, aka Mikairi Kiwanuka Agent ma Samia
To munyo okowi Kiwanuka yo Padhola to Ali Afende Awor to lunjo kabedo pere paka Agent ma Samia
Wok i oro 1929-1930, jo dongo Adhum jo paro wiro tindi mar'adhum kwanyo Nagongera tero Robongi mu par ni adier piny, to rumachien ti dok i geto Kisoko ayino
To Kiwanuka bedo ja dwoŋ adhum marapena bedo i tindi mar'adhum ma Kisoko
Wok i oro chiegin 1925 jo Padhola joneno ni jo oli dhumirok gi jowiloka paka Agent
To jo chako kwayo gavumenti ni omiy jo ja Saza ma ja Padhola won

To gavumenti paka tero gimoro moth, jo liŋa aliŋa gi ywak me tundo 14 September, 1936, ma Bwana District Commissioner, Budama, mandirino bedo Tororo ochoko jo Padhola to wacho rijo ni onyo pama joyeyere dimo dhano pajo won obedi ja Saza kandelo 23 September 1936
To teko mudoko bino ame, riwach ma pa ŋata odim tero Saza:
Wooro pa rwodhe makis ja Gombila mito ni go ama wodim bedo ja Saza, to jo kelo nyuowo wiy ji
Ji machango jo Padhola oyeyo jo bedo i Padhola paka wendo pajo, majo chwoko jo ni Omia (nen Siro 3), to jo bende jo chako piem ni dhano pajo amaripo tero Saza ma Padhola
Aka teko ma pokirok dini, to bende donjo iiye
To gavumenti paro tek tek i kite ma turo teko me gye; ri ameno to idimo dhano ma kanywola ma Padhola to kareno otieko bedo i Padhola hongo malach wok thino pere gye aa, Samwiri Dinga
To onwaŋo i ketho go bedo ja Saza ma Padhola i oro 1938
To jo Padhola jo koyeyere gine, kiri ndir munyo Provincial Commissioner ma Eastern Province obino Kisoko bino ketho Dinga i kom jo goyo motoka pano pajo kedho woko
Wok i hongo no to wach me chungo
Ri ameno to gavumenti, baro adhum ma Padhola diryo, thenge man ti lwoŋo ni West Budama tiketho Andereya Obeli wod pa Majanga bedo ja Saza
Aka thenge man, ti lwoŋo ni East Budama tiketho Daudi Kakunguru bedo ja Saza mere
Gigipiny me otimere ka 23 November 1938
To jo Padhola jo guti swa riwach ma baro adhumi pajo, gi thenge man miyo wendo pajo tero Saza mere
Ri ameno ka 17 December 1938, to jo oro jomikwenda pajo kidho nenirok kod Chief Secretary, yo Entebbe, ka jo piemo ri wach me

Ndir ma lweny ma 1939-1945, otundo gavumenti owiro adhumbe manitye iyadech mathurin: 1941 onwaŋ District machango i lwo?o ni Budama District, kareno tindi mere bedo Tororo, tiriwo kod Central District machango wok i oro 1937 oriwo Bugwere District kod Bugisu District; ti lwo?o jo ni Mbale District aka tindi mere to bedo Mbale
Ti lwo?o Tororo ni Tororo Division; amanyo tero Budama kod Samia, aka rwoth matero jo gye tiketho Andereya Obeli
Eria Ochieno to bedo ŋata luwo Andereya Obeli paka Deputy
Bugwere kod Bunyole ti lwoŋoni Bugwere Division; aka rwoth matero jo gye tiketho Ezekeri Kageni
Aka Danieri Mutaki ama luwo Ezekeri Kageni paka Deputy
Ti turo jo Sazin gye munwaŋo jo nitye i Tororo Division kod Bugwere Division, tiweyo jo Gombilin kod jo dongo me kende
Pok adhum me okidho maber tundo i oro 1944, ama nywowirok madit dit odonjo iiye
To wok iiye chani man manyien
I oro 1944, Andereya Obeli ma Tororo Division to tich pere chungo; tiketho Eria Ochieno ikabedo pere aka Semei Obonyo bedo Deputy
I oro no won 1944, Ezekeri Kageni ma Bugwere Division to tich pere chungo; tiketho Danieri Mutaki i kabedo pere aka Paulo Sisye bedo Deputy
To i oro 1947, wach ma Sazin to odoko dwako
Yo Samia tiketho ja Saza pajo marapena Samisoni Were mariwo Samia kod Bugwe, mu chwoki nyinge ni Samia-Bugwe

Ka 3 January 1947 to doko i poko adhum ma Padhola diryo West Budama tiketho Andereya Ofumbi bedo ja Saza mere, kod East Budama tiketho Temusewo Mukasa bedo ja Saza mere, to kareno kezekiya Okowu amukutho kuro kabedo no paa Acting
Saza ma West Budama Andereya Ofumbi odhumo tundo 30 May 1953, to tho, munyo fuod dhumo
Ka 13 October 1953 tiketho Zefaniya Ochieŋ bedo ja Saza, ama fuod dhumo kiri pama
Yo Saza ma East Budama, mati i lwoŋo ni Tororo ka 1 January 1949 tiketho Danieri Nyapidi lunjo ka bedo pa Temusewo Mukasa
To munyo owir Danieri Nyapidi ka 1 January 1954 bedo ja Saza ma Samia-Bugwe ti wiro Yakobo Munabi lunjo ka bedo pere

To munyo owir Yakobo Munabi tero go yo Saza ma Budaka-Bugwere kareno Danieri Nyapidi bende ti loko go bedo Deputy Judge ma District Native Court Bukedi, tidimo John Kakoro bedo ja Saza ka 1 January 1956
Rumachien to John Kakoro tich pere chungo, tidimo Yonasani Okello bedo ja Saza malunjo ka bedo pa John Kakoro, ka 1 July 1957

District machango oriwi i oro 1941, ti chwoko ni Mbale District, odoko opok kadi dek ka ndelo 4 November 1954; thenge man tilwoŋo ni Bukedi District matero Sazin awichiel; Pallisa, Budaka-Bugwere, Bunyole, West-Budama, Tororo kod Samia-Bugwe; tiketho Mr Dallimore bedo District Commissioner mere
Thenge man ti lwoŋo ni Bugisu District, matero Bugisu gipi kod Sebei, aka Sazin aŋwen manitye iye; tiketho Mr Lindsell bedo District Commissioner mere
Aka adech matero tindi ma Mbale kende ti lwoŋo ni Mbale Township District ti ketho Mr  Lukyn-Williams bedo District Commissioner mere
Gimokelo poko tindi ma Mbale bedo paka District mu pokere ka kende aa rupir obedo piem i dier Bukedi kod Bugisu, kareno kis ŋata achiel kwom jo mitoni tindi ma Mbale odoki yo District pajo ayino
Ri ameno to gavumenti thwono jo gye to loko tindi Mbale bedo District machowere ka kende
MAPO
ADECH II
WACH MATITO ADECH MARARYO
Adhola paka atito iy'adech marapena, chango owotho kod ji pere
Ji me meg chango nyithindho pere won monywolo, meg wutiminigo meg wade pere; to kareno jogye jo lwoŋo Adhola ni baa jo
Rupir go amubedo jadwoŋ pajo kendo ja tel pajo
I ji me amowok iye nonini gye manitye Padhola pama
Amumiyo kisi nono no bende lwoŋo Adhola ni baa jo
Parere ni ikitipa pa Adhola chango nitye mon aryo madongo, Nyajura kod Oryaŋ
Mon me jo nyalo bedo ni chango jo bedo mon pa Adhola won, amumiyo nyingi jo oasa wok malo bende loyo mon wadi jo machango jonitye ikitipa no
Kiri pama nono meg paka Amor p'Olam, Amor Patikidiegi kod Amor Mugulu-Kasede, jopako nyingi mon me kajowacho ni, "Won piny Nyajurya kod Oryaŋ"
To kiyot ŋeyo ni ji ma mon me jonywolo won ajomene
I Padhola pama nitye nonini pyero aryo kod aryo madongo
Nitye nonini meg mathindho thindho mafuod kiŋeyere maber
Manyutho ni jobedo jangi nonini man madongo aka jopokere kwomijo ihongo mafuod kokadho malach
Giranena, paka nonini me: Lemera, Nyangwe, Wi-kenge kod Wi-lego
To kareno inonini madongo no nitye paka nono Amor kod wad man odoko jopokere kinde mumore to doko jo chako nywomirok kada chango onwaŋo jo nono achiel kende
Gima chango kelo pokirok me obedo ama:
Marapena, dhaw kod akwedi, me chango wok kwom poriŋiŋo kosa lee munyo ko nek, kipoko to kirom ka pecho kosa nono lach
Amawok iye oti man jochako thwono jowotigin riŋo kajowacho ni "Wajo pa ŋadin riwan lokere wanono giwin mawayaŋere riŋo?"
Ri ameno jomo thwonijo to jo mako nge to jo dhaw kajo wacho ni, "Aneni win jopaŋadin paka jodak wan aka onyo jo kwedo wan riwach riŋo ariŋa, onyo wok pama apee!  Wapokere apoka swa, wakinono gi jo
Wangi bende kawaneko mawan wakiyaŋere gi jo de be!"
Mararyo, kwor, me chango wok ka oti man jo kwinyo aka joneko ji manono man
Rupir chango manyachon ka nono man oneko dhano ma nono man, jowegi dhano monekino bende jobino to jo liwo dhano manono no kada ka moro to jo neko; meno achulo kwor

Ra'meno konyo oti makoneko dhano no, kajo winjo ni joweg dhano jo liwo jo machulo kwor, to jo chako kwedirok kajo wacho ni, "Athu denge wikiri wichul kwor bothi wan ayino, kidha kidha win yo paŋadin won majo neko dhano mewin, ŋey win ni wakinono gi jono de be, wajo paŋadin riwan!"
Me agigipiny madongo aryo machango asa poko nono ma kada onwaŋo obedo achiel to poko jange mumore to jo chako kir nywomirok
Chango chon kis oti manono bedo kod jadwoŋ mere maneno gigi piny matimere i oti no
To kareno jadwoŋ ma oti man kidhum jadwoŋ ma oti man; kosa dhumo nono no gipi
Jodongo ma kite me amayido jo choko ji pajo kosa jotito riji pajo ka lweny kosa dwar obino
To indir ma Magere jo donjo to jo chako dhumo Padhola (nen Adech I, Siro 5)
Jotito riwan paka yo pajo koro kis nono nitye kod jadwoŋ mere kosa ja tel matero nono gipi
Ra' meno to wabende wachako ketho jo dongo manono gipi ikabedo ma ketho jodongo udi kende paka nyachoni
Paka Jopadhola jo kimit mako kula pa joman majowiloka piyopiyo mafuod jo kokaŋasa kulano maber, bende jokorikin dimo jodongo nonini mapiyopiyo
To wok oro 1935 nonini madit jo chako ketho jodongo makite no

Aka nonini meg mudoŋ jo asa chako ketho jodongo pajo i oro 1945, indir ma gavumenti okwayo ni kis nono odhir jadwoŋ mere kidho i chokirok ma kansolo mar'adhum; kiri pama gavumenti fuod yeyere kod tich pa jodongo nonini
Indir me, kis nono nitye kod jadwoŋ mere matero nono gipi meno ti jolwoŋo ni Jasaza ma nono aka nitye ma jolwoŋo ni Jagombila, Jamiluka kod Jakisoko mabende jokidho kajotero adech mathindho thindho
Ka Jadwoŋ nono otho kosa nono oryiemo go bedo jadwoŋ, nono chokere to odoko jo dimo ŋatiman
Kis Jadwoŋ nono nitye gi jandiiko kodi jakan lipya manono; ma nono dimo jo ni jokonyigo gitich
Aka nitye bitawin bende ma Jadwoŋ nono kano, manono jondiiko iiye gigipiny majoparo kwome ka jochokere
Tich ma jodongo nono jotimo nitye ama:

Riwo nono kanyachiel: Jadwŋ nono choko ji to jo paro wach paka jonyalo riwirok kanyachielod ŋeyirok wegi gi wegi rupir mati me nono oasa pokirok pokirok iyadech mumore omore, riwirok makite me konyo igeŋo ji nywomirok wati kendo miyo nono ŋeyo welo pajo kod ŋeyo ji pajo majo tho
Kony kadhano pajo otho: Ka dhano otho nono kosa wati paŋato kod merin pere gye, choko pesa kosa lim man gye mayii ŋato
Kendo kaŋata otho obedo jachwo majapecho, nono chokere to jo yiko pecho majalo oweyo
Joketho misika pa ŋato, to ka misika no fuod thi jo dimo ŋata nyalo kuro pecho no milwoŋo ni Japith, makuro tundo kuma misika odongi iiye
Jo chulo banjini munwaŋo ŋato nitye gine wok kwom pesa makaliel kosa gigipinyi pa ŋato, kendo jo pido banjin munwaŋo ŋato banja ji
Jodimo ŋata olunji dhako kosa mon pa ŋato, ka dhako no kosa mon no bende jo yeyere gi jo
To madwoŋ, jo temo tito swa gikikaŋasa gimo neko dhano pa jo
Thumo banjin banjin ma dudi ma nono, banjin mamako kwom pecho ma nitye iye dhaw dhaw kod kwerirok degi,  banjin ma pa jomo nywomere wat
Joma kite me jo chulo dhiaŋ kod rombo ma luk; ruman odoko jo chulo kir lipya bende, gigipiny mi chulo no nono amachamo
Banjin ma kite me ilwoŋo ni banjin, malusa
Kod banjin moro gye minyalo tero iwaŋ jadwoŋ nono, rupir nitye banjin makikuthi chak ikooti ma gavumenti kwanyo woko koluwo ikooti ma nono
Paro kwom gigipiny makis ndelo, mamitere inono, paka: ketho chik manono, paro paka jonyalo dongo nono ikite machoko lipya paka mafwonjo gine nyithindho majochand, i nono pajo
Nono meg jotyeko paro geto udi miten ma nono, fur famba manono kod oro kis janono bedo kod chiemo maromo mungoye kisaka asaka kis ndelo
Konyo dhano pajo kopodho iteko moro paka ma twech aka ongoye gilipya ma chulo, kiti ŋato nono choko rigo lipya tojogonyo go
Paka gigipiny makite me nyaka chako moth moth, fuod derino mere kidwoŋ
Aka odoko nono meg amo ayi iiye malo loyo meg
To parere ni tundo yomalo koro gigipiny me bino dongo malo swa rupir kis dhano mito kendo sangala ritim maber manono pere timo
NONO JO P'AGOYA
Agoya chango obedo wod Adhola, aka go no am'onywolo nono me munyo lwoŋere ni jo p'Agoya
Agoya chango onywolo nyath achiel kende manyiyach milwoŋo ni Nyakigulu
Aka Nyakigulu me gi dhako pere milwoŋo ni Abwor amajo nywolo yach aŋwen, Juri, Okidi, Mbedi kod Ondaga
Yach me amabende jonywolo nono me paka onyo nitye
Jo p'Agoya jo dit iyadech milwoŋo ni Pagoya chiegin Nagongera, kodi yoloka pagoya man yo Kamuli, i Gombila ma Molo
Nyingijo madongo, mati jo chwokere gine ame:
Agoya,	Okidi,	Ondaga,	Ochomi,	Osuya,
Nyakawenga, Juri, Wiye Owaŋ, Oriŋo, Mbedi, Odida
Nono me ongoye kod kweer moro gye, yawo rut, kod paka minyur pa jo wok, kod kula manywomirok machon gye jotimo paka jo Padhola gye jotimo (nen Adech III)
ŋanda wambwe jo p'Agoya nyaka dwoko
Wer me jowero ka jo nyutho ni kada nende jo nok, chango jo konyalo tho jo gye i lweny, ni yado kajokidho lweny jo gye jo dwoko riwach misen pajo
Jo p'Agoya mamako mon yokulo
Wer aryo me gye yado jo wero yo lweny kod yo dwar
To indir mati me jo wero iyawo rut kosa ikalima morogye kod ikaliel pa dhano pajo
Tich ma yado jo asa ŋeyirok iiye: lweny kod goyo fumbo ma kosio
KUNU pajo nitye yo Senda ilul milwo?o ni Pawamunju
Yikirok pajo joyikere wiyijo ŋiyo yo thenge ma yo Sudan
Aka Jadwoŋ nono pajo marapena jodimo i Apuli 1945
NONO AMOR
Nono Amor kada ti jo pokere kad bich aka odoko jo nywomere, chango jo gye baa jo achiel kende
Aka kada jo pokere, fuod nitye wer, kweer, kod nyingi jo madit muriwojo
Nywolirok pa nono me obedo ama (boli mucher me nyutho paka nywolirok me obedo wok kwom Adhola tundo, kwom kis jang nono Amor):
Pokirok manitye pama obedo riwach madhaw dhaw, kendo riwach munyo ka jo neko lee madwo? kosa dhia? pok mere kirom jo gye

Ri ameno to jo chako kwedirok, joman jo wacho ni wan wa jo paŋadin riwan, wakiya?ere gi win, kada nono, wakinono giwin; aka joman bende jo wacho ameno; to wok ruwirok madwoŋ kod pokirok nono kad bich paka onyo nitye pama
Amor Kagulu Adundo
Nono me jo chako bedo Katajula, chiegin Nagongera, akanyaka jo wok kenyo jolak i Padhola gipi, Nyingi jo man, jowacho ni "Wa jo kagulu Adundo wa nyikway Njose wa jo cham malomalo"
Aka nyingi jo madongo mati jo chwoko ame:
Njose,	Luaŋole,	Ochido,	Alosi,	Wambiri,
Kamunyi,	Oriono,	Moyi,	Oda,	Mweye,
Kitheŋi,	Misyoŋo,	Ogesi,	Otyemi,	Paliwo,
Okonye,	Masanja,	Otwepe,	Nyagota,	Nyanjoli,
Njwaya,	Aaŋa,	Omunyi,	Sar,	Adusa
Kweer pajo:
Jo kited kod yen aŋwen me: Kudho Alwi, Kagino, Obolo, kod Dukino Ath
Minyur kod nyath jo nindo i boke pendi nyarwanda kanyath manyako, to ka majachwo jo nindo i boke nyameji
Minyur chiemo i kor pendi nyarwanda
Minyur kiyik mach
Jo yikere wiyijo ŋiyo yokuma waŋ chieŋ podho iy

Ee, Kagulu Adundo nyikway Njose Kayoro
Ondhiri wajocham malo nok nok
Ajore Kagulu Adundo nyaka wabino
Jadwoŋ nono me marapena odim go i oro 1945
Aka tich machango jo asa ŋeyirok iiye: lweny, timo riji yen (boke) matipo kod yen ma migimba koth, pach kod chuech
KUNU pajo achiel nitye Katajula itele milwoŋo ni Katajula, aka man nitye Maundo itele milwoŋo ni 'Tawo Jwok
Amor Kijwala
Nono me nyingi jo man jowacho ni, "Wa jo pa Kijwala wodi Akwoyo"
Jo chako bedo iyadech ma Mikwana, kod Nagongera, akanyaka jolak i Padhola gye
Wugo pajo nitye Mikwana, me nyutho ni indir ma lweny pa Josewe kareno jotyeko tundo i kabedo no

Jadwoŋ nono pajo marapena oketh i oro 1947
Aka tich machango jo asa ŋeyirok iiye ame: lweny kod goyo achiel kod tida

Amor p'Olam
Jo p'Olam chango jo chako bedo iyadech milwoŋo Simwengi, i Gombila ma Nagongera
Nyingijo man jo wacho ni "Wa jo p'Olam Nyajurirya Oryaŋ Oryaŋ weg piny
Aka nyingi jo madongo mati jochwoko ame:

Amor pa Tikidiegi
Jo pa Tikidiegi jo wacho ni jo ajo madwoŋ ajo ma telo Padhola gipi rupir nijo chowo kunu milwoŋo ni Adhola, kendo jowacho ni chango omiyijo Toŋ kod Buli p'Adhola
Chango jo chako bedo iyadech ma Nagongera kod yo Nyamalogo, rumachien to jo lak i Padhola gye
Nyingi jo man jowacho ni "Wan Amor Adhola pa Tikidiegi Sulwe"
Aka nyingijo madongo mati jo chwoko ame:

Kweer madwo? Sulwe, ama jo chowo kendo joyiko ji wiyijo ?iyo yo Sulwe

Amor Mugulu-Kasede
Paka nende waneno ikachako ma Siro me, Mugulu kod Kasede jo wutimere, ma ich achiel
Mugulu nyinge won chango ilwoŋo ni Kayoro to ri chowo mago chango chowo Kunu milwoŋo ni Mugulu yo Nyamalogo amuŋiyo owir nyinge ni Mugulu
Kendo go ama Jadwoŋ pa Kasede
To Kasede nyinge oasa winjirok ri waŋ  tek pere kendo ri ŋiyo pere; Mugulu chango obedo jagwondo

Nono me wok chon jotemo paka jowir nyingi jo obed achieŋ kende, ikabedo mawacho ni Amor Kasede, Amor Mugulu; to jo koyeyere rupir Kasede mito ni apere amuwinjere malo, aka Mugulu bende mito ni apere amonek apa Kasede
Tundo ka ndelo 10 October 1954 aka jo chokere to jo ridho ni wangi olwoŋo jo ni Amor Mugulu-Kasede, indelo no bende amajo dimo iye Jadwoŋ achieŋ ma riwo jo gye
Nyingi jo man jowacho ni, "waŋ  Amor Mugulu-Kasede, Nyajurya Oryaŋ weg piny"

NONO JO PA BENDO
Bendo munywolo nono jo pa Bendo, chango wod Adhola
Bendo onywolo wode milwoŋo ni Sole, aka Sole onywolo Milwen, aka Milwen onywolo yach apar gabich, yach me ama jo nywolo nono Bendo gye manitye pama
Jo pa Bendo nyingi jo man ma jo pakere gine jowacho ni, "Wa jo Goryaŋ waŋ  Ogwaŋ  Ayese"
Dwoŋ  mere ni jo joger swa aka chango jo mako kir ogwange madongo, kokwinyo jo
Nono me ochako bedo iyadech ma Nagongera, Tororo kod Kwapa, kiripama akuma jo asa more iye tek tek
To kareno onyo jolaki i Padhola gipi
Sole, Aŋwela, Oguti, Ogola, Ochol, Milwen, Owaro, Obyeto
I non Bendo me amachango jali milwoŋo ni Oguti odonjo iiye (nen Adech I, Siro 3)
Ja pa Bendo milwoŋo ni Milwen amonwaŋo Oguti iger dhok, ikabedo ma Pokoŋo Nagongera, tokelo go pecho pere toloko go panyath pere
Milwen chango oketho Oguti ioti pa dhako pere milwoŋo ni min Owaro, kenyo ama odongo iiye
Ndiri munyo Oguti odongo, Milwen onywomo rigo mon adek, Abotha nya ja Ramogi, Nyagol kod Nyakuya nyir Morwa Sule
Kweer pa nono Bendo madwoŋ  SIKONDI
Ka dhako onywol sikondi bino abina to thono pige inyuka muted ri dhako maminyur, aka nyaka dhako no madho
Kakobedo ameno nyutho ni nyath no kobed gisilwany maber
Ka dhako onywol tieko ndelo adek kanyath no ma nyiyach, aka ka ma nyako tieko ndelo aŋwen, mafuod kochiemo
Manyutho ni chiemo marapena, kandelono orumo anyuka no ma sikondi bino thon iye
Yen milwoŋo ni kudho Alwi, kod Ragadhiaŋ  kited gin
Kaminyur yawok, indir mitedo iye kwon apipili (nen Adech III, Siro 4)
Ikelo kudho alwi tichomo inyuka maminyur yamadho kosa ikwon mayachamo
To kudho alwino minyur no kicham kwanyo woko chungo achunga kenyo ma kweer
Dukino mu bokere bende ikelo boke mere adek kanyath no ma nyiyach kosa boke aŋwen ka ma nyako, tichomo inyim dhioti akanyaka dhako no chiemo
Jo yikere wiyijo neno yokuma waŋ  chieŋ woki iye
Wer pajo jo wero ni:
Awuyo wanyithindho awuyo Sambara
Awuyo Ogwaŋ  Ayese kilwor Jowi
Me awer majo wero ka jopako misen pajo, jo p'Ogwaŋ  Ayese jo Bendo jo kilwor Jowi
Wer me iwero i lweny, ika liel, kod i rut
Tich machango nono me oasa ŋeyere iiye: lweny, dwar, goyo fumbo, tongoli kod bunde

NONO JO BIRANGA KOD JO PA RAGAŋ
Nono Biranga kod nono Ragaŋ baa jo achieŋ to ri pokirok mubedo chon swa onyo pama nonin me jokiŋey ni chango jowutimere kada dichiel
ŋeyo paka pokirok obedo maDwoŋ   neni kiri Biranga won odoko opokere ka di kweth
Tiend nonin me chango ochakere ama: Adhola amunywolo dhano milwoŋo ni Omolo aka Omolo kod dhako pere milwoŋo ni Luya, jonywolo nyiyach milwoŋo ni Masawa
Masawa me onywol go rut kod Agak (nen Siro 5 Ragaŋ)

To Masawa obedo kod mon kweth yee to nywolo yach kweth swa aka yach me riwach madhaw dhaw paka asa bedo inyithindho ma jo poko minigin, ndir madit jo kimitere, amuŋiyo nyithindho pa Masawa jopokere tek tek
Rumachieŋ towok iye nonin madongo aryo: Biranga kod Ragaŋ

Nyithindho me gye bende to jonyayi jangijo munyo jorwenyo swa kiri nywomirok gye jo nywomere, to doko bino riwirok moro ka jangijo madongo joriwere ka jolwoŋere ni wajo pa ŋadin akuma onyo owok iye jange adek madongo munyo pama nitye:

NONO JEP-ODWI
Nono me kadanende nyingi jo olwoowere ni Jep-Odwi kosa ni Odwi-Jep jo nono achieŋ kende
Ji aryo me Odwi kod Jep chango Adhola amonywolo jo
To nenere ni chango jobedo nyithindho majoluwere aka odoko jomitere tek tek, kir nyithindho pajo gye to jomitere to ŋiyo nono me bedo makopokere
Kabedo pawutimere me chango obedo wi got milwoŋo ni Amele yo Paya; kenyo ama Jep otho iye aka omini mere Odwi otho gi Soni
Nyikwayi Jep jodit yo Paya kod Soni, aka nyikwaŋ  Odwi jodit yo Gombilaŋiyolwa kod Mulanda
Chalo chango obedo dhaw moro muŋiyo nyikwayi Odwi joringo yo Mawele aka nyikwaŋ  Jep jodoŋ yo Lul, to kende kada ameno jo kopoko nono
Nono me nyingi jo man ma jopakere gine jowacho ni Wajo p'Odwi-Jep ŋanda Adundo
Jowacho ameno rupir ni chango welo pajo nok

Ligeyi me chango onywol go rut kod Ogwaŋ  milwoŋo ni Koyo (Ondiek) ameno amuŋiyo  nono me ochamo nyingijo ni Koyo, kendo kweer pajo madwoŋ   kendo majo lwo?o tek tek aa ogwaŋ  Koyo
Ndir machon chango nono Koyo jolOŋere Ogwaŋ  Koyo won maka jowacho rin ni luw ŋet ryete kacha aka abende aluw gikorin, to kati wiromo gi yo ?ete cha iromo aroma kod go munyo otyeko lOŋere ogwaŋ
Ri ameno chango jo nono mani jolwoŋo nono Koyo swaŋkidho gi jo dwaŋo obwol, menyo ŋwen, kosa dimo yen
Ligey won chango onywolo wode achieŋ milwoŋo ni Misir aka wode me amunywolo yach aboro: Othieno, Asiep, Pola, Dul, Nima, waŋdya, Rombo kod Dibworo
Aka yach me bende amunywolo nono me gipi munyo pama nitye
Chango jo chako bedo iyadech milwoŋo ni Mifumi aka nyaka jo kOŋere yo Mikiya kuma nitye tele ma Kunu pajo pama
To ti jo asa nwaŋere yo Sukuru, Tororo, Kidera, Osia, Okwira, Omede kod iyadech madit i Padhola gipi

Musiguya wod Lol me amobedo nyathi mueyere swaŋloyo waŋ  gye, amuŋiyo  kiri pama Jololi jowacho ni jo "Musiguya jowacho ameno kajo poŋo wod pa Loli no makŋwene ni kosa jopOŋere aka jomani jo Loli Musiguya aka jomani jo Loli makite mupOŋere"
Nono me chango jochako bedo Nyamalogo rumachieŋ to Loli tuk yo Korobudi, kuma nitye tele majo chwoko ni Oyali?oma ma pama KUNU pajo

NONO MORWA
Nono Morwa kada ti jo pOŋere kadiryo Guma kod Sule, baa jo chango achieŋ
Giŋaŋokelo riŋo poŋirok, aa ya? riŋo, munyo jodit aka riŋo kirom jo, toŋjo cŋaŋo akwed ŋaŋowacho ni jo pa Guma jo kinono kod jo pa Sule, ni rupir ni chango Guŋaŋosenga senga Sule
Aka Guma bende jo wa ho ni Sule chango osenga senga jo!  Akwed makite me toŋkelo riŋo poŋirok swa   gicŋaŋo nywomirok
To kada ameno kula madit fuod riŋojo

Morwa Guma
Jo Morwa Guma chango jocŋaŋo bedo iyadech ma Matindi, akuma jowok iye toŋjo wotho i Padhola paŋaŋom

Minyur kicham chiemo mu podho piny kada pii kothon piny kidok madh, kendo kicham fufa ma kado, chamo ma pii kende
Pecho maminyur ni iye itedo i degi manyien kende kende, to minyur won kigey kosa yiko mach
Riŋo kod Mwenge kidonji i oti minyur.
Kaminyur yawok i boro remo dhiaŋ amilwoko gine nyath, kareno oketh nyath no i dhioti.
Ki ya chwoko nyingi nyath iguro dak kiwacho ni “Won oti ni nyingi nyath me ŋa?” Iwacho ameno kareno i thoko oti aka min nyath kod nyath won jonitye i oti.

NONO JO NYAKENO
Nono Nyakeno nitye achiel kende
Nywoliroki pajo: Adhola onywolo wode milwoŋo ni Simwenji, aka Simwenji chango Were omiyogo akendo makeno mombo swa, to timo kooy chak dhok pere machango go kwayo.
Wok ndiri no to keno bedo ri Simwenji kweer madwoŋ.
Aka go won bende to wad chwoko rigo nyinge ni Nyakeno ni rupir omaro akendini kod kooy makeno.
Simwenji nyinge man munyo ilwoŋo “Nyakeno” onywolo yach aŋwen: Nyagwanja, Oliŋa, Orono kod Moti.
Aka yach me aŋaŋo nywolo Nono Nyakeno paka pama nitye
Chango jo chako bedo Katandi akanyaka jo wotho i Padhola gye.
Nyingijo man jo wacho ni “Wa jo Simwenji wa jo pa Nyakeno wakilwor chwo kada oriwo.”

NONO JO NYAPOLO
Nywolirok pa Nyapolo kod raŋo chango olwoŋ go ni Nyapolo nitye iy’ Adech I, Siro 1.
Onyo ka wayaneno paka Nyapolo Nono gipi nitye.

Nyapolo wod pa Adhola onywolo yach aŋwen, nyathi makayo pere ochwoko go ni Ranga (Rwoth), nyath mararyo Ogule (chango omiyogo migosi madwoŋ to chako noro kod gulirok gye to wad Chwoko ni Ogule), maradek Oligo, aka maraŋwen Nyafuondo.
Yach me gye kutho marapeno jo bedo inono achiel Nyapolo, munyo jo kinywomere.
To munyo yach nyikway Nyapolo jo more aka pok riŋo kirom jo to jochako akwed, to Ogule pokere to chako nono pere ni Nyapolo Ogule.
Kada jo pokere jo konywomere piyo
Nywomirok ochako i ndir ma Oloo Majanga dhumo (nen Adech I, Siro 5), tundo kiri pama.
Jo pa Ogule jo nywomo jo pa Ranga, Oligo kod Nyafuondo.
To ja dek me jo Ranga, Oligo, Nyafuondo jo kinywomere kendo jo nono achiel.
Nyapolo gye chango jo chako bedo Katandi kuma chango onywol iye kwar jo, kod yo Senda.
To riwach dhaw dhaw amumiyo jo chako tuk joman jo kun wiloka paka jomiwacho jo ni jo pa Masar, me kinono anona man manyikway Adhola.
Jo pa Masar me jo nono Nyapolo Ogule aka baa jo machango ilwoŋo ni Masar, olimo dhaw moro kod wutumin go jo pa Ogule.
To go pokere to kun, to kidho yo Nyawiyoga.
To wok indirino nyikway jalo pama ilwoŋo jo ni jo pa Masar, to kareno jo kinono man kendo fuod jo kolimo pokirok apoka swa malimo chako nono man ni wajo “Nyapolo pa Masar.”
Aka jo Nyapolo madit man jo nitye yo Gombila ma Kwapa.
Nyapolo Orangi, Oligo kod Nyafuondo
Nono me nyingi jo man jo wacho ni “Wa jo Nyapolo wa jo Luli tworo.”
Jo wacho ameno ka jopoyo gine Luli tworo machango diti yo Katandi machango onywolijo iiye.
Aka nyingi jo mati jo chwoko ame:
Adhola,	Oligo,	Oywelowo,	Jewo,	Keta,
Ranga,	Nyafuondo,	Jabuka,	Aripa,	Nyakur

Nyapolo Ogule
I nono Nyapolo, Ogule nitye kende, aka jo nywomere kod Nyapolo man.
Jo pakere ni “Wa jo Nyapolo wa jo po Ogule.”
Minyur kiyik mach, kendo go kod nyath jonindo i boke pendi nyarwanda.
Jo yikere wiy jo ŋiyo kuma waŋ chieŋ podho iye (west).

NONO NYIRENJA
Jo pa Nyirenja nyingi jo man jowacho ni "wa jo Paliwa Chak chiemo"
Jo nitye nono achiel kende ma kopokere diere.
Nywolirok pajo achako kwoŋ Adhola, munywolo nyath pere milwoŋo ni Nyirenja.
Aka Nyirenja onywolo wode milwoŋo ni Kasewe, to Kasewe kod dhako pere milwoŋo ni Nyamichala to jo nywolo yach abiriyo me: Waseni, Arucha, Adipa, Omuya, Orupe, Onyay kod Onoŋor.
Aka yach me amunywolo nono Nyirenja ma pama nitye.
Kabedo pajo marapena obedo Maundo kod Nyamalogo.
To pama jonwaŋere ikis adech ma Padhola.

Gime obino ama, Nyirenja kod dhako pere gye jotho joweyo Kasewe ikich madwoŋ.
To dhiaŋ pa baa mere milwoŋo ni “Oliwa” amopidho go gichak ma chiewo tundo kuma Kasewe opoŋ to bende nywomo.
To pama chak ma chiewo bedo kweer madwoŋ swa ri jo Paliwa.
Ka dhako onywol ikuth ikiro chak ma chiewo i kanindo kod bothi minyur ginyathi akanyaka jo nindo i ka nindo no kosa nyathi no dhoth.
Kendo ka ja Paliwa otho kinyiedh dhok mapecho no kafuod koyik ŋato iweyo dhok dhothadhotha.
Jo yikere wiy jo ŋiyo kuma waŋ chieŋ podho iiye (west).
E e e chak chiewo, wajo Maundo muweyo
dhiaŋ osira malo pa chwo ongoye!
Wer me obedo ‘abwon’;

obedo ndir achiel jo Sewe jobino to jo yaka dhiaŋ pa japa Nyirenja yo Maundo to romachien to dhako mawon pecho no dwoko to uro ni “I i i, a a a! anen! anen win jo Paliwa, jo Maundo me paka jo weyo dhiaŋ osira malo okadho gi chak makonyiedh kada anyiedha, pa chwo ongoye pecho me manende jo ki lweny ye kada alwenya!”
Wok ndirino to gime lokere wer nono.
Jadwoŋ nono marapena odimi i oro Novemba 26, 1933.
Tich machango jo asa ŋeyere iiye: lweny, goyo tongol gi fumbo kod ndijo ma theth atego kod tonge!
KUNU pajo, man nitye Maundo, aka man nitye Nyamalogo witele milwoŋo ni Wiyadundo.
NONO J'ODE
J’Ode jonitye nono achiel kende jo kopokere.
Olwoŋ jo ni J’Ode rukwom baa jo manywolo jo chango ilwoŋo ni Ode.
Ode chango wod p’Adhola, aka go onywolo yach aŋwen: Luge, Wangolo, Owora kod Warya; aka yach me ama jonywolo nono Ode ma pama nitye.
Nyingi jo man jowacho ni “Wa j’Ode wa jo Mbuluku.”
J’Ode j’ochako bedo yo Nagongera bothi Adhola to munyo joneno ni joromo aka onyo dudi nok ma fur to jo tuk yo Mwelo, i tyend tele ma Mwelo.
Ka akuma jo nwaŋo iiye nyathi lyech to jo lwoŋo ni nyathi dhiaŋ, to jo mako jo pidho.
Munyo lyech opoŋ to lokere mager ka mito ni onek jo, kendo won bin chodo uno to kidho chiemo kende.
Amumiyo ndir achiel to jo chokere ni jo onek thwon ma nono.
Ape! kere jo kwinyo kuma pino ogeto iye: to lyech ere gi jo to neko jo pa nyithindi gwendi.
Wok ndirino to lyech koch kichutho.
To jo modoŋ to jo loko lyech kweer pa jo; kajo wacho ni kere lyeech bende chuka chiene ji aka lworo tich amumiyo jo lokere lyeech.
Kareno joŋeyo ni ji kende ama jonyalo bedo mager; nikere manago nende omini jo amonwaŋo joyaneko ni lee.

Kweer pa jo madwoŋ, Mbuluku kod lyech, ka j’Ade twoo kosa otho Mbuluku bina bina pecho no to bende chako ywak.
Jo kited kod Akibuk, kigo dhok, asati mar’adita kosa asati mar’odher kosa kasegere dero.
Minyur kicham kwon kal muchiel, tundo kuma wok iiye.
Minyur chiemo ikor pendi kendo kwon kosa nyuka iguro gi yath makudho Alwi.
Minyur kod nyathi jonindo i boke pendi nyarwanda.
Jo yikere wiyi jo ŋiyo kuma waŋ chieŋ podho iye (west).
Wer pa jo majo wero:
Mbuluku, Mbuluku Omwa Mwelo
Mbuluku Omwa Mwelo.
Bedo i piny Padhola tek wanodok Ode wan,
Mbuluku Omwa Mwelo.”
Chuka chiene waji, Chuka chiene waji.
Chuka chiene waji walworo tich walokere lyeech.
Wer me gye jo chwoko munyo lyech otyeko neko jo.
Jo wacho ni bedo i piny Padhola tek, nen paka lyech onekojo, ni jo ripo dok Ode pajo.
Dwoŋ mere ni jo ripo tho rigin jo eye i piny me.
Jadwoŋ nono marapena chango odini ioro 1953.
Tich machango jo asa ŋeyere iiye: lweny, kwath, miel kod dwar.
KUNU pajo nitye wi tele ma Mwelo.
NONO OJILAI
Nono Ojilai opokere kad ryo: Ojilai Dibworo p'Arak kod Ojilai Dibworo pa Kwom
To kada ameno kula pajo kod wer gye achiel.
Inywolirok pajo jobedo wutimere, to riwach ma pok ma riŋo kod ma chulirok kwor, amumiyo oti pa Arak kod oti pa Kwom jo pokere, to jo chako nywomirok.
Nywolirok pa nono me obedo, ama, Adhola onywolo jali milwoŋo ni Ojilai to Ojilai me chango nyinge man i lwoŋo ni Dibworo rupir chango onywol go rut kod Simbwor.
Dibworo (Ojilai) me amonywolo yach aryo, Arak kod Akwom, aka yach me amunyo nywolo nono Ojilai aryo me.
Nono me chango jo chako bedo yo Nyamalogo to pama jo lak i p’Adhola gipi paka rom.
Ojilai Dibworo p'Arak
Ojilai me nyingi jo man jo wacho ni “Wa jo pa cham dhano wa jo p’Arak pa Dibworo.”
Arak,Awira,Nyayole,Adita,Adara,
Maruk,Mwera,Akenya,Kasimo,Iŋula,
Olum,Yunju.
Kweer madwoŋ Simbwor (Dibworo).
Ogel kod Akibuk jo kited gine.
Minyur chiemo i kor pendi, kendo go kiyik mach.
“Dibworo wanamyero
Wanonen chwo ago e e e
Wanonen chwo ago
Dibworo dwoko e e Dibworo bino e e e
Wanonen chwo ago.
Wer me a wer ma Kirembe madwoŋ swa i p’Adhola; amumiyo kis nono wero ka jowok lweny, kosa
dwar kosa timo gimoro gye ma nyutho misen.
Cham dhano wajo pa Dibworo wachamo moro,
Jo cham ji bino wajo p’Ocham dhano
Wajo p’Arak wajo cham ji nyaka wadwoko.
Jadwoŋ nono marapena chango oketh i oro 1933
Tich machango jo asa ŋeyere iiye: lweny, dwar kod goyo bunde.
KUNU pajo, madwoŋ mere nitye Nyamalogo wi tele milwoŋo ni Mawele, aka mathi mere nitye Migana, manago obedo lul.
Ojilai Dibworo pa Kwom
Ojilai me nyingi jo man jo wacho ni “Wa jo cham dhano wa jo pa Kwom pa Dibworo.”

Jadwoŋ nono marapena chango oketh i oro 1933.
KUNU pajo nitye Nyamalogo wi tele milwoŋo ni Mawele.
NONO OLOMOLE
Nono Olomole nitye achiel, to kende jonok, rupir ni yado kajoyanja joromoye nyakamath to jo ere to jo tho pajo rumo, kiri i wer pajo jo wacho ni “Watho warumo wajo Olomole.”
Nyingi jo man jo wacho ni “Wa j’Olomole waji ma jwom.”

Nywolirok pajo obedo ama, Adhola onywolo jali milwoŋo ni Odudi nyinge man ni Olomole, aka Olomole me onywolo yach awichiel: Mijoŋo, Tiyo, Wandera, Orach, Omoŋo kod Otiyo, aka yach me amunyo nywolo nono Olomole.
Chakirok bedo pajo jo chako Matindi, to jo kidho Soni i jwom milwoŋo ni Pore, me pama KUNU pajo, to joluwo Nyamalogo tojo kadha kadha joluwo Chawolo tundo i jwom milwoŋo ni Nyandeta.
To Nyandeta neko jopakidho tyeko woko jo
Munyo jowotho no, onwaŋo waŋ jo ŋiyo yo por loka Wisoga to kuma jo tyeko tho meg i Nyandeta to jo modoŋ jowire jo wotho dwoko yochien de tundo yo Pubwok Pasindi, akuma fuod jo nitye iiye madit.
Jo kicham Nyiger, kendo jokited kod yath milwoŋo ni Akibuk.
Jo yikere wiyijo ŋiyo kuma waŋ chieŋ wok iiye (east).
Ee wa j’Olomole watiend toko manyandeta,
Watho warumo wa j’Olomole manyandeta,
Waki poŋ ryete wa j’Olomole manyandeta.
Tich pajo machango jo ŋeyere iiye: lweny, kod chiko.
KUNU pajo nitye Soni manago waŋ pii milwoŋo ni Pore.
NONO ORUWA
Wod pa Adhola machango ilwoŋo ni Oruwa amunywolo nono Oruwa gye paka nitye pama.

Jali me chango ochamo nyinge rundiri ni Oruwa, rupir nyithindho pere kod nyikwaye, jo bedo kod ruwirok madit; jo chako nywomirok, jonekere, jochulere kwor, to nono bedo abeda mu ruwere swa kichutho kichutho won, paka nyingi jalicha.
Pama dhano nyalo paro ni ruwirok marumachien me amumiyo ochwok jo ni Oruwa to kere be.
Jadwoŋ Oruwa chango onywolo yach aŋwen: Lapa, Demba, Lusi kod Menya.
Aka nyithindh yach me ama jokelo ruwirok to jo pokere nono ka diŋwen; to jo chako nywomirok Oruwa gye aŋwen.
To chiegin oro 1918 to jo udi adek, Lapa, Lusi kod Menya to jo riwere to joweyo nywomirok
Oti pa Demba to doŋ kende
Riwirok ma udi adek me joridho aridha swa i oro 1942, ama jo dimo iye jadwoŋ achiel ni ama obedi ŋata achiel mariwo jo gye
Gima dwo?   kwom Oruwa gye a Kweer
Gima dwoŋ kwom Oruwa gye a Kweer.  Oruwa ni gi Kweer mager swa, ma kituki gine, makir okewo pa jo gye kweer no megi tundo kwom jo.
Oruwa Demba
Oruwa me nyingi jo man jo wacho ni “Wan wa jo waŋ chieŋ wa jo cham malo, wa goyo aryo.”
Wagoyo aryo, dwoŋ mere ni jo nywolo rut.
Kabedo majo chako bedo iye a Nyamalogo to pama jonwaŋere i kis adech ma Padhola.
Owa da,	Osama,	Ojaga,	Aroba,	Olude
Chiko
Kweer madwoŋ dhiaŋ; ni rupir chango ka jotho iyiko jo i chiel dhok.
To jochamo rigin riŋo dhok, kwanyo woko yen ma chiel dhok jo kited gine.
Obolo kod kasegere moro gye kited gine.
Minyur chiemo i kor pendi aka chiemo no bende imiyo amiya i dhoke, ka chiemo opodho kosa pii othon piny, ndirino kodok’ochiem kosa madho pii tundo yawere mere.
Dhako k’onywol i ketho chooko i fufa (ma pii makiwene ma kado) magochamo tundo wok.
Kendo kicham riŋo tundo kuma jo thugin jo kel rigo riŋo.
Keno lyech adek kosa aŋwen i omo isa am’itheno gine chiemo pa minyur tundo kum’owok iye.
Minyur kod nyathi jo nindo i boke pendi nyarwanda.
Ka minyur yawok i chwado tiende kod powo wok i dhioti pere tundo iya p’Adhamere kareno iwacho ni wakidho i dwol dhok, i timo ameno didek kosa diŋwen.
“Jo pa dibworo wajo cham malo wagoyo aryo
Jo pa dibworo wajo cham malo wagoyo aryo
Achamo Dhano nyaka wa dwoko.”
Jadwoŋ nono marapena oketh i oro 1932.
Tich machango jo asa ŋeyirok iiye: lweny, kwath kod dwar.
KUNU pajo nitye Nyamalogo aka man nitye yo Kiyeyi
Oruwa Lapa, Lusi kod Menya
Oruwa adek me Lapa, Lusi kod Menya, joriwere pama; jo lwoŋere ni “Wa jo pa Dibworo wa jo cham malo.”
Dibworo, ka nyutho gero pajo.
Jo both jochale kod Ojilai, nen Siro 19.

Lusi,Anyamo,Ochier,Onyo,Angel,
Menya,Majiji.
Kweer madwoŋ dhiaŋ, ni rupir chango kajo tho iyiko jo i chiel dhok.
To jo chamo rigin riŋo dhok kwanyo woko yen ma chiel dhok jo kited gine.
Kendo wok kwom minyur tundo kwom dhako manitye kod nyathi ma fuod kiwothi, jo ki gey woyo dhiaŋ.
Akibuk kod Matakela, kited gine.
Minyur kiyik mach ka go fuod k’owok.
Minyur chiemo i kor pendi, aka chiemo no bende imiyo amiya i dhoke; ka chiemo opodho kosa pii othon piny, ndirino kodok’ochiem kosa madho pii tundo yawere mere.
Minyur kicham riŋo tundo kuma jo thugin jo kelo riŋo.
Ka riŋo ongoye angoya swa woki yo thugin chooko am’itedo amiyoko go gine.

Dhako manitye kod nyathi kigey boke akendo ma keno, kada dhako manitye kod iye bende kigey; kendo ka minyur yawok indirino i fuono boke akendo ma keno amigoyo gine tiende kareno i lamo go ni wakidho i dwol dhok, i timo ameno didek kosa diŋwen, paka kweer nyath nitye.
Minyur kod nyath jo nindo i boke pendi kego nyarwa da
Wa jopa Dibworo wajo cham malo,
Wanwaŋo dhano moro waloko go Oruwa mawan
Jopa Dibworo nyaka wabino.
I wer me jowero kajo pakere ni jo chingi jo lach chango jo mako ji ma nono man jorwako i nono pajo.
E, e, e Omwa walangel olwoŋo wan ni ‘Wadama’
Omwa otieko jo Kiyeyi.
Wajo Ruwa omwa olwoŋo ni wanok kere nyaka watundo
Munyo jo tieko jo Kiyeyi aka waryemo jo.”
Jadwoŋ nono marapena chango oketh i oro 1942.
KUNU pajo man nitye Nyamalogo witele milwoŋo ni Nyamanda aka man nitye Kiyeyi.
NONO RAMOGI
Nono me kada jo weg meg kod joman gye jowacho ni chango jowok yo Busoga i piny milwoŋo ni Bulamogi ni rupir Bulamogi chale kod Ramogi; meno ka paka nitye
Ramogi obedo nyithindho Adhola won aka jo kowok Busoga kada di chiel, rupir nen, Ramogi nyingi moŋeyere tek tek swa i nonini ma Lwo gipi; giranena Ramogi nitye p’ Owiny (Kenya), Acoli kod Laŋo.
Wod p’Adhola milwoŋo ni Wangolo amunywolo wode bende to chwoko ni Ramogi, ri nyingi kwarijo kosa wutumin Adhola gin machango jo weyo jo chien kuma jowoki iye.
Nyathi Ramogi me amunyo nywolo nono Ramogi gye manitye Padhola ka.
Bedo pa nono me, jo pen bedo iyadech ma Matindi, kenyo ama lweny pa Sewe amumiyo jo pokere to jo laki i Padhola gipi loyo madit jo nwaŋere yo Gombila Molo, Tororo, Kisoko kod Nagongera.
Nyingi jo man, jo wacho ni “Wa jo Ramogi ma Matindi” dwoŋ mere ni me Jo Ramogi ma Padhola monywolijo Matindi, makiwene jo Ramogi ma Nyanza kosa ma Kitgum.

Jo kited kod yath ogeli
Minyur kodi nyathi jo nindo i boke pendi nyarwanda, kendo minyur kitedi kosa geyo mach ka fuod kowok.
Indir mar’Apipili iriwo dukino Athu idhioti aka itimo (nen Adech III, Siro 4).
Joyikere wiyijo ŋiyo yo kuma waŋ chieng podho iye (west).
