Jo Ramogi modakana omwa ma kombe jo lwoŋo nyir ni Katalaŋ!
Jadwoŋ nono marapena oketh i oro 1940.
Aka tich machango jo asa ŋeyirok iiye: lweny, dwar, miel kod goyo bunde.
KUNU pajo nitye Matindi ilul machiegin gi wugo pajo.
NONO JO PA GEMBE
Nono jo Pagembe nitye achiel kende ma kopokere aka madit mere jo nitye yo loka pa Gembe, i Gombila ma Paya.
Baa nono me nyinge chango ilwoŋo ni Ogembe, Ogembe me bedo Nyakwar Adhola, to baa mere won nyinge koŋeyere maber.

Ogembe kod wote awichiel, Kungu, Nyamisio, Dumbarya, Kiwene, Opio kod Misana, jochako bedo Maundo; aka jo kowere Katajula yo bothi jo Amor Kagulu Adundo, aka nyaka jowok kenyo to jo man jo oole yo loka Pagembe, aka jo man jo kidho iyadech ma Padhola mopokere opokere
Kweer madwoŋ bel winyo, jo kigey kada ageya.
Kadhako pa Jopagembe ochielo kal aka kal no nindi makoregi, kal no kidok cham kada dichiel, ikonja konja woko.
Minyur kod nyathi jo nindo i bokependi nyarwanda.
Minyur kiyik mach kendo chiemo pere itedo i degi manyien, kod achiero machiemo iye bedo manyien kende kende.
Jo yikere wiyijo ŋiyo kuma waŋ chieng podho iye (west).
Nyamondo yiwi kwach, kigey, owire rin inonen.
Dwoŋ mere ni jo pako gero pajo marom kod gero pa kwach.
Jadwoŋ nono marapena oketh i oro 1945
Tich machango jo asa ŋeyere iiye: lweny, dwar kod chuech bwo.
KUNU pajo ilwoŋo ni Nyasirenge, nitye witele milwoŋo bende ni Nyasirenge.
WACH MA TITO ADECH MARADEK
Iyadech me atito kula megi ma dongo ma jo Padhola jotimo.

Kula me megi machon swa munyo pama owey kir timo, paka ma lweny, akisili kod ma nywomirok; aka megi paka ma chowo, ji manok swa mafuodi jo timo rupir ji madit ti jo fuonjere dini ma nyien mupokere opokere to jo weyo kula ma chon.
To kada ameno iyadech me akikidho riwacho ri ji ni jowey kula manyien jodoki imachon; kosa wiro chuny jo ni kere dini kosa kula mati me rach, mawan machon amachango ber amachango miyo wan siem madit.
Meno ka paka nitye
Andiko adech me g’atoŋa ni kis dhano ma ja Padhola kada onyo nitye kod kula man mago luwo, oŋey kula ma kwar wan chango jo timo.
Kendo nyithindho mayowaŋe bende jo oŋey kula ma tiend nono pajo, paka chango nitye chon mafuod wasungu jo kobino i piny me.
Odoko jo wiloka bende jo oŋey ni jo Padhola bende chango ji ma jo tiekere i kula makite gye
Makiwene jo wacho ni “Alacha gin me chango jo ŋeyo aŋo?
Kole kula majo timo gye jo limo bothi jo wiloka ayino.”
Ra ameno akwayo jo dongo ma dini gye kod jo dongo fuonjiroki gye jo okir jo ter ni adech me kidho ri nywowo tich pajo.
Kwanyo woko adech me kidho rinyutho adier machon, aka nyaka ji joŋey maber adier manyien, ma pama.
Kendo piny kadongo dongo riwegi piny; ikula pajo machon kod i kite majo tero iye kula manyien ma jo limo bothi jo man.
KULA MA CHOWO
Jo Padhola chango jo nitye gi kula ma chowo i kite mupokere opokere.
Aka gigipiny ma jo chowo bende yado opokere ama: (i) chowo Were Madiodipo kod Were Othim, (ii) chowo Jwogi, (iii) chowo Kunu, kod (iv) chowo Jwok Bura yo Nyakiriga.
Chowo were ma diodipo kod were othim, me a Were madongo i kis pecho.
Were ma diodipo meno makuro pecho, ji ma iye kod lim gye ma pecho no

Aka Were Othim kod dhako pere milwoŋo ni Nyalike, ama jo kuro gigipiny mawok pecho no gye, paka dhano ma pecho no kakidho lweny, fur, kulo dwar kosa woth moro gye; kod dhok, diegi, roombo, ma pecho no ka jo kidho isa chiemo.
Were Othim nitye kodi jago pere milwoŋo ni Mikowe, amamenyo rigo royo ka wotho.
Were aryo me jo rom idwoŋ, aka bende i chowo jo kiromo, i ndir ma ka chiemo mandelo ochiek i kecho.
Dwoŋ mere ni i hongo no amiketho Were walwa gi miyo jo chiemo manyien.
I ndelo no i neko wot gwendi i diodipo ti tedo kod kwon, meno apa Were ma Diodipo.
Aka wot gwendi man i neko dho waŋ kach kod kwon mere bende i ketho kenyo ri Were Othim, ni ka obino ocham apere gi dho waŋ kach kun okir odonji olar kod Were ma Diodipo.
Nyutho ni waŋ kach a kew pa Were ma Diodipo kod Were Othim.
Gwendi mineko gye bedo ma wote kende kende, aka kineko kithum athuma ŋute, i goya goya wich mere piny kareno i luwere i lamo, chuka tho.
Ka chiemo ochiek i kutho i lamo aki chako chiemo.
Apa Were ma Diodipo amipen lamo, aka kowey nyithindho chamo aka i kidho i lamo ri Were Othim bende apere dho waŋ kach aka kenyo bende amichamo iye.
Nyalike, chipa Were Othim bende i tedo rigo kwon nyaka math, bende nyakare kod nyim.
Aka kiwodho kwon no i oti kuma oted iye i wotha wotha agumba tundo kuma oketh iye yo ŋey waŋ kach chiegin kod apa chwore
I ndir ma lamo me mon jo chiemo gi riŋo gi nyim.
Chowo pa Were Othim ma dwoŋ mere i chowo go isa yo thim wiryete.
Aka wiryete no bende amigeto iye oti ri Mikowe jago pa Were no
Kanyaka oro chako ki chwoyo kali, itero tongi gweno kende wiryete no dho oti pa Mikowe.
Meno nyutho ni ochak chwoyo, kendo i kwayo Were Othim okur chiemo mandelo maber.
To ka chiemo mandelo ochiek ki kecho, i ndelo ma chowo Were ma Diodipo kod Were Othim, chiemo pa Mikowe itero wiryete no isa.
I kwanyo kwon gi gweno ma kwo ti tero ri Mikowe ti lamo rigo, ti neko, tibulo abula ti chamo gi koro ma kotedi.
I chowo me gye gigipipy mineko wok rolim pa dhano paka nitye.
Ja chandi neko gwendi kende kende
To ŋata nitye kod lim madit neko wod diel ri Were ma Diodipo kod gwendi matheno wiy diel no
Ri Were Othim bende i tero wod diel ti neko isa wiryete, makiwene gi yo waŋ kach, ti bulo abula ti chamo gikoro
To ka ŋata oŋaŋ tek tek neko thwon ri Were ma Diodipo aka ri Were Othim neko bende nyathi thwon yo sa.
To kareno diegi kodi dhok ki neko, i neko kis oro adek kosa aŋwen aka gwendi amineko kis i chowo ma kis oro.
Chowo Jwogi, me ilwoŋo ni chowo jwogi ma pecho.
Dwoŋ mere ni jwogi pa ji madongo kod mathindho mutho pecho no.
I chowo ama: ka oro orumo, i dwoyo koŋo, ti madho, aka koŋo no ilwoŋo ni “ma yer gwendi.”
Rumachien ma ndelo adek ti neko gwendi, gweno achiel bedo apa kwar jo ma dwoŋ ma pecho no, aka man bedo apa kwar jo kosa baa jo kod nyithindho gye majo tho pecho no
Nitye udi mathindho thindo migeto ri jwogi me, ilwoŋo ni “Migam”, aka kenyo bende amilamo ye gwendi no.
I hongo ma chowo, mon jo chamo nyim kod riŋo aka chwo jo chamo gwendi.
Chowo Kunu, me i lwoŋo ni kiluw, amumiyo ochwok ni kunu; ni kada kidh iya jwoka Were amaluwo rigo.
Go aja tel ma pa kis nono i gigipiny gye ma jo timo, aka kis nono bedo kod apa jo ku pokere.
Aka jadwoŋ achiel ma nono no amakidho chowo ri nono no gipi.
I hongo no, i dwoyo koŋo pecho ti tiŋo koŋo gi wod diel gi wod gweno ti tero ri Kunu.
Ko tundi koro ti lamo rigo gigipiny no gye.
To diel kod gweno i neko ti bulo ti chamo achama ma piyo piyo swa, aka koŋo bende i madho wiyoto ti ay i jowere i dwoko.
Kareno yo pecho korin bende onek diegi kod gwendi ti tedo gi kwon; aka k’otiek chiemo ti madho koŋo manende odoŋ pecho.
Chowo Jwok Bura, me i chowo yo Nyakiriga, aka jwok me Majanga amachango osukina gine (nen Adech I, Siro 4)
Pecho ma Bura ni iye i geto rigo oti milwoŋo ni oti Bura.
Oti makite me bedo thenge man, aka Migami ma jwogi ma pecho bende bedo thenge man.
Indir ma chowo Bura, I dwoyo koŋo pecho, to miyatero yo Nyakiriga i dwoyo paka konon to dikin i tero rupir ni Bura kimadh koŋo ma kech madho ki bunde ayino.
Koŋo no itero kod wot gwendi, diegi kosa dhok, wok ti lim pa dhano; to kwon kosa mwenge pendi kosa kwete kiter, aka thach matiŋo koŋo kitim ma makola kwanyo woko ma lumi.
Ko tundi yo Nyakiriga i lunyere gi woko aki donjo i iye kinyoro aki chowo.
Gwendi kosa gimoro muter i bula bula yo koro tichamo.  Mon kiyey jo donjo i Nyakiriga.
Mon kiyey jo donjo i Nyakiriga
Ko dwok yo Nyakiriga aka nyaka yo pecho korin bende i neko gwendi ki lamo dho kwom oti Bura manitye pecho, aka koŋo bende ti madho.
To kende yo pecho korin kineko gwendi ma Bura i neko kir ri Were ma Diodipo, Were Othim kod Jwogi gye ma pecho.
Rupir ni Bura me wendo aka konek rigo kende, Were ma pecho kod jwogi mere jo dhaw.
Bura me mako amaka dhano pa twoo, ka wok kwom kwar mere kosa baa mere kachango bende chowo Bura.
Ko tieko mako dhano, to jo Bura wad jo bino jo lamo rigo Bura; tigeto oti mere i diodipo, aka i oti no i ketho iiye toŋ bidhi kod ayiga midwoyo iiye koŋo mitero yo Nyakiriga.
Aka toŋi man madwoŋ mi lwoŋo ni toŋi Bura bedo i oti minindo iiye, aka kiwodhi woko kichar
Yo Tewo Nyakiriga kis nono jo geto iye oti Bura pa jo, maka nono no okidho chowo, jo lamo iiye.
KULA MA NYWOMIROK
Nywomirok machon ma jodongo, chango nyiyach won kod Nyako jo kiwech ma nywomirok kwanyo woko bachere pa jo ama jo mako mere aka nyaka nyithindho pajo nywomere.
Dwoŋ mere ni, yado ka dhano onywolo nyiyach dwaro ŋata bende nitye kod nyako to mako gine mere to jo chako wendirok madwoŋ ma chiemo, koŋo, mwenge kod gigipiny gye michamo.
Kajo yeyere to baa nyiyach tweyo i chingi nyako no atego, manyutho ni nyako no otiek mako.
Kendo ka baa nyiyach no nitye kod dhiaŋ to tero kano ri baa nyako.
Aka dhiaŋ no ko nywol yo koro amachomoro ti loko manywomo nyano.
To ka ongoye gi dhiaŋ to otieko mako mere oripo, to chako rango dhok, manywom gine ri wode.
Gigipiny me gye timere ka nyithindho fuod jothindho.
To ka nyiyach otieko dongo, ka romo oro apar ga boro kenyo aka nyako bende romo oro apar ga wichiel kadho malo; to baa nyiyach nyaka oro go ni kidh i wech kod nyar ŋadin ama wadimo rin.
Wok ndirino to nyiyach chako choko yach wad makidho konyo go gi kiyo nyako no yo kulo, kosa yo dimo yen kosa yo miel gimako tero pecho
To indir majo ŋolo iye nyako no aka jomaki, aka jobed gi silwany marach ma wutimin nyako no jo bed chiegin, gorok bedo madwoŋ tek tek.
Ka jo pa nyako jo kiyey ni oter nyamin jo.
To kada ameno nyiyach jo temo atema chuka jo limi nyako jo dok gine kosa jo lweny gi wutimin nyano to jo turo jo, to jo yombo jo gi nyako no
Ka nyako otiek dwoko gine, aka nyaka wach wok ni wod pa ŋatin “orendho nya pa ŋatin.”
To nyako no kichiem yo pa nyiyach no i hongo no kwanyo woko chiemo wok awoka yo thugin kosa yo pa wat pajo machiegin kod kenyo
To ndir megi nyako mamisen tieko kada ndelo kweth mako chiemo, ka chiemo kokel rigo wok thugin.
Meno bende apaka chango iŋeyo gine nyako m’owoor kosa ma k’owoor.
To rumachien mandelo adek kosa aryo tiketho nyako no i dho oti pa adhamere (me min nyiyach pere mu kelogo), ti tweyo rigo chip kod chieno ti wirogo kod mo ti kethogo i pyen dhiaŋ kosa pyen diel.
Kenyo to jo pa ywoche jo lielo wiye, ti ŋado lweti chinge kod lweti tiende.
Aka gigipiny no adhamere kano kuma diny swa.
Rumachien ma gigipiny me, yado bedo gi kula ni nyako kwale dok thugin
To kareno gigipiny manywom bende jo dongo jo tieko yiko, gitero.
Yado inywomo dhok abuŋwen kosa apar, diegi, toŋ, ŋet kwe, atego obad kod ganga adeya.
Rumachien kanyako otieko kwale odok, to nyiyach odoko kidho to jo liwo ma diryo gi mako dwoko gine
I hongo me aka nyaka nyamin nyako kod omin to jo bino
Aka nyaka adhamere tedo kafuta aka nyako no jo chiemo kod nyamin
Me amilwoŋo ni Nyutho nyako chiemo.
To ka fuod jo kochiemo nyamin no imiyogo diel aka omin imiyogo toŋ, aka nyako won imiyo atego ni malogo kod mayawo dhoke.
Wok ndirino to nyako chako chiemo yo pa chwoge no.
Ka gi me orumo, aka nyaka jo thugi nyako jo kelo chiemo iya tawo ga dita.
Chiemo me amilwoŋo ni “Dhoki Nyako.”
To atawo kod adita no kidok gine i weyo ri adha nyako to kano kanyachiel gi ye wiye machango oliel kod lwete machango oŋad.

Gigipiny me ikano kuma diny tek tek, rupir ni ka chomoro nyako no omit eye pecho no, to adhamere moro gye mubed, to lamo nyako no gi gigipiny no; to nyako no bedo kod silwany marach kumu kidho iye, kosa dwoka adwoka ma kogalo.
Tedo Abor:  rumachien ma nywomirok me, baa nyiyach kidho to penjo baa nyako ni mito chiemo maluwo gine tiend dhok.
To baa nyako kwayo baa nyiyach dhiaŋ, to tero rigo.
To baa nyako kwanyo dhiaŋ pere man to neko titedo chiemo madit swa, ti tiŋo iya agonini kweth ti tero yo pa nyiyach gin
Gwendi mere ki thum wich kosa tiende, itedo ateda ameno.
To ŋata otedo abor aka oŋondo lwet gwendi, odoko ripo aripa neko gweno man rumachien ma kwaŋo lwet gwendi no gi tero yo kuma chango oter ye abor no
Dhiaŋ no bende kiyaŋ yo eme i tweyo atweya gi wich kanya chiel titero, me aa atedo Abor.
Aka jomo tiŋo chiemo abor ka jo tero jo wero ni, “Yido wiyuma Abor, Abor ti Orumo.”
KULA MA MINYUR
Kis nono nitye kod kweer mamako kwom minyur, mu pokere opokere, paka atito iy’ Adech II, kwom kis nono.
To kula ma andiko ka ama temo pa riwo kis nono gye i tim mere.
Ka dhako onywol tieko ndelo adek kanyathi manyichwo to ka nyako tieko ndelo aŋwen, aka nyaka nyathi no i wodho woko.

Indelo ma wok no adha minyur fwono boke akendo adek kosa aŋwen paka kweer nitye to donjo i diyo oti maminyur nitye iye, kareno minyur otiŋo nyath i chinge aka ochungo, to goyo madeko minyur didek kosa diŋwen to wodho go gi nyath woko i diodipo.
Me amilwoŋo ni minyur owok.
Aka ndir no amitedo iye magira gi kwon ti chiemo kanyachiel.
Me amilwoŋo ni tedo minyur.
Rumachien jo thugi nyako bende jo kelo moko koŋo, ŋori moŋaki ma magira, kod aditin moko mupoŋ adek aka kareno i kis adita nitye iye muma riŋo.
Adita moko achiel kidho pa Adha minyur, man ma oti pa minyur won, aka man amitedo ndirino.
Ka chiemo ochiek minyur kod nyath jo bedo idhioti aka i kwanyo kwon tiketho iiye magira, tiketho iya lithikwon, ti ŋawo inyim dhioti
Aka kenyo milem minyur wok kuni ka sedela gi tiende achie? ka wero ni, "Ac?a?o, kwon Apipili, Ac?a?o kwon Apipili, Ac?a?o kwon Apipili, Apipili, Apipili"
Aka kenyo milem minyur wok kuni ka sedela gi tiende achiel ka wero ni, “Achamo, kwon Apipili, Achamo kwon Apipili, Achamo kwon Apipili, Apipili, Apipili”
Timo ameno kad dek kosa diŋwen.  Me amilwoŋo ni tedo Apipili.
Me amilwo?o ni tedo Apipili
To nyath mu nywol aka jo thugi mini jo kokelo moko makite me, i chwoko nyinge ni Ongoye, ka nyiyach, kosa ni Angoye kosa Olore ka nyako.
Aka kokel moko aka aditin obedo ŋanda mamoko ko poŋ ka nyath ma nyako i lwoŋo ni Nyaŋanda.
Tim me itimo ri kis nyath manyiyach marapena kod ma nyako marapena kende.
Dwoŋ mere ni ka dhano otieko limo nyath ma nyiyach kod manyako to kweer me rumo.
Aka kopen nywolo rut, kweer makite me ki tim atima swa kwanyowoko i timo ma rut ayino.
KULA MA RUT
Wok chon i Padhola ji mu nywolo rut, ilworo jo swa kendo i ketho kwom jo dwoŋ
Jachwo mere i lwoŋo ni baa wengi aka dhako i lwoŋo ni mini wengi.
Nyithindho rut, kod jo maluwo jo bende i lworo jo kendo ki luw kwom jo kichar kichar pecho no.
Rut nyingi jo kidho ama: kamachwo, mutelo i lwoŋo ni Opio, aka ma luwo Odongo.
Joma luwo rut bende nyingi jo luwere ama, Okello, Omali kosa Omala, Osinde kod Omita
Nyir mere bende i wiro nyingi jo ama: Apio, Adongo, Akello, Amali, Asinde kod Amita.

Ka rut onywolere mu luwere aluwa aryo aryo, nyingi jo i chwoko ama: aryo mu telo i chwoko Opio kod Odongo kosa Apio kod Adongo; aryo mudoko luwo, i chwoko Okello kod Omali/Omala kosa Akello kod Amali; aryo mu doko luwo, i chwoko Osinde kod Omita kosa Asinde kod Amita
To kodoko oluwo rut maraŋwen, ndirino i chwoko nyingi jo ma kis ndelo makiwene ma rut.

Nyithindho rut kod maluwo jo, kichwok jo nyingi jo ma jwok, kwanyo woko i kero akera jo ni jaryo, kendo ka fuod jo thindho ki lwoŋ jo ni nyath kwanyo woko i lwoŋo jo ni nyithdho kada nende bedi achiel.
Ko nywol rut i timo athero aryo, ti miyo nyath okewo tero achiel yo p’omin baa wengi ma nono, aka achiel tero yo p’omini miniwengi ma nono.
To katero athero me ripo kurirok swa, rupir ka wegi pecho muter iye, jo ŋeyo ni go otero athero jo nyalo goyo go tek tek swa, ni rupir otero rijo kayongo
Amumiyo kotundo pecho no, bola bola athero kamoro paka dho oti kosa kwom dero, to kotundo iyo kosa pa jager to oro dhano kidho wacho ri jo pecho no ni ŋatin obayo riwin athero pa ŋadin.
Rumachien mandelo adek, omin baa wengi bino to wodho go woko to ywayo go tero isa kareno ji jo galagasa kod wer gye.
Omin miniwengi, bende timo ameno indirino.
Ndelo no i tedo chiemo, to kima diti, ri ji mubino
Me amilwoŋo ni wodho rut woko.
To ji machango obay ri jo athero ja ryo no, jo penjere paka jo tedi, kosa jo nek dhok kosa diegi, to jo yiko ndelo majokidh yawo rut no.
Jo pecho pa baa wengi kod jo pecho pa mini wengi bende jo penjere paka jo tedi ma yawo rut
Indelo ma yawo ko tundo jo rathero jo tedo chiemo madit swa kod gigipiny majo neko to jo bino gine; kendo kis dhano mawat kenyo kosa ma mere kenyo, aka chiegin, gye tedo chiemo kelo indelo no.
Obedo gi kula ni ka jo rathere jo tundo jo nwaŋo, okewo mu keth kuro kenyo otimo kudho oŋono ochulo gine dhioti pa rut aka jo turo kudhin no gi mbaka aka jo donjo.
Aka jaromin kwanyo go to wodho woko, ti wero wer nono ki mielo i thoko go aka igalagasa; ja nyamin bende timo ameno.
Aka chiemo manende jo rathero jo kelo jo wile awila, to jo dok gine.
Aka ma ji man jo kelo amichano kenyo: Rumachien ti neko nyath gweno ti bulo to ji gye chokere to jo kayo choko gweno no.
Jo rathere jo bino kod aditin mudil iye kwoyo, nyingi kali, ŋor, duma, gi kite chiemo gye aka gigipiny me i chwadere gine ki mielo aka aditin mere bende i wile akidok gine.
Gigipiny madongo i rut:
Okewo muketh tich i rut kidok pecho pere, bedo kenyo tundo kuma jo rathere jo bino jo yawo rut.
Indir madok pere i dhiro go kod kiwulo kwon gi gweno, kiwulo kwon gi riŋo kod ayiga koŋo.
Jayath, ndir madit bedo dhako, go ama bino aka thumo peendi nyithindho aka ywoyo yath to rwako jo i oti.
Indir ko tiek yawo rut, ja yath i dhiro go kod kiwulo kwon aŋwen, degi riŋo aryo, degi gwendi aryo kod dak koŋo achiel.
Jayath me amatero mini wengi yo thugin ka hongo otundo, kendo amatero go timo gigipiny gye ka hongo ma minyur orumo; paka fur, ku1o, tedo, dimoyen, kod rego.
Ki yakedho oti rut, ja yath amabino ko tieko ywoyo yath, gi neko rombo aka i kedho oti no.
Buru Rut
Oti munywol iye rut, buru mere kosa yuk kijow, iweya weya dhure kenyo kada mak wikisuli oti.
To hongo ko tundo jayath bino kelo yath ywoyo iye, to jowo to tero i lul moro
To lul no wok ndirino bedo kweer, ma kidonji iye kosa fur iye.
Kendo buru mere nike kadhano ogeyo kosa onyono to chinge kosa tiende yure doŋ mu bokere abooka.
Jo pecho no rupir jo lwokere gi yath amumiyo buru no kiyuy jo.
Rombo, i oti rut ki eye mini rombo
Me amakuro baa wengi, mini wengi kod nyithindho rut gye, rupir ka jo tho nyath rombo amineko i liend jo akiyiko jo
Tho pa Rut
Ka rut achiel otho kiywak ka man fuod nitye.
Kendo ka jo dongo, aka man tho, nyawote kinen bur pere.
Baa wengi kod mini wengi, ka jo tho i yiko jo othieno swa kareno otiek neko rombo.
Indir mayiko i menya menya bur gi mach, pa chik mere, to kareno bende piny kidho ka chol amumiyo mach mitere.
KULA MA YIKIROK
Chango chon kis nono nitye kod jo milwoŋo jo ni jo Chiembi.
Jo me chango bedo nono man majo mako gi jo mere, ma yikirok, ma ka jotho jo nono no ama jo bino jo kunyo bur kod yiko jo.
Nono ma jo yikere i kite me ma jo Chiembi, jo kilimere ka jo twoo kwanyo woko ka jo tho aka jo bino yikirok
To indir me kula me ti ongoye.
Ti kadhano otho ŋata onwaŋo ama kunyo bur gi yiko, mungoye tito ni ja nono manyo ama yiko nono manyo.
Ka dhano otho, okewo bino to choko kasiki i diodipo to mooko mach
Ka ŋata dwoŋ amutho, i lwoŋo ja fumbo, tongol gi teke to jo bino jo goyo ti mielo ka fuod ŋato nitye idioti
Ki kidho yiko, dhako dwoŋ muti ama lwoko ŋato kod misumiya pendi, aka dhako no tero kiladuk ma dhiaŋ kosa diel mu nek i liend ŋato.
Pyen dhiaŋ kosa diel no bende i liro ye ti ketho i pal chunyi ŋato’tho akiyiko gine.
Yado ja chandi i yiko i boke aka ja ŋaŋo i yiko i pyen.

Ki ketho dhano i bur wiye ŋiyo thenge ma wiy nono pa jo ŋiyo (nen Adech II) to jachwo kod nyath manyichwo i ketho jo gi ŋet jo, ka jo nindo gi ching jo marachuch, aka dhako kosa nyath manyako i ketho jo giŋet jo, aka jo nindo gi ching jo maracham.
Ko tiek yiko dhano, ji pere jo nindo i diodipo wor ka jo kuro kaliel.
Gime chango obedo rupir chango nitye jo jwogi kosa ogwange ma yado bino golo ŋato’tho.
Ri ameno tichako nindo woko kuro kaliel tundo indir mu nen ni dhano otieko topi.
Mati me i kuro tundo chieko mwenge ma kasiki.
Rumachien mandelo adek kanyichwo kosa ndelo aŋwen ka dhako, bedo gi milwoŋo ni liedo kosa pido.
Nen Adech II, Siro 1, jo dongo nono.
Ndirino yado chon nwaŋo ni otiek kidho iiya jwoka openji gi muneko ŋato
Aka ndelo no ama ji pa ŋato jo chokere tito gimokelo tho no.

To ma dwoŋ mere i lielo wiy jo ma kaliel; aka mati me bende andelo miketho iye Misika paŋato, kwano gigipiny pere, chulo banjin pere gi pido jo manitye gi banjin pere, ko nwaŋo ŋato ja chwo majapecho.
Ka ndelo okadho maromo apar gaŋwen i chieko mwenge kosa koŋo milwoŋo ni ma kasiki.
Aka kotiek madho, tineko mach ma diodipo makidok mok.
Ka ndelo odoko oromo pieraryo ga chiel, chuka ŋato tho i dok chieko medho man mi lwoŋo ni ma masanja
Ndirino kotiek math no ti chwinyo masanja machango inindo iiye woko, kareno ochok gye kanyachiel.
Ka oro okadho achiel tundo iyadek, i chieko medho man milwoŋo ni ma kedho oti.
Me bedo pa kalima madwoŋ swa; inyalo neko dhiaŋ kosa diel ti dwooyo medho madit.
Medho me i chako medho othieno tinindo woko, yawere mere i dok madho mu diochieŋ, aka yawere man mere aka i mondo kedho oti, aka nyaka itedo chiemo gi neko gigipiny.
Indir madit i hongo me, ama kaŋata otho obedo ja chwo ak’oweyo dhako kosa mon, dhako no dimo ywore mukur go; i lwoŋo ni mako chingi ŋata go okure gine.
OKELO, me timere rumachien ma oro adek tundo apar.
Kotiek yiko matoke ma mwenge mere, aka onindo ndelo aryo i bur aka nyaka i dwoyo koŋo milwoŋo ni, taangaa.
Ka ndelo okadho achiel nyaka i dwoyo koŋo mathoth mere.
Kotiek dhiŋo matoke ti lwoŋo ja fumbo kod ja goy Okelo, to nyaka i madho koŋo taangaa.
Koŋo me i tero paka apa jodongo machango jo tho pecho no chon.  Me andelo migoye iiye Okelo kod fumbo nindo woko.
Me andelo migoye iiye Okelo kod fumbo nindo woko
Ya were mere ti medho, medho ma dwoŋ tek tek; aka waŋ chieŋ maromo abuŋwen, ti tero Okelo isa amigoyo iiye.
Yo saa no i kidho kod nyath gweno ti neko i tyendi Okelo no ti bulo tichamo; me i lwoŋo ni gweno matheno Okelo.
Rumachien ma miel tek tek yo saa, ti kedhere i waŋ chieŋ maromo apar gachiel
Aka kidwoko wok isa ki woth iyombera ayomba.
Meno agike miel, Okelo.
Aka yawere mere ti neko dhiaŋ ni ri ŋata opunya go no.
To kula me gye mamako kwom yikirok, nonini megi timo ikite mu pokere opokere ye nyakamath, to kareno me apaka gigipiny mere gye luwere.
Kendo, Okelo, igoyo i liend jo dongo kende makiwene nyithindho bende.
KULA MA KERIROK
Jo Padhola yado jo nitye kod kula makero gine dhano; dwoŋ mere ni miyo dhano dwoŋ gi nyingi jo man weyo nyinge ma kis ndelo i lwoŋo gine.
Moni ndirino jo asa kero gine ywoch jo
Aka chwo jo asa kero gine mon pajo ma jo asa mito.
Aka nyir kod yach bende jo kerere ka jo mitere.
Gima dwoŋ, kerirok nyutho mitirok kod miyirok dwoŋ.
Ker ma pa jo Luli kod jo Mawele yado megi opokere to kareno pokirok mere bedo ri wach achiel achiel, kosa wiro nyingijo nwaŋo man mikero kite man aka man bende i kero i kite man.
Ranyuth ma kerirok manitye ka oruwere aruwa mungoye tito ni me ma yo Mawele kosa me ma yo Luli.
Nyingijo megi ma nya nono kosa ma jwok ma pecho ongoye kod ker mere.
Kendo nyingijo megi bende ongoye kod ker, aka ker megi riwo nyingijo mu more omore.
Ker ma rut
Wengi kosa jaryo
Me apaka ikero rut machwo kod mamoni  gye kod ji maluwo rut gye.
Ri nyingi rut nen adech III
Baa wengi kosa baa jaryo
Nyichwo munywolo rut
Mini wengi kosa min jaryo
Dhako munywolo rut
Ker pa mon
Ker pa Chwo
KULA M' AKISILI
Akisili dwoŋ mere ni tuko gala makisangala mategino, mapa jo moneno nyikway jo; kendo manyutho ni jo no jo misen majo nyalo lweny ri piny pa jo mungoye lworo tho kada di chiel.
Akisili yado bedo kis ka oro okadho aryo, aka ŋata otieko kisila kidok sila madiryo, dwoŋ mere ni dhano sila dichiel kende i kwo pere.
Kwanyo woko ka dhano onwaŋo hongo pere otundo ma kisila to ŋato tho kosa twoo, kenyo jo dongo Akisili jo dimo wode kosa omin to sila rigo i kabedo pere.
Ŋata odim kisila ri nyawote i kite me amanyalo kisila diryo i kwo pere; i hongo pere won kod i hongo mu dim iye go kisila ri dhano mani no.
Akisili chango i tero pa gi madwoŋ swa kendo ŋata osila i lworo go tek tek kendo i ketho kwome dwoŋ kis kuma okidho iye.
Ka oro m’Akisili otundo jo dongo m’Akisili jo chokere to jo dimo miworo majo ya kisila; aka kis adech pinyi dimo ja dwoŋ ma yachoko wadi; to jo yiko ndelo kod ka bedo miya kisila iye.
Ŋata odim kisila wok i hongo no, go gi dhako pere kosa moni pere jo kidok jo tiyi tich moro gye paka fur, tedo, kwath, kosa dwar, kwanyowoko ki waya awaya kod chiemo achiema kende.
Ndirino ŋato dimo jagin paka welo pa mon pere nitye aka jono ama jo tiyo rijo tich gye.
Jago kosa jagin me jo nyalo bedo majo nono pere kosa majo nono man.
I ndelo ma kisili kis ja kisili timo powin aryo aryo to jo kidho gine iy’abaar miya kisila iye gi mon pajo gi jagin pajo.
Iy’abaar no yach mamiworo bende to jo bino gi powin; aka jo no ama jo chwadere gi jor’Akisili.
To kada nende ameno yach me ki kwan jo ni bende jor’Akisili.
Ka jo gye jo tieko chokirok kenyo, to dhano achiel wok yo thende pa jor’Akisili kidho omo iyi yach, aka thenge pa yach bende bino omo iyi jor’Akisili.
To gima wok iye thenge aryo no gye to jo ay jo chako chwadirok gi powo.
To kada nende i chwadere ameno ki dhaw kosa mako ŋonge.
Ichwadere achwada swa, swa, ma ji man jo nyalo tho kir gi tho.
To konen dhano mulachere swa ka mon jo bino jo podho kwome ti weyo ŋato.
Chwadirok me chako wok waŋ chieŋ maromo aboro kosa abuŋwen tundo apar kosa apar ga chiel; aka ka ji ooli ja dwoŋ achiel bino to poko jo ti, weyo chwadirok ti bolo powin no kanya chiel ti dok.
To ŋata luth oniaŋ kwome i wiro go gi woyo dhiaŋ to chango achanga swa makudoko otwo.
Rumachien ma ndelo maromo apar ga ŋwen, ji musila gye odoko jo chokere isa iy’abaar machango jo chwadere iye gi powo.
Aka kis ŋata osila tero thwon (mirikwa kiter), m’omin amuwodho rigo
dwoŋ mere ni ŋata osila won, ki wodh dhiaŋ pere won.
Dhok me i chielo achiela, aka nyaka i yaŋo, ti chamo gi sa koro, jo musila gye kanya chiel gi jo nonini pajo gi ji pajo.
To kis ŋata osila gye dok kod eme aryo ma dhiaŋ pere.
Aka jago kosa jagin pere ama jo tero kidho tholo riŋo no gye, mu ngoye rwenyo kada muma achiel; ma korwenyo kada muma achiel jagin no jo chulo achula dhiaŋ.
Kariŋo othwo aka jo kelo bothi rwoth pajo to nyaka miyo jo riŋo megi, to mudoŋ to won chamo.
Bedo jago me rumo ka tich m’Akisili orumo
To wok hongo no tundo tho jo bedo mere madwoŋ pecho no.
Aka kada nende chango jago no ko bedo wat makenyo bedo abeda pa nyath ma oti, mudoko ki nywom nyako makenyo
Kendo jago kod rwoth pere jo kidhaw tundo tho, rupir ni ka ŋat man odhaw gi nyawote to ŋat man no tho.
Aka jumosila won bende jo bedo mere madwoŋ ma tundo tho; kis gimoro paka dwar kod lweny, gye jo bedo i kitipa achiel.
KULA MA CHIELO ONDEGA KOD GOYO ABILO
Chielo Ondega kod Goyo Abilo me chango obedo tuko ma fuonjo gine yach manyaka jo ayi, ndijo ma lweny, dwar kod kuro jo kwor.
Tuko aryo me gye chango i timo rumachien ma fwono ŋor dwoŋ mere pama dinyo water ni idwe ma October tundo February ka piny othwo.
Aka i tuko yo sa iya’baar.
Koro ama yach ma loka man jo romo iye kod yach ma loka man aka jo tuko i kite ma piem.
Bedo jodongo ma jo kidho kod jo, ma jo fuonjo jo kod thumo piem no.
Yach ma jo nenere ni jo nyalo chielo ondega kod goyo abilo maber, meno amichako nyiewo rijo bidhi kod tonge ma lweny kosa ma dwar.
Chielo Ondega
Ondega bedo yath mudoli aka omin pa thach malach paka ma chueyo gine peendi dero.
Yach ma jo kidho chielo jo chanere yo thenge achiel kareno kis ŋata chiel nitye kod thiri
Aka jadwoŋ mu tiŋo ondega bedo yo waŋ jo bor bor ye to dwiro ondega; aka nyaka kis nyiyach i weso pere bayo thiri pere chielo ondega mu dwir no.
Jo loka ma jo asa chielo ondega meno amajo loyo.
Tuko me yado fuonjo jo chielo gimoro gi toŋ kosa bidhi kada gino onwaŋo nitye bor kosa onwaŋo ringo
Aka tuko me chale kod apa Wasungu milwoŋo ni, Javelin.
Goyo Abilo
Abilo bedo yath matek, mu pay mu ŋini aka romi mere bedo mu ripo oripo ye
I goyo kod yath bende ma bor ye mu pay moŋinere, ma chale kod luth abiro ma dwoŋ.
I tuko me jo loka man kod jo loka man jo laro abilo no ka jo goyo gi 1udhe, aka loka mu laro aka jo tero yo thenge ma pajo loka man, meno ama jo loyo.
Tuko me chale kod apa Wasungu milwoŋo ni, Hockey.
Aka ama yado fuonjo yach goyo ludhe.
KULA MA LWENY KOD DWAR
Lweny: Chango kis adech bedo kod jadwoŋ mere matelo jo i lweny.

Jadwoŋ no bedo kod gwara, aka kiya kidho lweny kosa dwar to goyo gwara, to mon ma iyadech no jo chako tedo piyo piyo ri chwogijo majo kidho lweny; aka jo lweny bende to jo wodho tonge to jo pako i witele miketho yo migami, (nen Adech III, Siro 2 (ii
Migami me bedo ma kis pecho aka i migami ma dwoŋ apa kwar jo ama bedo iye tele no.
Kis pala mathumo gi moro gye, kod tonge ma lweny kod ma dwar gye i pako i tele no.
Kotiek pako tonge tichomo romigam, tikidho chiemo.
Kowok chiemo ti kwanyo tonge gi kwoot ti kadho akadha yo iiy’abaar kuma jadwoŋ lweny oyiko chokirok iiye.
Gwara odoko ywak ma nyutho chokirok me.
Aka jadwoŋ lweny kotieko goyo gwara ma choko ji, to chulo dhok gwara no to bolo yo tie1o yo tiend kitanda; rupir gwara no kikidh gine yo lweny.
Wok iy’abaar muchokere iye, jo lweny jo wok iye gi ŋwech kidho kuma lweny nitye iye, kareno ji jo tieko chokiroki madit, wok ithenge gye gye.
Ka jo turo lweny, aka jo yaka gigipiny koro, kis nono dwoko kawero wer kirembe pajo; to ka otur jo i dwoko adwoka aked aked mu liŋ aliŋa; aka ka ji pajo onek i dwoko mi wero wer tho.
Yado ŋata oyaka gi moro yo lweny paka, dhiaŋ, diel, rombo, gwendi, i chwoko nyinge ma pako go ki chungo kwom gino kod chalirok ma del mere.
Giranena, ŋata oyaka le i lwoŋo Ayepa, gweno i lwoŋo Ikoro, rombo i lwoŋo Adusa, dhiaŋ omuye ilwoŋo ni Imuye.
Aka ŋata omak yo lweny i lwoŋo ni Otoŋ, dwoŋ mere ni tonge amo’kelo go.
Jo Padhola chango jo misen tek tek i wach ma lweny, amumiyo lweny madit gye chango jo turo (nen Adech I, Siro 2).

Nenere ni miseni kod turo lweny me chango bino ri gigipiny aryo; marapena ri chowo were pajo, kis ka jo kidho lweny jo ripo chowo Were kod lamirok i migam, kendo kis ka jo turo lweny kosa jo yaka gi moro jo ripo chowo ki fuoyo Were, gi lamo gigipiny mu yaka no i migam ka fuod kocham gino
Mararyo, chango wok kwom yen ma lweny machango jo gwere gine, jo kudhere gine, odoko jo madho.
Ŋata olwenyo tek tek chango i neno ri gwer pere, i dioŋeye gipi i ŋete gipi, bade gye kod iiye.
Rupir yado kadhano oneko ji yo lweny dwoko gwere gi yath, aka gwer madit ma kite no nyutho ni ŋato ti oneko ji madit swa yo lweny.
Jomo gwere kosa jomo madho yath lweny yado i lworo jo swa, kendo i ketho kwom jo dwoŋ madit.
Nyithindho yado kituk kwom jo; kendo jo kinen nyathi ma nyaka onywol, kajo neno to nyathi no tho kosa two tek tek.
Dwar: kula ma dwar joboth jorom gi ku1a ma lweny.
Koyik kidho dwar ŋata chiel bende, maja tel milwoŋo ni ja Kituka dwar, amagoyo gwara kosa sosi; man manyutho pako tonge giketho dhomigam kod chiemo, aka man manyutho kadho kumikidho iye dwar.
Gwara no kosa sosi bende kikidh gine yo dwar.
To kis dwar gye i ripo woth kod tonge kwoot gi bwo.
Kotundi isa ti yaro kosa ichiko bwo, ti pokere kadiryo, jo man jo kidho teŋo ku manende lee no kosa ogwaŋ no ni iye gi leko obin i bwo jono ilwoŋo jo ni jowaheyi
Aka jo man jo doŋ kuro bwo ma kati lee otund’iye to jo nwoyo , jo me i lwoŋo jo ni jo walindi.
jo nwoyo rupir me i kwano paka nek pa bwo
Ko nek lee no, jowaheyi jo tero bati gi ŋet; ja nwoch tero bat achiel kende; aka won bwo amatero i kabedo pa ja nek, tero eme aryo pien gi wich.

To ka obedo nek ma bwo ongoye iiye, dwoŋ mere ni makochik bwo, ja pen chwowo milwoŋo ni janek tero eme aryo, pien gi wich aka ja chwowo mararyo milwoŋo ni ja nwoyo tero bati achiel aka bati man kod ŋet i poko jo man gye majo bino idwar no.
Ka lee mukidh dwaro no obedo ma dwoŋ paka kwach kosa Jow, ŋata open chwowo doka doka pecho pere kidok bed kenyo.
Aka konek ogwaŋ no i luwo aluwa gine go yo pecho pere akipoko; rupir ndirino bedo ogwaŋ pere.
Janek i dwar gye, kodok gi migewo pere, ka fuod kochamo thumo riŋo mathin to tero yo migam to lamo ri Were gi Jwogi gye mumiyo go silwany mago onyalo gine kelo Kirembe pecho.
Kitabo Marapena
Wafwoyo swa ji jye, somero ma Siwa kod Miganja Praimari.
Okoth Mariko omo kitabo me ma fwonjo Dhopadhola ri nyithindho ma praimari.
Medo nyayo kitabo me ri fwonji maber swa.
Bende inyalo nwaŋo kitabo me .
Kitabo me nitye gi kigana kod gikipiny ma fwonji ondiko dwe marabiryo tundo dwe marabuŋwen, 2002.

Muchungwa ochiek mito afwona.
Aŋo ma mwonyo yokin tineno?
Opiyo otelo Odongo kimaki.
Adhadha langa langa i pendi.
Antiye gi muchungwa paran i dier malawa.
Aka kenyo nitye jajwok.

Abedo aŋo?

Gimumiyo Gwendi Lworo Otengo
Chango chango, gweno jomako mere kod katateŋ.
Mere pajo obedo matek swa ma kisi gimoro jye jo kwayere.
Ndelo achiel gweno oayi to kidho pa otengo to kwayo go piso ma kwoyo nanga.
Munyo gweno odwoko gi piso to kwoyo gine nanga.
Munyo ochowo kwoyo nanga, to kano piso i ot.
Otengo okuro ni gweno odwoki ri go piso pere to gweno kudwoko.
Ndelo achiel otengo won otiŋere to kidho pa gweno penjo go piso pere.
Gweno oayi to kidho kama chango no go okano i iye piso to kunwaŋo.
Gweno oparo gima go owachi ri jawodhe to ngoye.
Rumacheni gweno owacho ri otengo ni "Piso orwenyo ran kama aketho i iye
Weyi doko, alatemo rango, ka anwaŋo alakelo rin.
Gweno otemo atema yaro piny ni rango ri otengo piso pere to kwero nwaŋo kiri dikin.
Woki ndelo no kiri konon mere pa gweno kod otengo tu tho atha.
Meno amomiyo ineno gweno yaro piny munyo rango ri otengo piso pere.
Aka bende amomiyo otengo chamo nyithindhi gwendi ri piso pere ma gweno orwenyo.
Lwaŋino gi Awino
Obedo ndelo achiel Awino okidho i sikul, to neno lwaŋino.
Lwaŋino oido opie i kor ot ma sikul.
To lwaŋino penjo go ni, "Ikidho i kilas perin?"
To godwoko, "Eei akidho i kilas."
To lwaŋino wacho ni "Kale, abende, akidho i kilas."
Lwaŋino omedo luwo ni, "Awino, kidonjo i kilas. "
Ikiri nenan; ikiri luwi; ikiri nur.
To neni anena kitabo perin."
Munyo gosoma kitabo pere i sikul, to goneno lwaŋino i kor ot.
To godiyo nyawote ma bedo gine i kom to wacho ri go ni, "Neni lwaŋino no, goluwo."
To dichiel lwaŋino to pie i waŋe, to nyutho jafwonji pere.
Munyo wacho ni, "Lwaŋino ni waŋan, jafwonji konyan, ikwanyi ran!"
Jafwonji to konjo pi i kikopo to wacho ni, "Yawi waŋin."
To lwoko waŋe to lwaŋino wok i waŋe to ayi to kadho.
To ayi to pie i dirisa to bedo iwi dirisa to lwoko waŋe gi tiende.
Pusi kod Oyeyo
Chango chango, obedo Pusi kod Oyeyo to jomakere mere.
Pusi kod Oyeyo jonyewo modhiaŋ pajo to joketho i dak to joŋawo kisalaka.
Ndelo achiel Pusi oromo kod Oyeyo to penjo go ni "Ojame, iwok yukune?"
Oyeyo owacho rigo ni "Awok kibatisa nyathi paran."
Pusi openjo go ni "Ibatisa go ni ŋa?"
Oyeyo odwoko ni "Abatisa go ni Onaŋo-de-onaŋo-de-oweyo-i-ganga."
Ndelo man doko Pusi oromo kod Oyeyo to penjo go ni "Ojame, iwok yukune?"
Oyeyo odwoko ni "Awok kibatisa nyathi paran."
Pusi openjo ni "Ibatisa go ni ŋa?"
Oyeyo odwoko go ni "Abatisa go ni Onaŋo-de-onaŋo-de-oweyo-i-kore."
Oyeyo odwoko go ni "Awok kibatisa nyathi paran."
Oyeyo odwoko ni "Abatisa go ni Onaŋo de onaŋo de olwindo."
Ndelo achiel Pusi owacho ri Oyeyo ni "Wakidhi walimi mo mawan."
Oyeyo oayi to pondo ri Pusi.
Pusi won to ayi kidho limo mo kama ndelago jokano iye.
Munyo Pusi otundo onwaŋo anwaŋa dak nono
Mo ongoye iye kada nyaka mathin.
Pusi odok to kidho rango Oyeyo wacho rigo paka mo ma chango jokano i dak ongoye kada nyaka mathin.
Munyo Oyeyo oneno Pusi obino, Oyeyo oringo to pondo.
Pusi owacho ni "Iraŋo Oyeyo onenan to pondo?"
Nyutho ni go ama onaŋo mo ma wakano.
Wok ndelo no Pusi kuneno Oyeyo to neko aneka to chamo.
Oyeyo bende koneno Pusi ringo aringa to pondo munyo lworo Pusi.
Kwach gi Gweno
Chango chango, gwendi gi ogwaŋe jobedo mere swa tek tek.
Gwendi gi ogwaŋe jo jye oido jobedo, jochiemo, jonindo i dudi.
To dichiel kwach omito tedo ri nyithindhe chiemo to mach ongoye.
To kwach poyo dichiel paka joliesa gi wod gweno kwoŋ gima mako mach.
To munyo kwach okidho to nwaŋo wod gweno ongoye tichiko, godwoko othieno.
Munyo kwach odoko ogik mararyo, kareno chie? liel swa.
To kwach dok, kuro kir othieno munyo piny okwe to doko gik.
Maradek to nwaŋo wod gweno munyo nindo.
To temo chiewo go, to wod gweno konyalo chiewi.
To kenyo paro bino ri kwach ma kwalo mach.
To dimo lum mothwo swa ma nyalo moko piyo piyo.
To choko, munyo otieko choko to tiŋo.
Okidho kama wod gweno nindo iye.
Munyo otundo to ketho lum i wiye wod gweno mach komoko.
Mararyo to doko ketho mach doko koliel.
Maradek kwach rume to ruda aruda lum i kokoliro wod gweno jye doko mach koliel.
To wod gweno chiewi.
To neno kwach, obedo chiegin bothi.
To wacho ri kwach ni, "Ikiri chore chiegin."
Ayawaŋin gi mach ma wiyan.
To yengo wiye munyo bwoko kwach paka lawaŋo go.
Kwach koringo kosa kodhire gi chien.
To kwach wacho ri wod gweno ni, "Gima ni wiyin no, kimach, itwodo."
Gi kenyo to kwach lokere ri wod gweno mager.
To mito kiri mako wod gweno oneki ri twodo pere.
To wod gweno wire gi ŋwech munyo koko ri gwendi wadi jye ni "Kok kok kudee!"(loki Dhopadhola 'Kawagalo kadagala, ilaneko wan!')
To joŋwecho gi ŋwech madit swa.
Wok ndir no gwendi joringo wok i dudi kama oido jobedo iye.
Kiri gonyo gwendi bedo bothi ji.
Wor jonindo i ot munyo jolworo ogwange.
Ochulu gi ŋech
Kigana pa Ochulu gi ŋech (gimumiyo ŋech nindo i kero).
Chango chango, obedo Ochulu gi ŋech to jomako mere.
Ndelo achiel to ŋech wacho ri Ochulu ni okwaŋi go wendo pa ore.
Ochulu bende to yeyo.
Munyo ndelo otundo to joayi kadho wendo.
Munyo jonitye i royo Ochulu ochungo to wacho ri mere pere ni, "Paka wakidho pa or wakiri waor nyingi wan ma kisindelo.
Wachwok nyingi wan man ma olwoŋi gine wan."
ŋech bende kokwero.
Ochulu to wacho ri vech oteli yero nyinge.
ŋech to yero nyinge ni 'Jadwong' to Ochulu to yero nyinge ni 'Wendo.'
Munyo jotundo pa or ŋech, ti fwoyo gi neno jo swa.
Munyo jopecho jowacho ni, "Wafwoyo swa gi neno wendo."
Ochulu to wacho ri ŋech, "Ofwoyi gi nenan kendan."
To won pecho doko wacho ni, "Keli win ri wendo kom."
Ochulu to wacho ni, "Meno jye kom paran."
Doko ti wacho ni, "Keli win ri wendo koŋo."
Ochulu to wacho ni, "Meno jye koŋo paran." to madho woko jye kende.
To i kelo chiemo kareno ŋech kech neko go tek tek swa.
To jokidho logo woko, munyo jodwoko chiemo chingi ŋech oido koch paka go patho apatha i lowo.
Ochulu to wacho ri go ni "Ojame neni chingin paka koch."
Ikiri i kwo ti wiyan pa or, kidhi doko ilogi."
To ŋech kidho logo kareno mere pere Ochulu chiemo swa piyo piyo.
Munyo ŋech odwoko i dhuweri odoko chinge onwaŋo opoŋiye lowo rupir gowotho gi chinge.
Odoko Ochulu wacho ri go ni ogik ologi.
Munyo odwoko onwaŋo Ochulu ochowo chamo woko chiemo jye.
Ma Odoŋi jye orwako i mugowa(kikapo) pere.
Ochulu to lwoŋo, "Wegi pecho omo sendere."
To josewila jo to jodok ma nyawote kochiemo.
Munyo jotundo i royo to ŋech gak i dudi ni iye riemo, to ŋwecho yo wiyi Ochulu to lokere simon.
Ochulu munyo otundo kama di simon to gweyo munyo wacho ni, "Me ŋech won ama rendere."
To ŋech doko ŋwecho aŋwecha malo kama chipa Ochulu ofuro iye to lokere ombokoro.
Munyo Ochulu otundo i ndelo to neno ombokoro, okwako dimo to ketho i mugowa pere ka wacho ni,  "Min Awoi me miŋi swa oweyo ombokoyo pa nyathi payan i ndeyo ka."
Munyo otundo pecho owacho ri min Awor konjo woko fufa ma nwaŋo otedo.
To oro Awor omo mugowa ma nende odwoko gine.
Awor otemo tiŋo mugowa to wacho ni mugowa pek swa.
To Ochulu wacho ri dhako pere min Awor kidho omo mugowa.
Dhako pere bende konyalo tiŋo mugowa.
To gowon kidho.
Onwaŋo mugowa pek swa, to tiŋo gi meni to wodho i diedipo.
Munyo oyawo mugowa to ŋech woki gi ŋwechi.
To Ochulu joriemo swa tek tek to ŋech ŋwecho to yombo jo to donjo i kero.
Amomiyo pama ŋech bwoki paro ni Ochulu fwodi riemo go.
ŋech ŋwecho to donjo i kero.
Merin Adek
Chango chango, obedo Wakafundo, Alur, kod Kagujuguju.
Jobedo merin matek.
Ndelo achiel Wakafundo, Alur kod Kogujuguju joayi to jokidho i katale nyewo dhiaŋ
Munyo jotieko nyewo dhiaŋ pajo to joayi dwoko, koth madwoŋ to chako chwe.

Abothi ran weyi akidhi awachi ri wadan ichowo wan konon, inwaŋo ma riek
Buliri
Chango chango, i piny moro obedo ogwaŋ ma ilwongo ni Buliri
Ochamo ji otieko i piny no, to kere oweyo dhako acheil kende
Dhako no onwaŋo ni gi iye
Munyo ndelo otundo ma nywol, to nywolo nyithindho aryo rut jo jye yach
Munyo nyithindho no jodongo to oliesa rijo kwoŋ ogwaŋ no ma ilwoŋo ni Buliri
Paka ochamo ji otieko kendo, paka ogwaŋ no rach kendo ger swa
Nyithindho no jopenjo ni, "Ogwaŋ no nitye kune?"
To owacho rijo ni, "Nitye i lul madongo cha"
To jowacho ni, "Wakinyali neko?"
Okweri rijo paka ogwaŋ cha ger swa, "Kir an inywolo win apondo aponda"
Jowacho ni, "Kale, weyi watemi"
Nyithindho no jochako thedho tonge mabith swa kendo kweth
Munyo joromo i ndelo achiel odikin swa
To jowacho ri min jo ni, "Mama lwoŋi ri wan Buliri, to kubino ibedi yuŋeyi wan"
Min jo to wacho ri nyithindho pere munyo lworo swa ni, "A!  Nyithindho paran, ogwaŋ ago ger swa bino tieko wan kendo obokere ma chulo piny"
Winonyali?
Nyithindho no jowacho ni, "Lwoŋi ri wan"
Min jo ochako wer kalwoŋo Buliri ama:
"Buliro buliri buliriye buliri"
Opiyo gi Odongo Buliri nyuka chango anywoli jo Buliri, fwodi jokuneniye Buliri, biye joneniniye Buliri owero ameno dikweth
Kani jokidho neno piny obokere pa mach ogwaŋ otundo mager swa min jo opondo yuŋeyi yach nyaka ni wokayi Opiyo, Odongo to chwowi ni wowire ri Odongo, Opiyo to chwowi wire meno dikweth
Munyo olach kere bende onwa?o luwo to wacho ama ni, "Kafwodi akitho timi win, ama ŋadi win lwetan mathi me ji ma chango achamo jo, jowowok, aka atho
Jotimo ameno
Adieri ji jowok swa i iye ogwaŋ
Rumachien dhako ma oti achiel munyo owok to odoko wacho ni, "O!  Wiyan owili gi churo paran i iy' ogwa?
Weyi agik akidhi aomi churo
Munyo odonjo kendo i iye ogwaŋ
To ogwaŋ to tho to ŋolo dhakodwoŋ me i iye
Kunyalo woki kendo otho koro
Meno min nyithindhi gi rut pere jowinjo siem kendo jotero piny paka piny pajo kendo jomuwok i iye ogwaŋ jofwoyo jo swa madit mere jobedo wade pajo
Aweyo ran josangala to adwoko ran
Kibate
Chango chango, obedo jal ma ilwoŋo ni Kibate
Kibate me omako mere gi nyawote
Munyo onwaŋo jolimere swa, Kibate kidho limo mere pere
Mere pere bende bino limo Kibate
Ndelo achiel munyo Kibate otieko kidho limo mere, munyo odwoko obedo piny to paro ama, "Bedi achaki geto ot man manyien kamere paran bino won waŋan, anitye i ot manyien"
Ameno won Kibate ochako geto kendo mapiyo swa
Yiko kageto kunyo, chano, tweyo, bolo, umo gi rwadho, fuyo chwado piny meno jye orumo
Kani Kibate kidho neno to limo balwa pa mere pere kawacho rigo paka bino limo go
Kibate osangala swa paka mere bino munyo ochowo geto ot pere
Ameno won to mere bino limo go, Kibate osangala swa to rwako mere pere i ot manyien
Mere ouro swa Kibate to wacho rigo ni, "Kibate, igeto nedi ot manyien me ma ikiwacho ran abini, akonyini! "
Aneni malo ka orem gute achiel
Munyo chiemo ana Kibate, "Chimi achima ran ameno ayombere ayombo atoŋ gute achiel, akeli wakethi kenyo"
Kibate oweyo mere pere chimo omako le gi thach kidho toŋo gute
Munyo otundo isa, onwaŋo gute mulile swa, obolo thach piny omako le nyaka ni otoŋ gute
Ana gute, "Kibate, ikiri itoŋan weyan"
Kibate obwok swa, to medere gi ŋwech dwaro gute man
Munyo omedere to doko nwaŋo gute adek mulile maber swa
Obolo thach piny mako le ni wotoŋ achiel kwoŋ gute me
Ana gute ni, "Kibate, ikiri itoŋan"
Toŋ mecha mere, ni wotoŋ mecha mere, ana mecha ni, ikiri itoŋan
Nyuka jye oluwo gi Kibate
Kibate obwok swa to Kibate chako achaka ŋwech i dudi kichar
Munyo fwodi ŋwecho kichar ameno to nwaŋo thwol madwoŋ swa manigi wich mere awuchiel
Wich no jye oluwo gi Kibate
Wich marapena to wacho ri Kibate ama, "Kibate ikiri inyonan"
Mararyo owacho ni, "Kibate nyonin to kunenin"
Maradek owacho ni, "Kibate lauro win"
Mara?wen owacho ni, "Kibate weyo uro gi muneno to uro win"
Marabich owacho ni, "Weyi win Kibate okadhi"
Marawuchiel owacho ni, "Kibate fwodi ni chandirok"
Munyo Kibate owinjo wach no jye, to nyaka chore kichar to neno kama nitye i iye pendi kano chiko ithe to winjo luwo korago swa
To rwayo ni, "Kono jo ma luwo no jomedho, amadhiye gimoro"
Kani tundo onwaŋo ni kere joyiko dhano, timako Kibate tiketho ibur, tinwaŋo vata otho me, tiketho malo iwi Kibate, tichako yiko jo
Wor munyo otundo jogoli jomotho
Munyo jobino to jochako lwoŋo ŋata otho me, kani jokidho neno jomotho me jowok jaryo to jouro swa to jowacho ri Kibate ni wotiŋ jatho
Kibate otiŋo jatho me kir pecho pajo no tundo, to wachi rigo ni woyaŋi
To Kibate penjo jo ni, "Wiy yaŋo g' aŋo?"
Ana jo ni, "Gi pala"
Odoko penjo jo ni, "Aka bende yanja ri win? "
An bende, atiyo tich me
Nende wi nwaŋan munyo aomo gikipiny, to bedi nende wiwachi ran gima ayaŋo gine
Nende aneno i dhoyo kacha manago ama yanja swa
Ti oro go ni, "Kidhi iomi"
Kibate oringo, ringo ma kichutho
Munyo otundo i dudi koro to nwaŋo obwol otwi ofudho obwol no
To odoko nwaŋo kasiki moro, otiŋo kasiki no
Munyo wacho ni omoki gine mach aoyo
Munyo fwodi wotho to romo gi jamilalo moro, kere jamilalo no okwali dhiaŋ pere
To obwol ma Kibate otiŋo to lokere riŋo ma chil to kasiki to lokere wich dhiaŋ
Milalo to mako Kibate munyo goyo ndur swa kir pa rwoth tundo pa rwoth marapena riŋo olokere obwol
Wich dhiaŋ olokere kasiki
Ameno Kibate oloyo banja jamilalo ojulira
Kokidhi pa rwoth man
Jamilalo loyo banjo
Munyo kendo kidhi pa rwoth man, Kibate oloyo banja
Ameno ameno ato wire awira obwol gi kasiki wire awira kir pa kere
To banja loyo Kibate tibolo Kibate i jera
Kareno yupa kere nitye ogwa manigi mach itunge
Aka i oro jujera omo mach no, jokidwok
Kogwaŋ no openjo jo ni, "Wachi ran gima itieko neno, jokiluwi meno to jodoŋ adoŋa kenyo"

Munyo oori go to munyo otundo both ogwaŋ, ogwaŋ openjo go ni wowachiye rigo gima okelo go i jera, to Kibate chako, paka omako mere, paka ogeto ot, paka mere okidho limo go, gi paka mere owacho rigo paka gute oremi, otiŋo le gi thach kidho toŋo gute
Oweyo mere chimo malo gi paka yen oluwo gi go paka obwok to ringo kichar paka onwa?o thwol ma jawich awuchiel
Wich no jye kis achiel oluwo gi go
Paka oringo nyuka otundo kama i yiko i iye dhano oŋeyo ni, 'Kono imedho'
Munyo oyik go gi dhano no, munyo obin golo ŋato yiki no to jowok jaryo
Omiyi go tiŋo mulambo no kir pecho pa jome
Omiyi go yaŋo jatho cha, rieko muthumo nyuka oori go omo gi yaŋo
Paka onwaŋo obwol gi kasiki, otiŋo to romo gi mulalo ma okwal dhiaŋ pere
Paka obwol gi kasiki jolokere rigo
Banja ma okelo go pa kere to ogwaŋ to nyiero anyiera swa to podho piny
To tungi ogwaŋ ma dimach to tur, to kwanyo to tero ri kere
Munyo kere oneno go gi mach no, kere osangala swa munyo otito ri kere gima obedo
Kere omiyo go sanduku ma pesa kir gi motoka mukwaŋo go kir pecho pere
Onwaŋo anwaŋa mere pere cha fwodi chimo achima malo wi ot kama gute ongoye i iye
Adongi ran kari olwa pa nera
Kilagwech gi Ogwal
Chango chango, obedo Kilagwech gi mere pere, Ogwal
Ikiliesa pajo, kis dhano opakere gi nger ma woth pere
Paka Ogwal wotho i pi, to Kilagwech wotho i hongo malo
Otundo kir munyo kiliesa olokere piem
Ana Kilagwech ni, "Ogwal weyi ramo chunyan"
An aringo i hongo kendo aringo swa, inyalo yomban nedi?
Ameno won kole piem ochakere ma ochikere ndelo ma piem ŋwech wobedi iye ato sabit achiel yunyi me
Mafwodi sabit no kurumo kere Ogwal odonjo i pi winjirok gi ogwale wadi ni ?ata owinjo ka Kilagwech wacho ni, "Kururu Ogwal, ayombin ba, odwoki wach achiel achiel"
Kende ni, "ŋa?"
Ameno kis Ogwal jye ma pi joniaŋ wach me dwoko ni, "ŋa, ŋa"
Ameno ndelo otundo ma chako ŋwech
Jodongo ma jokidho neno ŋwech me jotundo
Firimbi gi kwano orumo Ogwal odonjo i pi to nywongo rigo gi kenyo to Kilagwech ringo pa tho
Munyo otundo kumogo koro to nyaka wodho dwonde ni pakere wacho ri Ogwal ni "Kururu Ogwal, ayombin, ba!"
Ogwal odwoko go malo swa ni, "ŋa?"
Odoko Kilagwech oringo swa to doko koko malo swa ni, "Ogwal ayombin, ba!"
Ogwal odwoko go ni, "ŋa?"
Kilagwech odoko ameno dwonde aŋwen, marabich
Munyo wiye wiro go swa to podho i pi to chako nywongo wi pi
Otemo lwoŋo Ogwal moth moth
Munyo kidho tho Ogwal kiwinji rumachien mere to Ogwal oneno
Munyo Kilagwech otho otop miyin ato piem gi jarieko itho mikwiya
Orumo ameno
Malo gi Gimoro
Chango chango, obedo jachwo ma ilwoŋo ni 'Malo' gi Yach gi nyir pere i malo no
Obedo bende man ma ilwoŋo ni 'Gimoro'
Gimoro no kareno nitye i piny ka
Ndelo achiel, yach pa Malo jomito bino i piny kiwayaye
Munyo jotundo i piny jonwaŋo jachwo no ma ilwoŋo ni Gimoro
Go won kende gi dhiaŋ pere bende achiel
Jopenjo go ni, "Inika kendin ichamo aŋo?"
Jalo owacho rijo ni, "An nigi dhiaŋ paran me"
Aka ka obolo woyo am' achamo
Tidok penjo go ni, "To imadh' aŋo?"
Ana go ni, "Dhiaŋ paran me, ama ka olayo, ama lach mere amadho"
Jo no jouro swa gima jowinjo no
Munyo jotieko kiliesa ameno to jodok
Tundo pecho joliesaye ri bajo, Malo
To Malo uro swa bende
Ndelo achiel jowacho wegi ni, "Wakidho dwaro dhiaŋ pa Gimoro"
Ameno won to joayi kidho kwalo dhiaŋ pa Gimoro to jodwoko gine
Kareno bajo nigi dhok madit swa i chiel pere
Gimoro ochandere swa kech gi riyo hongo ma lach swa, munyo Gimoro kwiya, ni dhiaŋ pere nitye kune
Kareno dhiaŋ no onywol kendo nyithindhe oromo
Yach no wegi jogik wacho ri Gimoro paka joŋeyo kama dhiaŋ no nitye iye
Jalo osangala swa to penjo jo ni, "Winyalo teran, akidhi aomi?"
To Joyeyo ni, "Ei"
Ameno jowotho gi Gimoro kir pa jadwoŋ Malo
Munyo jotundo pa Malo, okel dhok kweth de, tiwacho ri Gimoro ni, "Ere, iwon pa chim dhok perin"
Gimoro owacho ni, "Ha!  An ma gimoro amora me! "
Kareno jotieko chikirok gi okondo ni kinoneni aayi, dhiaŋ ma no pie kwoŋe, meno dhiaŋ Perin
Odoko ka no kodere i man, meno amutel nywolo
Ka doko amedere ameno ma luwo ameno ameno nyuka jorum
Dhok marapena ma okel okondo koayi
Gimoro okwero kawacho ni, "Kwoŋ dhok me jye aparan ongoye i iye"
Odoko okel dhok ma chiel man, ama nyaka okondo oayi to pie ituŋ dhia? achiel
Ama Gimoro owacho ni, "Ei, dhiaŋ paran eno"
Aka odoko oayi to pie ituŋ dhiaŋ man, to Gimoro wacho ni, "Man kendo eno ma nywol"
Ameno ameno nyuka ochowo dhok pere jye
Munyo ochowo oketh dhok no gichien
Yawere tineko dhiaŋ titedo chiemo gi riŋo no jye gipi
To ilwoŋo Gimoro chiemo, to iwacho rigo ni, "Eno, wamiyin chiemo no, cham jye"
Gimoro ologo maber, to bedo piny, to wacho ni, "Ha!  An ma gimoro amora me!"
Anyalo chamo chiemo me jye chowo!"
Kani bolo waŋe to neno bur maluth swa dhu bothe
Ochamo manok to chako kwanyo chiemo i boke bolo i bur
Aka bende boke to bolo gichien
Munyo otieko bolo jye nyaka to lwoŋo jo ni ochowo chiemo
Munyo kir bur ochule to jo no jouro
To odoko jowacho ri Gimoro ni, "Baba ooro wan ni le e e"
Ni kidhi ibar rigo yen aoya
Aka yen ma go oyo ibaro tele
Jye gimoro kokwero
Omako le to kadho kir kama di tele
Otundo to wacho ni, "Ha!  An ma gimoro amora me!
Tele bende ibaro nedi?
Weyi atem
Ni kidho baro, to tele bare maber swa, kendo ma boyo swa
Munyo oromo otweyo wich yen pere madwoŋ swa ma tele, to chungo to paro ni, 'Tele ma kitiŋere me, alayeyere nedi?'
Kani kidho mako, ape!
Sewi pama sanja
Ameno won opoy munyo otundo gi wich yen ma tele
Our to iwacho ni, "Ape!  Kere me gimoro amora adieri!"
To imiyo go dhok pere jye dok gine
To kareno nitye nyar Malo ilwoŋo ni Nyaŋono omito swa nywomirok gi Gimoro
Munyo owacho ri bamere, bamere oyeyo go to wacho ri nyare ni, "Kikadho gi Gimoro, Tho wokiri woŋeyi, kendo ikiri ikidhi gi go"
Ato Tho wiye rach, bino chandin
To gosewila Nyaŋano gi kis gimoro gwendi, gi kal ma gwendi lachamo
Kareno Tho kieye bothi Nyaŋono
To ioro Tho bor, tichiko Nyaŋono ni, "Kwanyi kis gimoro perin jye, ikadhi"
Ka wiyin owil gi gimoro, kipoyo ikiri dwok iom
Ato ibino nwaŋo Tho odwoko
Iwinjo!"
Ameno won otieko oro Tho
Nyaŋono gi chwore e jokadho, to i royo bor nyaka to Nyaŋono poyo ni, "O!  Wiyan owili gi kal pa gwendi"
Gwendi bino tho
Kani gik, onwaŋo Tho bende otieko dwoko
To Tho sangala swa kapenjo ni, "Nyaŋono onwaŋo iweyan?"
To ni otem i wondo Tho nedi
Aka nyamin wokadhi, Tho kiyey
Bajo munyo ojok to wacho ri nyare ni, "Meno wach perin, akwerin ni kikadho ikiri gik chien onyo kadhi win gi go ongoye rieko
Ameno Nyaŋono jokadho gi omin go, Tho
Munyo jotundo i piny kis ka nyamin onywol to kech neko go
Go neko nyathi pa nyamin meno nyakewi mere, ni chiemo pere
Munyo asa neko nyithindho pa Nyaŋono, to Nya?ono kidho to ywakere ri bamere paka Tho ochowo kwoŋe nyithindho wotimi nedi
Bamere ooro yach temo dwoŋo Tho
Tho othiero jo ameno jochako riemo ariema gi men to jokunyalo mako go, to jojok to jowacho ni, "Nyaŋono, iwon chango imito dwoko gi Tho"
Eno othiero wan doŋ gine
Tho odoŋ to chako neko nyithindho pa Nyaŋono, kir pama me
Rodoŋ pa Tho piny me, atho munyo pama sika wan piny ka
Wanyithindho pa Nyaŋono gi Gimoro
Wanyikwayi Malo, Were
Wanyikewi Tho
Ochulu gi Liech gi Dhiŋ?
Chango chango, obedo Ochulu gi Liech munyo jonigi pesa pajo
Kis ŋata achiel omito kidho nyewo dhiaŋ pere yu katale
Ndelo ma katale munyo otundo, jowotho kidho nyewo dhok ato kis ŋata achiel won onyewo dhiaŋ pere
Ochulu onyewo ma roya
To Liech onyewo ma thwon
Munyo jotundo pecho, Liech kaliesa liesa pa gomba dhiaŋ pa Ochulu nyuka jotundo kir wacho ni onyo dhoki me jowok wayi weso
To joyeyere ameno

Jokwayo ameno iweso oro aryo, Munyo jochako maradek kareno dhiaŋ pa Ochulu odhuro, jomedere ameno kwath munyo weso pa Ochulu orumo, to liech chako, ndelo achiel to Ochulu mito kidho kiliesa ye gi liech yukuma go kwayo i iye dhok
Munyo otundo kere bende andelo ma dhiaŋ pa Ochulu onywoli i iye
Liech munyo oneno Ochulu bino, to nwaŋo thol to tweyo gine nyathi dhiaŋ to tweyo i tiendi thwon pere ka sangala swa
To koko ri Ochulu gi bor ni, "Jame ochulu anigi silwany madwoŋ swa, dhiaŋ paran onywoli, yombere ineni
Ochulu kutho oyengo ayenga wiye munyo kunyalo dwoko gimoro kadachiel
Kende odok to gik i royo munyo paro gi rawacha ri liech
To Wire to gik both Liech
Munyo chiegin tundo both Liech to chako ywak gi nge swa ka wacho ni, "Jame, baba otho"
Aka otho pama won ma aweyo otieki kir rieyo, kir gi diyo wa?e
Aka onwaŋo baba otho mumoro waŋe!  Liech obwok swa to moth to penjo Ochulu ni, "Aŋo muneko jadwo??"
Ochulu to wacho rigo malo swa ni, "Baba otho gi nywoli!  Baba onwaŋo nywoli to nyathi kuwok to tho!"
Liech to koko malo swa ni, "Jachwo bende nywoli"
To ochulu bende wacho malo ni, "To dhiaŋ ma jachwo bende nywoli!"
To Liech chako nyiero gi uro rieko pa Ochulu gi go dwoko ni jachwo bende nywoli gi Ochulu bende dwoko ni, "To dhiaŋ ma jachwo bende nywoli?"
Ameno Liech ogonyo woko thol ma otweyo i tiendi dhuon pere to dwoko ri Ochulu
Ro orieko pere oloyo Liech kir gi konon nyathi dhiaŋ odongi paka a pa Ochulu ma roya pa Ochulu won ama onywolo
Jome rieko ma kwo kiber wiyi Liech okwot swa rogo won dwoko chien ni, "Jachwo bende nywoli!"
Nyithindho ma Min Jo Eye
Chango chango, obedo jachwo ma dhako pere oeye to weyo rigo nyithindho aŋwen
To rumachien to kelo dhako maido mere pere ma omiyo kir min nyithindho me oeye to kareno dhako me paka obino kenyo go kifur
Chiemo munwaŋo nyeke cha ofuro ama jochamo rumachien munyo oneno chiemo no rumo to chako kigesa paka nyithindho me jo asa chiemo aka gokiye?
To chwore thumo rigo rieko ama ni, 'Paka onyo chiemo nok, imiyo jo nyaka moro manok aka iweyo madit ka adwoko munyo jonindo to wachamo'

Dhako no osangala gi wach no swa to chako buyo nyithindho me chiemo, to nyithindho me bende Were miyo jo silwany ma chiemo banyithindho me kuro ka nyithindho me nindo nyaka dwoko to gudo thigo moth aka min ot bende chiko achika ithe yawo thigo moth
Won ot donjo bedo piny ichwayo rigo chiemo
Munyo joneno adieri, joneno nyithindho jonindo, jopoyo ka nyithindho aŋwen jye jobedo piny ka jowacho ama
Marachiel owacho ni, "Baba eno imiyin"
Mararyo owacho ni, "Iwacho rigo to kinen?"
Maradek owacho ni, "ŋata neno kiwachi rigo?"
Maraŋwen owacho ni, "Onyo lwoŋ ni kenyo to ikichami?"
Ameno kis nyathi motieko luwo chako achaka chiemo kendo chiemo nyuka yeŋ
Ameno ni jothum rieko nedi nyithindho joloyo jo gi rieko nyuka joweyo nyithindho me chiemo achiema gi jo nyuka joye?
Rumachien mere munyo dhako me oneno ni onyo kiyeŋ nyachon to chako achaka dhawi gi chwore to chwore riemo
Ameno nyithindho jodongo maber swa
Pecho kir konon jonitye maber swa
Rombo kodi Gwok
Chango chango, rombo kodi gwok jomako mere
To bedo ndelo achiel to rombo wacho ri gwok ni, "Ibini, iwendi reye"
To gwok bende yeyo
Gwok oayi yawere mere to kidho wendo ri rombo
Munyo gwok otundo pecho pa rombo to rombo sangala gine swa, to miyo go gi bedo to motho go
Munyo otieko motho go, to kidho to ŋolo matoke, to gowo to chako tedo
Munyo matoke chegin chek, to rombo ayi to kidho i riete ŋwen, to goyo wich mere i riete ŋwen kanyo wacho ni, "Katumi, katumi"
To ŋwen chako dunyi to poŋo rigo sapik
To rombo dok pecho to nwaŋo matoke ochiek to tedo ŋwen to miyo wendo pere chiemo
Munyo gwok otieko chiemo to wacho ri rombo ni, "Ibini, ibende iwendi reye"
To ndelo moro to rombo bende to ayi to kidho wendo ri gwok
Gwok osangala swa to miyo rombo kom to motho go
Gwok to kidho piyo piyo to ŋolo matoke to gowo to chako tedo
Munyo matoke chegin chiek, to ayi to kidho i riete ŋwen, to chako goyo wich mere i riete ŋwen ka wacho ni, "Katumi, katumi"
Munyo ogoyo maradek wich mere to bare to podho to tho
To pecho kome to rombo temo kuro gwok to kineni, to temo kuro ro kineni, toayi to chako woth, to tundo i riete ŋwen to nwaŋo gwok nende otho de chon
To rombo wacho ri gwok ni, "Amere paran nende ikitedi ran kada doko? "
Aweyo ran itiŋo gwok ikidho yiko tadoki ran
Jachiko Awendo
Chango chango, obedo jal moro ma jachiko awendin
Jalo obedo gi mon pere awuchiel
To bedo ndelo achiel to jalo kidho chiko to mako awendo pere achiel
Munyo odwoko pecho to kano awendo pere, to yawere mere to doko mondo kidho chiko awendin, to ndelo no to doko mako awendo pere achiel
To munyo odwoko pecho to nwaŋo awendo ma nyoro go omako ongoye kama go okano iye, openjo mon pere to kisi dhano to kwero ni akineno
Jalo odoko okano awendo no to yawere mere to doko kidho chiko ma ndelo maradek
Ndelo no odoko omako awendo achiel, to munyo odwoko pecho odoko onwaŋo awendo ma nyoro go okano cha odoko ongoye
Jame odhier to chako penjo mon pere awuchiel me, to kis dhano no kwero ni kuneno awendo
Jame to nge mako go swa, to konyo buri ma luth swa, to lwoŋo mon pere jye, to jobino dhu bur, to fwonjo jo wer me
Awendo pa chworan  -  Kewere
ŋato chami go  -  Kewere
Amo tho ka  -  Kewere
Kewere, kewere ke  -  Kewere
Kis dhako owero ameno to kalo buri, to munyo otundo weso pa dhako marawuchiel to chako wer to munyo kitho kalo bur to dhako no podho i bur
To gime nyutho jal me ni kere dhako me amoido kwalo awendin pere
To sawa no won to yiko ayika dhako no iburi no
Aweyo ran iyiko dhako no to adoki ran
Nyir ma Jokidho Dimo Yen
Chango chango, obedo nyir aŋwen ma jokidho dimo yen isa
Munyo jotieko dimo yen pajo to jotweyo
Munyo jokidho yeyirok to yach aŋwen jobino bothi jo ni jomito nyir
Kenyo nyako achiel to lokere gwok to odoŋ nyir adek
Kis jayach oyero nyako pere to jayach achiel doŋ
Jayach me owacho ni, "Weyi akwanyi rani gwoki me okidhi okuri rani pecho"
Yach adek jodok gi nyir pecho pajo
Jayach achiel bende odok gi gwok
Yawere mere to jayach ma otiŋo gwok jokadho fur gi min gi bamere, to joweyo gwok kuro pecho
Gwok munyo oneno ji ongoye, to bolo woko pien to lokere dhano
Yawo dero, to kwanyo kal, to goyo, to chielo to chako rego
Munyo wero ni:
Ilwoŋan see kere to adhano
Ilwoŋan gwok kere to adhano
Ibolora kwon, kwon machol
I ga gi luthi, luthi machol
Munyo otieko rego to tedo kwon kodi magira, to chamo apere to weyo ri juma jokidho fur
Jame munyo jodwoko, jonwaŋo chiemo to jochamo, kis ndelo ameno ameno
Ndelo achiel to jome, jowacho ni, "Wapondi, waneni ŋata asa tedo riwan"
To ji aryo, jodonj pecho to jopondo
Nyako me to bolo woko pien to timo paka kis ndelo gotimo
Munyo gotieko rego, tedo, chiemo, to go kidho lwok, opoyo munyo jayach pere wacho ni, "Nyako kis ndelo iwondo wan ni i gwok kere to in dhano"
Nyako me obwoki swa to lokere dhano ki chutho, ko doko lokere gwok to doŋ adoŋa paka dhako
Aweyo ran chamo mbaga madwoŋ tek tek akaloran olwa pa nera
Jal ma Otero Nyithindho Per ŋweto Ayuyu
Chango chango, munyo kech opodho i piny
To bedo jachwo manigi nyithindho pere aryo, gi dhako pere
To kareno dhako no kumito nyithindho me be, rupir go kam' onywolo nyithindho no
Ndelo achiel to jowacho ri chwore ni, "Kech kidho neko wan e e"
Gimitim boli woko nyithindho perin aryo me
Teri jo kamoro bor i dudi
I lule kama jokinyali dwoko i iye
Jowotho koro
Jal me owinjo kendo osima wach no rupir nyithindho jokimiyi jowoye?
Ndelo achiel to bajo wacho ri nyithindho pere ni, "Kwanyi win adita akwaŋ win wikidhi wiŋweti win ayuyu"
Apaka nyithindho no jotimo
To jochako woth gi bajo, tundo i dudi ni nyithindho me jowowachi ri bajo ni, "Baba, kole ayuyu e e"
Bajo kwero akwera ni, "Be, yumalo koro amomore, owe win aowa"
Jowotho nyuka jotundo bor swa, kareno joluwo gi dudi, gima go mito won arwenyo nyithindho me royo kadwoko
Rumachien mere to nyaka chimo ri nyithindho no ni, "ŋweti win kenyo"
ŋweti win madit swa
An e e, anika atoŋo kedi, kafufa oromo wino wach ran to wadoki
To nyithindho no jochako ŋweto adieri joŋweto madit swa joŋeyo ni bajo nitye kere odok chon swa
Munyo otundo pecho, owacho ri dhako pere ni, "Sangala aliera gim' atieko bolo woko jo, odoko konen jo"
Munyo nyithindho no jotieko ŋweto aŋweta to jochako lwoŋo bajo
Ni jowolwoV kere bajo odok chon, to bende jochako rango dhoyo ama dwoko
Nyaka bajo li? luwo munyo go tito ri dhako pere, to bende jokonjere jodwoko
To munyo dhako no oneno nyithindho no to nyaka to julo gi nge swa
Ameno ooro nyithindho no wegi teŋo fufa gi tedo nyuka chiek
Munyo fufa ochiek to jochamo, jochamo pecho gi pi nyuka rumo
Odikin mere to doko bajo wacho rijo ni, "Owe win odoko akwaŋ win Vweto kendo
Nyoro onwaŋo fwodi adwoko kedi aka aomi win
Kareno meno wondo jo
Ameno okalo gi jo lule makalo apar to nyaka odoko wacho ri nyithindho me ni, "Atoŋo kedi woni ka, katero pecho aledwoko omo win, wiwinjo?"
Munyo fufa orumo, nyithindho ni jo wokor bajo nyuka piny kidho yutho ni jotemo woth kere jomedere yumalo ayino, ameno to piny yutho
Joneno ŋangi tele moro kuma yido ogwaŋe jonindo i iye, to jodonjo i iye, to jonindo
Munyo piny oyawere ma nyako mere kareno winjo kech swa
To ma jayach wacho ri ma nyako ni, "Bedi abeda kenyo abino"
Munyo jayach no wotho gi bor bor, neni gima chalo pa boke pendi
Ochore nyuka neno ni pendi adieri, kani kidho neno ni matoke achiel ochiek
Okidho to jako gi pi, to tero ri nyamin, to jochako chamo
Munyo jotieko chamo, omito swa gik dwaro ni won pendi no ŋa
Ameno munyo ogik wotho munyo liwere, munyo kwiya ni 'adech no nitye ŋa kosa aŋo?'
Nyuka kani kidho neno ni to neno ot moro achiel, kineni won ot no, to thumo rieko idho ot no moth swa to donjo i lum to umere gi lum ma mito neno ni won ot no chale nedi
Rumachien mere de, to nyaka neno won ot dwoko de ma ool, owok doyo pendi
Nyaka to bedo piny to chako wacho ni, "Kwiya atedi riŋo aŋo? "
Ma dhiaŋ, ma rombo, ma diel, ma gwok?
To won to dwoko ni, "Aweyi, atedi ma rombo ama kwako chiek odoko amamit"
Asa oli
Munyo otieko theno fufa to nyaka odoko chako paro gi kwano nyingi matoke ni, "Kwiya atedi nyarwanda, kwiya kiguti, kwiya nyaminnwa, kwiya teretesa
To won odoko dwoko ni, "Aweyi atedi nyarwanda"
Ama yom yom ama kirwu chiek
Okwako tedo nyarwanda odiyo, munyo otiŋo woko matoke le chako toko
To ŋata ni wilum, to chako gi wer malo i lum gi wer mamit swa ni, "Wer awera ameno ayombere aomi chieno paran, wamieli"
Kere nyaka ni woomi lake ma chamo gine go, yokama go furiye
Munyo owok gi ŋwech, to jayach bende to loro wi ot piyo swa to olo woko matoke jye gi riŋo jye ma kir kado to ŋwecho gine both nyamin
Kani jaomi chieno pere dwoko onwaŋo jawer oliŋ
Ana go, "Winyo wer wacham matoke gi riŋo"
Winyo pinyi si si si
To wire to wacho ni, "Kada ibedi akitok matoke paran gi riŋo t'achamo"
Kani kidho neno sapik, matoke, ongoye girachama moro jye, ongoye!  To paro swa to wacho ni, "Kwiya kendo atedi?"
Ana go won ni, "A!  Weyi amadhi churo paran anindi"
To kadho nindo ma kuchiemo
Gima otimere ameno di ŋwen, marabich jawer ni kidho idho malo wi ot ni kidho neno onwaŋo jadwoŋ
kosa dhakodwoŋ me odole fwodi wikanindo oworo
To gik both nyamin tundo dikin odoko to gik neno kendo ni oayi
Onwavo awaŋa fwodi jakanindo ameno
Munyo ndelo okadho adek, kani kidho gik kendo onwaŋo ni lwaŋino sunga
Ameno kere gi no otho, to gwedho gi luth moro mabor to podho piny munyo ŋwe
Ameno okwanyo to kidho bolo woko
Munyo otieko bolo woko to chako bino neno bath tiendi, ni i poyo onwaŋo jo nitye jaryo kosa kalo kenyo
Munyo onwaŋo ni ongoye kendo man to chako yweyo ot
To go gi nyamin to jotuk i ot p'Ogwaŋ me, tundo jolunjo gikipiny p'Ogwaŋ me, adieri nyithindho cha joŋa?
Munyo piny ogik maber munyo ji man jye jochako woth rupir yido jolworo Ogwaŋ cha
To jal moro to tundo kama nyithindho me jonitye to munyo dok to kidho wacho ri banyithindho me paka nyithindho me joŋa?
Kareno yuthu gi nyithindho me fwodi jokech swa
Munyo banyithindho me owinjo, okwako mako kavera kidho ni nyithindho jowosakaye rijo
Munyo nyithindho me joneno bajo, josangala adieri to jotedo chiemo madit swa gi riŋo bende madit swa ma ochamo de otweyo
To munyo go dok, nyithindho me jodonjo dero ma nitye i iye chieth oyeyo jojowo poŋ kavera to jokwoyo
Munyo jowacho ri bajo ni, kir matoke gi riŋo moweyo jye joketho i iye kenyo
Jalo osangala kendo owotho gi ma yindo swa
Munyo otundo pecho to tito ri dhako pere, paka nyithindho cha joŋaŋ gi gikipiny modwoko gine to wacho ni wok wany moro modwoko gine gine mochiek wocham
Ni kidho neno gima ni kutya, kere manago chieth oyeyo ngil
To dhaw gi dhako pere no swa, to goyo go, to riemo go, to gik bedo yupa nyithindho pere
Kir pama winjo siem swa ma nyithindho joketho go i iye rupir joŋeyo maber ni, min jo ama ndir cha odak jo
To okelo rieko momiyo bajo odak jo gi thwono jo chiemo
Mon manok swa ma jomito nyithindho pa mon nyek jo ma jotho kosa jo eye
Kere Okidho Limo Jojera
Chango chango, obedo kere ma piny no okidho limo jomutweyi jo i jera no
Munyo otundo to i jolo go gi dwoŋ maber swa
Owacho paka mitoye kiliesa gi jojera, jomutweyi jo
To won yero jomutweyi jo kwoŋ wadi jo
To yero jaŋwen
Owino, Oloka, Ochola, gi Owori to chako penjo kis ŋata achiel achiel
Olwoŋo Owino to penjo go ni, "Nyathi paran Owino banja aŋo mitimo ŋeyi wokelin i jera ka?"
Ana Owino, "Jadwoŋ, baba rwoth mayuthu wan onwaŋo go kimitan apoyo ran kago makan to tweyan"
Kere to odoko penjo, "Ngato tweyi mararyo ni to ini Oloka rango otweyin?"
To Oloka dwoko ni, "Jadwoŋ kere, onwaŋo nitye jager paran mukwalo gikipiny to rwoth ma yuthu wan to ere ni aŋata akwalo t'imakan t'ikelan i jera ka t'ithumo ran ni banja oloyan tikelan ka
Kere oyengo wiye ka wacho ni, "Jame, otweyi jo ma jongoye gi banja ma jotimo ouro swa
Ameno medo kiliesa gi jo man odoko omedo penjo Ochola kawacho ama, "To in, Ochola, aŋa mukelin i jera ka?"
Ochola to dwoko piyo swa ni, "Jadwoŋ kere iyadech mawan to gikipiny chako rwenyo rwenyo onwaŋo an kenyo
Kani aneno rwoth ma iyadech mawan otundo gi jasirikale ka jowacho ran ni 'Ochola wamakini watero tweyin'
In ŋata kwalo wan tikelan ka titweyan
Munyo Ochola ochowo wach pere to penjo ŋati man
"Ei," Owori munyo kere openjo Owori"
Owori oguro chonge maber swa to luwo gi bwonirok kawacho ama, "Jadwoŋ kere gima kelan ka yuchien mere wagore gi nyawotan"
Aka aŋata atelo goyo nyawotan no kareno anigi nge swa atoŋo kir wiye lero, to munyo waosa to banja loyan agima otweyan i iye ka
To jadwoŋ onyo pama nge rumo, "Kendo akudok agiki goroki gi nyawotan, kendo indiri cha atimo marach swa goyo nyawotan"
Kere osangala swa gi wach pa jayach me roluwo giradieri loyo wadi!  To kere to wacho ri jadwoŋ ma jera gonyo, "Owor, i jera wodok ro go luwo giradieri ri kere"
Owori owok i jera munyo sangala swa oweyo wadi ro go luwo munyo jobanere
Wadi jowacho ni, "O, bendi wan, bende waluwi giradieri!"
Jaradhola
Chango obedo jal ma ilwoŋo ni Obondo, ma obedo gimon pere aryo
Dhako marapena ilwoŋo ni Agemila, aka mararyo ilwoŋo ni Nyachuro
Hongo otundo to Obondo bolo woko Agemila kir gi nyathi pere ma nyako ma ilwoŋo ni Apil, to maro swa Nyachuro kodi nyathi pere ma nyako ma ilwoŋo ni Nyagol
Hongo achiel, adhola madwoŋ swa omako Obondo i tiende
Otemi tero go pa jomiliel mopokere opokere, to jye adhola konyalo chango
To dhano moro wacho rigo ni jathieth moro oido nitye ma nyalo botho go
Munyo oteri go, jathieth me owacho rigo ni pi ma wakawaka kende ama nyalo botho tiendi go
To oido wakawaka nitye bor swa gi pecho pa jame
Munyo odok pecho to lwoŋo Nyagol kodi min, to wacho rijo wach ma owok both jathieth
Apil rupir onwaŋo omaro bamere swa oredo piyo to pondo i buti ot munyo mito winjo gimo timere yowoth ma bamere owok iye
Obondo oluwo kachiko nyare mere Nyagol paka kapiny oyawere, go ripo mondo swa i wakawaka ma go bino twomo iye pi ma bino botho tiendi go
Ochiko nyathi me paka k'onyo go kidho kosa dwoko wok i wakawaka me
Marapena kiripi ŋiyo chen
Mararyo kiripi luwirok kichar i royo, kada motho dhano
Maradek kiripi luwo kumi gima dongo dongo jye ma go onen i waŋ yo, kosa i waŋ pi
Maraŋwen k'otundo i jwom to twomo pi, ripo woth wok i jwom kir pecho ma doko koneno chen
To medo ni wokir wowoth g'Apil rupir, kade nende okel pi pere go kibino oro
Kada ameno, Apil munyo otieko winjo gime jye, oŋwecho swa kidho wacho ri min go paka go bende bino woth gi nyamin kidho i wakawaka
Min owacho rigo ni wotemi kanyo go ŋeyo ni ka bamere oŋey, bino kwero go kidho
Yaweremere Apil okwale gi nyamin kidho i wakawaka gi asanda pere
Munyo nyithindho me jotieko woth mabor swa, jonwaŋo i thengi royo dhakodwoŋ m'oti swa kanyo furo kod fur kwer
Nyagol munyo oneno gime to koko swa kanyo nyutho nyawote gima timere
Apil kodewo to wotho awotha
Kenyo a kama otiya me olwoŋo jo, to luwo gi jo munyo chiko jo kum gima jokiripi timo i royo kanyo jokidho i wakawaka, ma bende ochale achala gi gima Obondo onwaŋo otieko wacho
I woth pajo, jotundo yowaŋe kama jowinjo ji ma luwo i thengi royo pajo ma nitye i kalima kasa i yikirok moro
Joma luwere , joma galagasa, joma goyo bunde, joma kudho gwara, gi gikipiny man ameno
Gima jye onwaŋo jowinjo awinja to jokinen
Munyo jomedere, joneno sandin ma mwenge ma wegi joringo aringa kendi gin gi thengi royo kenyo
Munyo jomedo woth, doko joneno dhano ma chango otho chon ma oido nitye kir nanga ma yik, ka por apora giwiye i thengi royo kenyo
Munyo fwodi jomedere, joneno dhako moro ma oido wotho i thengi royo kenyo munyo ŋwen agoro duny i wiye
Nyithindho me joneno gikipiny madongo swa ma kelo dhier, to kada nende ameno Apil okuro chikirok ma owinjo kum bamere kod kum dhako otiya cha
Go konyalo neno chen, koluwo gimoro jye, ma kada nyamin otemo swa lwoŋo go, geyo go gi nyutho go gikipiny ma oido timere
Okuro kula pere chuka de otundo i jwom to twomo pi i sanda pere to chako woth dok, ma koluwo doko koneno chen
Nyagol konyalo kuro gime jye
Oneno chen, ogwelo nyamin, okoko kaluwo kum kis gima go oneno jye, ma kada bedi ni go bende otundo i wakawaka to twomo pi
Munyo nyithindho me jotundo pecho, Obondo okoko gibor kanyo ryemo Apil gi pi pere, to sangala swa gi pi pa Nyagol
Tekin chako lwoko adhola pere gi pi pa Nyagol, to nyaka tiende ŋadere madwoŋ swa
Paka go omedo lwoko adhola gi pi me, apaka adhola bede omedo yawirok gi ramogo ma giraura
Ndelo achiel tiwacho rigo ni kono miti ŋata oomo pi i wakawaka konyalo kuro chik ma dhoyo
I winjo wach me, Obondo okwayo pi pa Apil, ma onwaŋo go bende okano akana de wok ndelo ma bamere ryem gine go
Munyo jadwoŋ me olwoko adhola pere gi pi pa nyare me, wor no won ama onindo i iye swa
Rumachien ma ndelo adek, onwaŋo munyo go nyalo kir woth, ma oido go kinyal kada ayi malo, nindo kosa chemo
Jame olwoŋo Apil to penjo go gimo timere jye i ndelo ma joomo pi i wakawaka
Apil owacho rigo kis gima obedo jye
Jadwoŋ me osangala swa gi tim pa nyath pere me
Rumachien ma ndelo abiryo kende, onwaŋo jame tiende otieko chango kichutho aka gwecho swa gi kisangala
Tekin Obondo tieko both, to lwoŋo merin, wade gi joger jye bino kisangala kanya achiel gine i kalima madwoŋ ma go ochano
Jame oneko thwon madwoŋ swa maleny, to tedo kalima madwoŋ
I kalima me go owacho ri ji paka onwaŋo otieko bolo woko dhako pere madwoŋ me kir gi nyath pere
To wacho paka i ndelo no, ogik maro dhako pere no kir gi nyath pere Apil, rokula maber ma go ofwonjo nyath pere, tundo kama onyalo botho rigo adhola ma onwaŋo nyalo neko go
Kigana me fwonjo wan gime:
Marapena, dongo gi kula motire ma nyalo kelo ri wan silwany
Marayo, bedo gi chuny wan maber ri jodongo gi jowot wan man jye, kada nende bedi ni jotimo ri wan marach
Apil kodi min go jomedo ameda maro jodwoŋ me, kada bedi ni oido obolo woko jo
Maradek, waripo bedo jamakuro chikirok gi kula ma ripo
Maraŋwen, waripo bedo gi mar ri kis dhano jye ma pecho mawan, ma ongoye nyutho dakirok ri joman
Marabich, waripo ŋeyo ni kiber chayo kosa dak dhano moro jye, rupir nyalo bedo ri wan gi kony i kwo mawan
Aweyo jome munyo fwodi josangala i kalima pajo me, to ayombere bino wacho ri win gima dwoŋ me
Jal ma Onywomo Mon Adek
Chango chango, obedo jal manigi mon pere adek
To kwoŋ mon no, jobedo, joluwirok kichar kosa jotwodo
Ndelo achiel to joyiko mwenge, munyo matoke ochiek to jopoko matoke, munyo jodhiŋo matoke to ichako yweko pi ma konjo i matoke
Kwoŋ mon adek me nitye achiel ma kiluw ma obadha
Munyo mon no jochako kulo kis dhako gi dak pere
Mon aryo ama jotelo kulo i jwom kareno nitye winyo ma wero
Dhako ma otelo kidho i jwom munyo otieko twomo pi to yere munyo dok to winyo chako wer ni, "Nya pa rwoth me, chwili, konyan akonya chwili"
Wach ri joma pecho chwili ni winyo ni jwom kacha chwili winyo ma oruko tiko chwili winyo ma oruko gagi chwili, cho chicho dak ni pa
To dak to podho to tho to dok pecho munyo ongoye gi dak to ioro dhako mararyo
Munyo dhako no otiŋo dak kidho i jwom to odoko nwaŋo winyo no i jwom
Munyo otieko twomo pi to yere to winyo no odoko chako wer
Munyo otundo ni dak ni pa to dak wok iwiy dheno to podho piny
Munyo wiro waŋe ni ŋiyo chien koma di winyo
Munyo odok pecho to owacho ri chwore ni, "Dak otho r'oweri pa winyo"
Chwore oriemo go to idok ioro dhako ma obadha kulo, meno adhako maradek
Munyo obadha omako dok pere kidho i jwom to twomo pi, to yere dak, to chako woth
Munyo wotho to winyo chako wer
Owero ameno dikweth, munyo dhako ma obadha me wotho nyuka tundo pecho
Otundo munyo ni gi pi, kendo munyo dak ber
Jal ma won pecho ofwoyo swa dhako pere ma obadha me to won paro kosa chayo swa mon pere aryo me ma joneko degi pajo
Munyo oparo ni mon me jotimo marach ri winyo me
Onyo ama jame odoŋ rigo gi dhako pere achiel kende ma obadha me
To riemo mon ma joluwo ma joneko degi pere me
Aweyo ran jal cha sangala gi dhako pere ma obadha me loyo mon ma joluwere kichar chalo ma wegi jokwinyo winyo
Tiyo
Chango chango, obedo jachwo ma ilwoŋo ni 'Tiyo'
Kareno jachwo me nigi min ma tuwo
Tuwo nigi adhola marach swa i tiende
Tiyo me ama timo rigo kis gimoro kulo, rego, tedo, ŋweto, timo kis tich ri min
To kareno Tiyo me omito miel ma kiwinji ni ilamielo kune
Aka kokidho, kakidho no kutho tedo ri min mado rigo tiende kendo kano go malo wiŋango
Kuma ogwaŋ kinyali neno go rupir kareno tiendi min ŋwe ka gimoro jye lwovo go woliŋ aliŋa kendo Tiyo me nigi gwokere kweth swa ma wotho gine kakidho i miel
Ndelo achiel to Tiyo kidho i miel
Otieko timo ri min kis gimoro jye paka tedo, mado rigo tiende gi chiko go ni, "Mama e e, akidho i miel ikiri iye"
Ka gimoro luwo woko to go kadho kir gi gwokere pere jye
Miel ober swa
Pecho ka ondiek obino to chako turo bel woko kosa turo gikipiny woko
To min tiyo won ere i ot to penjo ni, "ŋa?"
Ana ogwaŋ woko ka ni, "Ani mere pa Tiyo woni"
To openjo dhako no ni, "Okethani ka wiŋaŋo?"
Ogwaŋ to donjo to penjo dhako no ni, "Tiyo okulo oŋweto, odimo yeni, otedo rini chiemo?"
Jye no dhako no kokwer to munyo openjo go ni, "Omado rini tiendini"
Okwero ni, "Be, kumado"
To nyaka ondiek tedo kwon ma odhiek odhiek to chako mado gine tiendi min tiyo mado chamo mado chamo
To kareno mado ma nyawo ri owor
To dhako me winjo litho swa amumiyo woori winyo akuru ni, "Akuru lwoŋi rani
Tiyo kuma okidho i iye mieli ondiek nekani ano miyini maido
Akurur to ayi to kidho kir imieli to chako wer
Munyo opie kawero ama:
Tiyo ye tiyo ye tiyo
Kada igalo mieli gwara no
